column1:
0,"

Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need &
column2:
What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks &
column3:
Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

>  Design award-winning Bluetooth Headphones by dottsaudio. The dotts M+ is the first fully customizable, modular and sustainable Wireless headphone. The first of its kind with an amazing ultra-flexible headband made using 3D printing techniques. The dotts M is a meticulously crafted wireless headphone truly made to be as unique as you. An ultime audio experience with all the features you came to expect from a high-end headphone.

> The dotts configurator. We have created the configurator so that you can design your own headphones. Press on the button to visit the dotts M configurator and enjoy designing your new high-end wireless and sustainable headphones.

>The dotts headphones are made of high quality materials that come from natural and renewable resources and its production uses 65% less energy than traditional manufacturing. It is a completely upgradable product that allows us to break the paradigm of plastic waste. Scroll down and get to know better why we are the most Eco-Friendly headhpones ever created.

>Immerse yourself in a true audio experience. Active Noise Cancellation let you focus on the things that really matter: your music, your videos and your calls. When you activate it every noise that you don't want to hear will be eliminated.
>

Before starting the development of the dotts headphones we first chose all the features that we would most like to have as headphone's clients. dotts headphones are unique pieces of technology fully engineered by our team that enhances the sound experience, taking it to the next level.

Having a dotts case also means there is no need for extra packaging that we know will only end up in the bin. The dotts case is an exclusive case made with sustainable materials and we are sure that you will love it!

column2: >The dotts headphones are made of Bioplastics and 100% Eco-friendly materials.

>TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) is a environmentally friendly material that gives strength and flexibility to the dotts M headband and buttons . Almost unbreakable, you'll never have to worry about breaking your headphones again.

>PLA (polylactide) gives the dotts M resistance and strength at the same time. Made from 100% renewable resources such as corn starch, chips or sugarcane. It is super amazing, and comfortable at the same time.

>Being biodegradable means that the industrial process of biodegradation is much quicker than PET plastic (plastic made of petroleum). Our materials only require 45-90 days to get the industrial process completed while PET products require an intense, long and also harmful to the environment one.

>Instead of manufacturing the whole product in China (as most of the brands do) we have an in-house production model. In that way, we are not only avoiding unnecessary transport but we are also controlling the quality and the processes of almost everything we do. The final product is also hand-assembled in our factory in Madrid (Spain).

>dottsaudio is a multidisciplinary team with product design as the main expertise, but with a strong connection with engineering, science and business.  We strongly believe that it's only with a wide approach that we can get a solution that is truly complete.

column10: '/>We’ve worked hand to hand with some of the most qualified design professionals and top audio engineers. We are proud to showcase the process, from renderings to electronic drawings and prototyping.

column2: >Over the last 10 months the entire dottsaudio team have been working so hard on the development of the dotts M. We have worked in collaboration with some of the top engineering companies of the world, such as ARROW, and also some of the best audio experts of Spain. The path hasn't been easy but we didn't want to launch the campaign without having everything ready to make the leap to mass production. dottsaudio team has also been supported by an startup accelerator program directed by the CITI Bank and Deusto University after being chosen as one of the best startups of the program.
>

column1: If you are a retailer and would like more information about our products, please send us an email at procurement@dottsaudio.com and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

We ship worldwide, with the exception of Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Macedonia, Kosovo, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations.

For the past months, our team has been working day and night to dial in the design, production and logistics. We work with one of the largest electronic traders of the world. We have also partnered with third party quality control teams to ensure that we only send out the highest quality headphones to you. Everything we do is controlled by our engineers and our Chief of Operations.

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risk and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you.

Any questions?

Check our FAQ below or send an email to hey@dottsaudio.com If you still have any doubts then:
column14: >When will I be able to choose my color variation?
column17:
>
  • We will email you a survey after the campaign is completed to collect the colours and shape of your dotts M. Please note that if you decide to customise your whole product, the refund policy won't be applicable since it would be a fully customised product.
column30: >Where can I get help if there is a problem with the product?
column33:
>
  • For any inquiry or problem after receiving the product, our technical support team will be available to attend you at hey@dottsaudio.com or via the Facebook chat above. Once you receive your dotts you will get also our compromise of answering you in less than 24 hours.
column49:
>
  • We have a 1 year International warranty policy (please note it may be more than 1 year depending on your local legislation)
column65:
>
  • lf you have not yet received your device and it has not yet been shipped, you can email us and receive a full refund (while the ""funding""campaign is active - not ""InDemand"" stage). If the product has been shipped and you have not received it, we can issue a refund. There is a 14 days money back guarantee if you have not used the device and open the package. Shipping and VAT will not be refunded and you are responsible for shipping charges for the return.
column78: >I have backed your project but I didn't get any confirmation email. How do I check the status of the order?
column81:
>
  • We would recommend you to check your spam folder. If you can'f find it please contact us and we will be more than happy to help you!
column94: >Can you tell me about volume pricing? I am interested in getting these for my office.
column97:
>
  • Sure! Contact us at hey@dottsaudio.com and a member of dotts audio team will help you with it.
column110: >How much is the shipping cost? When will I receive my dotts M?
column113:
>
  • The shipping cost is up to 10 Euros depending on the country. The expected shipping date is by the end of October - November 2018. You will receive a survey once the campaign is finished in order to confirm your shipping address and your requested colours and shape.
column126: >How many countries does the dotts M can be shipped to?
column129:
>
  • We ship our dotts M worldwide, with the exception of Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Macedonia, Kosovo, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations.
column142: >Will there be any handling fees and custom charges?
column145:
>
  • Every VAT amount is included in the price so you won't need to pay any extra money. There are no custom charges included.
column158: >Can my backed product be shipped to different addresses? What happens if I change my address before you ship?
column161:
>
  • All orders on the same account will be shipped to a single address. To send to multiple addresses, multiple orders (under different accounts) are needed. You can save money by sending them to one shipping location. If you wish to do this with multiple orders, please contact us. Also, before we ship your order, you can change the shipping address at any time.
column174: >Can the headphone be used by cable?
column177:
>
  • Yes, an extra Jack 3.5mm cable is included in the box. There is an auxiliary port located on the back of the right Ear Cup.
column193:
>
  • We have spent a lot of time designing the most comfortable headphone for you. Thanks to 3D printing and the headband fully-flexible material the dotts M is more comfortable than any other headphone you have ever tried. It fits to every head size and shape.
column206: >Are the headphones suitable for exercise use?
column209:
>
  • Yes, they are. They are so light and the flexible headband makes it perfect for sports use. We recommend the Over the Ear Oval for sport use, but both of the Over the Ear are perfect. The earpads are also totally interchangeable so it is a good point for sports use!
column225:
>
  • The earpads are completely and easily replaceable.
column238: >Which voice assistants work with the dotts M?
column241:
>
  • The dotts M work properly with Siri, Google Assistant and Cortana. We are on the process of testing Alexa.
column254: >What does it mean that the headphones are upgradeable?
column257:
>
  • The modular design of the dotts M allows us to sell each piece individually which means that you won't need to worry about buying a whole new headphone when you are tired of the color or shape as well as when it gets broken. The upgradeable program will start once the campaign is finished.
column270: >Which payment methods do you accept?

column1: • If you are contributing via direct credit/debit card we accept Visa, Mastercard, American Express, and Discover Cards.

","Design award-winning Bluetooth Headphones by dottsaudio. The dotts M+ is the first fully customizable, modular and sustainable Wireless headphone. The first of its kind with an amazing ultra-flexible headband made using 3D printing techniques. The dotts M is a meticulously crafted wireless headphone truly made to be as unique as you. An ultime audio experience with all the features you came to expect from a high-end headphone.

The dotts configurator. We have created the configurator so that you can design your own headphones. Press on the button to visit the dotts M configurator and enjoy designing your new high-end wireless and sustainable headphones.

The dotts headphones are made of high quality materials that come from natural and renewable resources and its production uses 65% less energy than traditional manufacturing. It is a completely upgradable product that allows us to break the paradigm of plastic waste. Scroll down and get to know better why we are the most Eco-Friendly headhpones ever created.

Immerse yourself in a true audio experience. Active Noise Cancellation let you focus on the things that really matter: your music, your videos and your calls. When you activate it every noise that you don't want to hear will be eliminated.

The headband is made of a completely flexible and sustainable material with a level of resistance that can withstand the strength of a car without breaking. Always returning to its original position, it comfortably fits all head sizes and it's virtually impossible to break.
With one or two taps you can control your music, calls and activate the voice assistant. Turn volume up and down, take/decline calls, skip songs and much more with your fingerprints.

Of course, technology matters. But to us, it REALLY matters. Having experienced the design of previous audio products, it made us understand what customers are really looking for when buying a wireless headphone. Before starting the development of the dotts headphones we first chose all the features that we would most like to have as headphone's clients. dotts headphones are unique pieces of technology fully engineered by our team that enhances the sound experience, taking it to the next level.

Every dotts headphone includes a dotts case. With the dotts case you will be able to carry them with you wherever you go. Having a dotts case also means there is no need for extra packaging that we know will only end up in the bin. The dotts case is an exclusive case made with sustainable materials and we are sure that you will love it!

We strongly believe that every Wireless headphone should have a very unique sound signature. The dotts M have an accurate sound with a slight boost in the bass and lower midrange. It offers total isolation from all external noise through its innovative noise cancellation mode with no effect on the hi-fi sound, keeping it clean and pure. You will enjoy your music the way it was intended!
The dotts headphones are made of Bioplastics and 100% Eco-friendly materials.

TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) is a environmentally friendly material that gives strength and flexibility to the dotts M headband and buttons . Almost unbreakable, you'll never have to worry about breaking your headphones again.

PLA (polylactide) gives the dotts M resistance and strength at the same time. Made from 100% renewable resources such as corn starch, chips or sugarcane. It is super amazing, and comfortable at the same time.

Being biodegradable means that the industrial process of biodegradation is much quicker than PET plastic (plastic made of petroleum). Our materials only require 45-90 days to get the industrial process completed while PET products require an intense, long and also harmful to the environment one.

Instead of manufacturing the whole product in China (as most of the brands do) we have an in-house production model. In that way, we are not only avoiding unnecessary transport but we are also controlling the quality and the processes of almost everything we do. The final product is also hand-assembled in our factory in Madrid (Spain).

dottsaudio is a multidisciplinary team with product design as the main expertise, but with a strong connection with engineering, science and business.  We strongly believe that it's only with a wide approach that we can get a solution that is truly complete.
We’ve worked hand to hand with some of the most qualified design professionals and top audio engineers. We are proud to showcase the process, from renderings to electronic drawings and prototyping.

Over the last 10 months the entire dottsaudio team have been working so hard on the development of the dotts M. We have worked in collaboration with some of the top engineering companies of the world, such as ARROW, and also some of the best audio experts of Spain. The path hasn't been easy but we didn't want to launch the campaign without having everything ready to make the leap to mass production. dottsaudio team has also been supported by an startup accelerator program directed by the CITI Bank and Deusto University after being chosen as one of the best startups of the program.
If you are a retailer and would like more information about our products, please send us an email at procurement@dottsaudio.com and we will get back to you within 24 hours.

We ship worldwide, with the exception of Saudi Arabia, Peru, Ecuador, Macedonia, Kosovo, Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Somalia, Sudan, North Korea, Syria, and Yemen. Please note that we cannot ship to military locations.

For the past months, our team has been working day and night to dial in the design, production and logistics. We work with one of the largest electronic traders of the world. We have also partnered with third party quality control teams to ensure that we only send out the highest quality headphones to you. Everything we do is controlled by our engineers and our Chief of Operations.

We understand and acknowledge that no project comes without risk and challenges. Despite our planning, there are circumstances that may be out of our control. If we are met with these, we promise to communicate with full transparency to you.

There is a 14 days money back guarantee if you have not used the device and open the package. Shipping and VAT will not be refunded and you are responsible for shipping charges for the return. 0,"

We already have a prototype, developed as a windows form .exe and we  want to transform it to a browser plugin and also improve it in many ways.

The idea is to translate Audio to Text, then from Text to sign. Audio to text is a mature technology We are going to use Artificial Intelligence(AI) and Machine Language(ML).

Major cooperation have not really looked at sign language because of economical returns.

""Not so many people use it anyway"". This is why we are using a crowdfunding and wiki community philosophy. We do not expect to hit it rich, but we are serving a community.

I personally feel that using videos is key in social media and life now, yet many deaf people who cannot access hearing aid are completely locked out. This is the gap we are filling and that is why I am calling on you to cooperate with me.

Short Summary

We live in communities with some deaf and dump people. We feel how hard it is for them now to access online information which is growing graphical and about about videos every other day.

Most cooperation that run the online media has ignored the deaf yet they are part of our communities and they deserve to have access to information in the language they can understand.

We are developing a cross platform browser plugin that can easily recognize speech and automatically pops up, showing a graphical representation of the interpretation from Audio to Sign Language. This software shall be released as an open source tool so that we can allow multiple languages to be interpreted because our abilities and time frame shall allow us to have the tools interpret English to sign language. We shall start with American Sign Language and then release it to open source so that the world can continue to program and extend to other Sign Languages

What We Need &
• We shall need to hire a sign language Expert to help in the translation. We shall have to contract for 6 months, the period necessary for the whole project.

• We shall to hire two graphical designers. These two will also work for a period of six months to help in designing and implementing the graphical concepts of that shall be used in the auto translations to Sign Language.
• We shall need to hire a copywriter. This must be an expert in English who shall work with in the team in writing the necessary statements that shall be used in Artificial Algorithms.
• We need to rent online server space
• I will volunteer as a Systems Architect and Project Manager. Will also use my company resources doing this project

• My team and I are hopeful about the impact of this project. Many people who cannot enjoy the benefits of social media shall be able to enjoy them. The deaf shall be able to use YouTube, watch WhatsApp, Facebook and any other social media videos. They will also be able to listen to radio on their phones. We believe information is power and that tool shall grossly help also 70 Million people in our society that currently face lots of problems in communicating online.

Performance Requirements
The application should perform accurately in a quiet environment.
The performance should not deteriorate drastically even in the presence of some noise.
The response time for recognizing a word should not be more than 2 seconds.
The probability of misrecognition should be not more than 30%- 40%

column2:
Challenges

  • Our greatest rick is the number of language which the plugin would be able to recognize and translate. We shall focus on English and release this plugin as open source so that other people can contribute and make it recognize as many languages as possible.

Other Ways You Can Help

column1: • If case one you cannot contribute financially, you may help raise funds in your communities
• We shall also need people to review and critic the product when we reach the beta start and this shall be in 3 months times. You may email me and we get in touch.
• In case you have any skills that are relevant in our project, kindly also get to my email.

In case you have any skills that are relevant in our project, kindly also get to my email.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
Twinkle Treat Basket container has motion activated LED light and sound displays enhancing Halloween nighttime visibility of its user.

The idea for the Twinkle Treat Basket came about from a near tragedy while driving home on a dark Halloween night in 2011.  Its creator narrowly missed hitting a trick-or- treating child who was walking on the road side in the dark.  This incident had shaken her so much that it inspired her to create the Twinkle Treat Basket concept. Her design idea would help make treat-or–treating children more visible to drivers.

In December of 2011, as a family we set out to create the first Twinkle Treat Basket. After seeing what Halloween products were on the market we decided to make our own design.  We bought many LED products and toys with sound, pulled them apart and studied how they were made.  With household tools and many trials and errors on our kitchen table, we perfected Twinkle Treat Basket into what you see here and on our website www.twinkletreatbasket.com.

Twinkle Treat Basket is an interactive candy carrier for Halloween that has motion and vibration-activated lighting and sound displays. This unique design not only enhances the carrier’s costumed appearance but also increases the visibility of the user by making them extremely noticeable to drivers and others during this nighttime event.

Here is the first hand built design that started our journey.  It was rough and
still functions even today on its original lithium watch batteries.

column3:
/>

During the past 3 years time we have kept our focus to produce a durable quality product that will provide increased visibility to children allowing many to fully enjoy Halloween.

column1:
As time went our designs eventually got better.  Two of the most difficult
build challenges were figuring out how to get the hand activation sensor for
the sound and lights to work properly and then finding to enclose the electronics and manufacturer at a price point where we could be profitable.
This is our actual kitchen table.  We were getting close but still not there yet
column2: needed to make it brighter and get rid of a lot of wires.

column1: Our little pirate already claimed his Twinkle Treat Basket. From my own tests with 3 AA Alkaline batteries the Twinkle Treat Basket flashed on display mode for 7 days!  All the time spent finding the right components was worth it.  The design is very durable, bright enough to be seen at a distance and energy efficient.

We are a very small company and are humbled but also proud to say that we have made a production grade marketable and ready to sell Twinkle Treat Basket. We could write a book on all the challenges we have faced in the past 3 years. We are driven because we believe in what we are doing and will not give up. We have a great group of people that have helped us through concept to reality and we have always found a way to solve issues that arise. Currently, we are building our first orders of Twinkle Treat Basket inventory and as you can imagine this has drained our resources. Although there is minimal time to sell actual units for this Halloween Season, this is the prime time to sell directly to retailers for Halloween 2015. If our funding limitations are met we will have the resources to complete our product safety testing and build our marketing to launch on a much grander scale this coming year. Twinkle Treat Basket technology and design has been tested and is a proven reality. We brought this idea to life and serve a purpose in hopefully saving lives. We hope you like Twinkle Treat Basket as much as we do and can imagine all the shapes, sizes and uses that could be created from our first Pumpkin model. We already have other designs in our heads just waiting to be set free.

When we first set out to market The Twinkle Treat Basket we hired a firm called Marketing Advisory Group out of Las Vegas, NV.  Edward Ayers helped us get focused and create all our first marketing material. We incorporated SOBOBAS, Inc. and sent out our information.  To our excitement and surprise we received many positive responses and two very larger retailers expressed interest, but at that time we had not been able to find a manufacturer for the Twinkle Treat Basket. 
After various attempts and failures in January 2014 we reached out to a family friend and he found us a Korean Manufacture that we have built a relationship with. We had some delays but being that we wanted to make a quality product we took time to make sure it was ready for market. At this writing we have finished our product design and moving toward  production.  Our hope is to market for next year and obtain all product certifications needed for importation and sales with a full launch set for Halloween 2015.  Our website www.twinkletreatbasket.com is up and we will open online sales once we know our first shipment is close to arriving.  Our biggest challenge is marketing, but we have a product that we can easily demonstrate to be profitable on paper.

With the money we receive our plans were and still are still quite focused. 
Market and attend every trade show we can over the next 8 months to generate orders.  We started with the idea of licensing our and have now become a manufacturer and the sole distributor of the Twinkle Treat Basket in North America.  We came to Indiegogo.com with the hopes that there are people who believe in this product as much as we do.   Along the way we found some wonderful people that were able to help us out.  Thank You for looking at us here on indiegogo.com and anything you can do to help us get notice would be worth more than the funding.   Please help save some lives and avoid senseless tragedies on Halloween.  Since this campaign ended we have been able to launch our website an online store and our looking for our next rendition of the Twinkle Treat Basket.
","Twinkle Treat Basket container has motion activated LED light and sound displays enhancing Halloween nighttime visibility of its user.

The idea for the Twinkle Treat Basket came about from a near tragedy while driving home on a dark Halloween night in 2011.  Its creator narrowly missed hitting a trick-or- treating child who was walking on the road side in the dark.  This incident had shaken her so much that it inspired her to create the Twinkle Treat Basket concept. Her design idea would help make treat-or–treating children more visible to drivers.

In December of 2011, as a family we set out to create the first Twinkle Treat Basket. After seeing what Halloween products were on the market we decided to make our own design.  We bought many LED products and toys with sound, pulled them apart and studied how they were made.  With household tools and many trials and errors on our kitchen table, we perfected Twinkle Treat Basket into what you see here and on our website www.twinkletreatbasket.com.

Twinkle Treat Basket is an interactive candy carrier for Halloween that has motion and vibration-activated lighting and sound displays. This unique design not only enhances the carrier’s costumed appearance but also increases the visibility of the user by making them extremely noticeable to drivers and others during this nighttime event.
Here is the first hand built design that started our journey.  It was rough andstill functions even today on its original lithium watch batteries.
During the past 3 years time we have kept our focus to produce a durable quality product that will provide increased visibility to children allowing many to fully enjoy Halloween.

As time went our designs eventually got better.  Two of the most difficultbuild challenges were figuring out how to get the hand activation sensor forthe sound and lights to work properly and then finding to enclose the electronics and manufacturer at a price point where we could be profitable.
This is our actual kitchen table.  We were getting close but still not there yet

How It All Begins?

column1: From Napkin Concept To An Awesome Reality

column2: dynamic Taiwan based product development team who  had helped clients developed numerous products around the world. But we had always wanted to have a “Signature Product Of Our Own"", something that we are really passionate about and  can be proud of.

column1: So when someone fired up a dinner conversation(debate) a year ago about which is the Coolest Wireless Bluetooth Speakers in the market, that conversation quickly lead into a “Geek Out Party!”  where we drafted out a""blueprint"" of what we believe to be…
""The Smart Wireless Speakers Of Our Dream!""

Now, as we are based in Taipei City and like any city dwellers in the world,  we love things that can free up more time and space for us, especially those that comes with human driven design and technology that makes us feel cool and awesome in our fast moving and hectic life.

So We Decided To Become BOLD ( Really BOLD!).
Instead of developing just another speaker, we wanted to create a Fun and Unique User Experience from it.

Little did we know, that this little “Blue Print” on the paper napkin turn out to be the INCUBATION of our long awaited Signature Product of our own----MobiMuse XBand-ONE! 


We Started To Work Quickly...

We called up and meet up with some of the most resourceful individuals and innovative talent we know of. And before we knew it, we gathered some of the best resources and members to Kick Start our MOBIMUSE XBAND-ONE project.
With our ""1st Proof Of Concept"" , we decided to move quickly to the next phase of our project....

We played with all kind of possibilities. While we do want XBAND-ONE to look cool, we also want to add some Unique Twist with a  bit of Human Touch on it.

So when DES, our Australia Trained Designer finally came out ( after countless sleepless night) with an ""Unplug and Deploy"" Concept in a Classic Boom Box design, and added a perfect mix of  Futuristic Yet Minimalist look and feel that looks like this....


We All Fell In LOVE ...Right On The Spot!


So We Decided To Plunge!

We put in every resource we had and JUMP straight into the production of our First CNC Mock Up Sample before anything else!

Having our 1st Mock Up Sample at hand,we knew we need a little more preliminary market research to iron out any ""loose ends"" to make sure that XBAND-ONE is ready for the market.

So we scheduled to meet up with some potential buyers during the International Hong Kong Electronic Trade Shows.

We received some great response, along with some very valuable insights and recommendations from some of the Most Savvy Gadgets Sellers around the world.

This is IMPORTANT, Because we know....above our passion, XBand-ONE MUST be a ""Market Driven"" product as well.

As you can see from the above, MOBIMUSE XBAND-ONE is not just another “Fly By Night” Idea. It is a product developed with a Solid Plan Of Action from a dedicated team of people who stop at Nothing to realize our dream.
Now we know we do not have“Studio Quality” Videos to tell our story or “Fancy Big Offices” to show off like some of the “Big Boys” out there

column30:
/>

A Bluetooth amplifier that is BETTER than existing ones in the market!

Small, portable, and beautiful. It's not only an amplifier, but a gratifying home decor, or a device that allows you to use you speakers anywhere, including a lovely lawn under the sun. 

Many of the amplifiers in the current market need wired power supply, so they can't be away from cables and electrical outlets. Besides, they usually come with high price. In order to create enjoyable amplifiers that are accessible and user-friendly to all, we wanted to combine a small size, a stylish appearance, long-lasting built-in battery, bluetooth connectivity and high definition quality into our very creation. 




Bring your favorite speakers to life!

Bluetooth speakers and amplifiers are getting common nowadays. However, our favorite speakers of all time are the old ones we bought 20 years ago. We haven't used it for quite some time, but they have been the best company of ours for more than ten years. Eventually, we decided to make an amplifier that works with our old speakers so that they can be our loyal friends again.
column34: >
column38:
/>

REPOP is the smallest wooden portable amplifier with bluetooth function. 

With CSR Bluetooth 4.0 Chip, REPOP supports both APT-X and AAC, and gives you wonderful sound quality. What's even more, with exclusive Pure&
column39:
Sound technique, it reduces much noise and distortion.

Connect any passive speaker with this exclusive multifunctional amplifier, and play music simply via bluetooth. It is compatible with all bluetooth devices: tablets, mobile phones and computers.
column43: >The power of REPOP is
column51: >. With its solid stereo system, it can amplify
column59:
>of the passive speakers on the market. 

Equipped with a 4000mAh built-in battery, REPOP lasts approximately 6~8 hours for a 50W / 8 ohm speaker.  It works well with 10W ~ 100W / 4~8 ohm loudspeakers.
column64:
>

REPOP works well with all music devices: DJ sets / TVs / video game consoles / CD, DVD, BD players.

column9:
>

REPOP can also be a bluetooth music receiver .

column5:
>

Handmade
column9:
/>

Each and every REPOP is handmade. Wanting to break away from traditional design, we believe wooden products look good and harmonious in every kind of space, and it brings out a sense of warmth. So we choose to make REPOP with teak wood and handcraft skills. Jack, the craftsman with 35 years experience, used his special skills to do 45-degree embedding, and used an exclusive 8-step stacking technique to complete the box of REPOP. In addition, different from ordinary iron or wooden panels, the anodized aluminum back panel we use can dissipate heat more effectively and help the panel last longer. 

Teak
column10:
w=882"" src="""" style=""""/>

Unique in Southeast Asia, teak wood is denser and harder than general wood, with resistance to wear and tear. More importantly, teakwood naturally features lacquer and resin that has its own beauty, while protecting it from temperature changes, humidity, and other environmental factors. 

Specially, with extraordinary technique, we used residual teak wood and turned it into spliced solid wood which amazingly brought out diverse faces of beautiful wood grains. Reusing residual teak wood is also an environmentally-friendly way to produce products.

Circuit Design
column14:
>

We spent a lot of time prototyping, revising and testing. Having invested heavily into the development phase of REPOP, we need your help to get these superior sounding amplifier into pilot production.

column1: The smallest amplifier ─ a perfect size for every kind of space
How to connect with your old speaker
If you haven't got a speaker, you can choose to use MINFORT classic passive loudspeakers. It creates amazing sounds and looks great!

column5:
>Inspired by the endless blue sea and the splashing waves of Corpus Christi, Texas, MINFORT was established in Taiwan, by a group of music-loving friends who made it their mission to develop audio devices that could deliver sounds so natural and pure that audiences would immediately be immersed in an environment as atmospheric as nature.

Our goal is to craft well-designed, high-quality audio devices that are accessible to all. The MINFORT family's strong passion for designing and building authentic audio solutions for everyone is infinite. We aim to wrap high-fidelity sound, clean aesthetics and ease-of-use all inside a beautiful, sustainable wooden gear and provide you with the ultimate beauty of nature.

MINFORT design award : 2014 d&

column1: The wooden part of REPOP has been sprayed with waterproof paint, but the
electronic circuit part still has to be kept away from water. If not dropped
into a toilet or a water pool, it should be fine.
there be scars on the wood if it gets scratched?
Since it is 100% made by real wood, in the case it gets hit, or knocked against
sharp objects, there are possibilities it gets scarred.
all the REPOP products look the same?
REPOP products are made by real teak, therefore every single REPOP has its
own grains and texture and is in a class by itself.
Generally a fully charged REPOP lasts 6-8 hours. In
the case of playing music in a very low volume, possibly it can even last
6. Can I use REPOP while it is
Yes. And if you usually use it indoors, it is
recommended that you keep charging it. It will automatically stop charging
Through a 3.5mm line out jack you can connect REPOP and any active subwoofer.
As long as your speakers have two cables (oftentimes they are black and red),
or have two terminals, they are compatible with REPOP.
We've actually tested 50 kinds of speakers, and we found that unless the
speakers have a complicated internal circuit, otherwise they work with REPOP.
We've also tested floor loudspeaker by wharfedale, JBL, audio polk, YAMAHA and
they are all compatible with REPOP.
We provide an one-year warranty on REPOP. If there is a problem with your
REPOP, we suggest you to send it to the maintenance station in the states.

","【中文用戶請看我】中文贊助教學請按我｜中文產品介紹請按我A Bluetooth amplifier that is BETTER than existing ones in the market!Small, portable, and beautiful. It's not only an amplifier, but a gratifying home decor, or a device that allows you to use you speakers anywhere, including a lovely lawn under the sun. Many of the amplifiers in the current market need wired power supply, so they can't be away from cables and electrical outlets. Besides, they usually come with high price. In order to create enjoyable amplifiers that are accessible and user-friendly to all, we wanted to combine a small size, a stylish appearance, long-lasting built-in battery, bluetooth connectivity and high definition quality into our very creation. Bring your favorite speakers to life!Bluetooth speakers and amplifiers are getting common nowadays. However, our favorite speakers of all time are the old ones we bought 20 years ago. We haven't used it for quite some time, but they have been the best company of ours for more than ten years. Eventually, we decided to make an amplifier that works with our old speakers so that they can be our loyal friends again.    REPOP is the smallest wooden portable amplifier with bluetooth function. With CSR Bluetooth 4.0 Chip, REPOP supports both APT-X and AAC, and gives you wonderful sound quality. What's even more, with exclusive Pure&Sound technique, it reduces much noise and distortion.Connect any passive speaker with this exclusive multifunctional amplifier, and play music simply via bluetooth. It is compatible with all bluetooth devices: tablets, mobile phones and computers. The power of REPOP is 30W ( 15Wx2 ). With its solid stereo system, it can amplify 90% of the passive speakers on the market. Equipped with a 4000mAh built-in battery, REPOP lasts approximately 6~8 hours for a 50W / 8 ohm speaker.  It works well with 10W ~ 100W / 4~8 ohm loudspeakers.REPOP works well with all music devices: DJ sets / TVs / video game consoles / CD, DVD, BD players.
REPOP can also be a bluetooth music receiver .Banana Plugs

General CablesHandmadeEach and every REPOP is handmade. Wanting to break away from traditional design, we believe wooden products look good and harmonious in every kind of space, and it brings out a sense of warmth. So we choose to make REPOP with teak wood and handcraft skills. Jack, the craftsman with 35 years experience, used his special skills to do 45-degree embedding, and used an exclusive 8-step stacking technique to complete the box of REPOP. In addition, different from ordinary iron or wooden panels, the anodized aluminum back panel we use can dissipate heat more effectively and help the panel last longer. TeakUnique in Southeast Asia, teak wood is denser and harder than general wood, with resistance to wear and tear. More importantly, teakwood naturally features lacquer and resin that has its own beauty, while protecting it from temperature changes, humidity, and other environmental factors. Specially, with extraordinary technique, we used residual teak wood and turned it into spliced solid wood which amazingly brought out diverse faces of beautiful wood grains. Reusing residual teak wood is also an environmentally-friendly way to produce products.Circuit DesignWe spent a lot of time prototyping, revising and testing. Having invested heavily into the development phase of REPOP, we need your help to get these superior sounding amplifier into pilot production.
The smallest amplifier ─ a perfect size for every kind of space
How to connect with your old speaker

Audiophile Sound Quality For Your Smartphone, Tablet or Computer


Now On Sale at www.sonicunity.com
>ENCORE mDSD (MSRP: $99 USD, 119 EURO) USB Powered Digital-to-Analog Converter &amp
column5:
>, our third in a series of exceptional new audio components offering excellent sound quality and amazing value.

At Sonic Unity, we are passionate about music and sound quality. The ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC and high-performance headphone amplifier will bring greater realism and clarity to the music you love. 

The ENCORE mDSD is ultra-compact and connects easily to your computer or mobile device. Capable of  PCM 32/384 and DSD 256 decoding, it supports playback of high-resolution, studio master audio formats.
column6:
>The ENCORE mDSD from Sonic Unity is the most capable, compatible and convenient USB powered DAC available on the market today!

The ENCORE mDSD DAC outperforms anything in its price class and compares favorably to digital-to-analog converters and headphone amplifiers costing significantly more. It provides the listener with truly full-range sound with commanding bass and an impressive full-frequency response. The improvement in sound quality is easy to hear.

column1: • Discrete USB audio receiver and D/A converter
Asynchronous transfer mode for doubled jitter-reduction at data input and over-sampling filter stages
Optical output (shared with 3.5mm headphone out) capable of S/PDIF and DoP stream
USB powered, no external power supply required.  It can be powered directly by mobile phones USB port.

column2: above with OTG), iOS (with camera adapter USB cable), Windows 7/8/10, and Mac.  Windows device driver download is required, other devices do not need driver.

column1: This product does not include any accessory.  An Android OTG cable can be purchased online for as low as $2 and it connects between the Android device and Encore mDSD.  The Apple USB Camera Adapter cable is used to connect iOS device to Encore mDSD.  PC and Mac have USB port for mDSD to connect directly without any cable.

column2: >The ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC from Sonic Unity can play your high-resolution, studio-master recordings without an external battery or power supply.

column1: Many low cost portable DACs can only decode up to 24-bit/96kHz PCM and do not support DSD decoding. The ENCORE mDSD is
column2:
> capable of decoding sample rates ranging from 44.1kHz to 384kHz (PCM) as well as native DSD decoding ranging from DSD 64 up to DSD 256, making it the most capable USB-powered portable DAC on the market today! 

The ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC plugs directly into your computer's USB port replacing the built-in sound card with audiophile-grade output, instantly improving the sound quality of your music collection.

Android phone using USB Audio Player Pro app to decode native DSD128 file sending DoP stream to Encore mDSD
column3:
/>

The ENCORE mDSD is compatible with a wide range of devices -- Apple computers and iOS devices, including iPhones and iPads, all PCs and many Android devices.

It can drive many headphones with ease including some top audiophile brands. Of course our own ENCORE RockMaster on-ear and in-ear headphones are an excellent match for a killer combo that won't cost a fortune!

The ENCORE mDSD packs more technology into a USB powered DAC than any similar device and is compatible with computers, tablets and smartphones.

The ENCORE mDSD is the smallest high performance USB DAC available on the market today. Measuring just 2 - 3/8"" x 1 - 3/16"" x 3/8"" the ENCORE mDSD can travel easily in your pocket, backpack or briefcase. 

With a USB cable that connects to your iOS device or Android, it's a great way to get improved sound quality from your smartphone or tablet.
column4: >The ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC can connect easily your iPhone or Android device with a USB cable bypassing
column5: > the standard internal DAC on the phone, thereby instantly delivering audiophile
column6: > sound to any smartphone or tablet.
column7:
>

If you've only listened to music through your existing computer sound card or the built-in DAC in your iOS or Android device, you will find this USB powered external DAC an unmistakable improvement in sound quality. If you have an older external DAC that can only decode 24-bit/96kHz PCM, the ENCORE mDSD will allow you to hear and feel more of your favorite music. The superior sound will provide a definite upgrade to your listening experience.
column8:
> 

The ENCORE mDSD has been designed by NuPrime Audio, designer and manufacturer of some of the best audio products available on the market today. NuPrime has been awarded four, 2015 - Product Of The Year Awards from The Absolute Sound and SoundStage! Network, an unheard-of achievement in high-end audio.
column9: >Together with the award winning design team at NuPrime, Sonic Unity is proud to present the ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC. It's guaranteed to provide you with the very best in sound quality. NuPrime has the accolades to back up this claim.
column10:
>

We want you to offer you audiophile sound quality and allow you to enjoy your music the way it was meant to be heard.

Review
""...Unlike other USB DAC sticks though the Encore mDSD decodes at fantastically high rates including 32-bit/384kHz PCM and native DSD 256 decoding which puts it out there almost in a league of its own in terms of future proofing and reproduction capability compared to the other mere mortal sticks in the market... ""
""...Power and control is also equally impressive. Noise is absent on highly sensitive IEMs and there is enough power for most mid-tier and modern planars to sound excellent and in the case of planars pretty good for the price. The Ether C hates thin signatures and this isn’t one of them...""

column1: Read more at http://headfonics.com/2016/02/the-encore-mdsd-by-sonic-unity/
Introducing Celsus Sound SP One speaker: Spacious sound stage, commanding bass, exemplary coherence and musicality

The SP One's enclosure is made of a dense, premium-quality, naturally finished bamboo. The carbon-fiber woofer, featuring an aluminum wave guide, nicely complements the cabinet's sophisticated styling. Indeed, the speaker is even better looking hands-on than in the photo. 
We feel quite safe in claiming that this is the best speaker in our experience costing less than $1000 / pair. When the SP One goes on sale at the end of March, 2016, it will list at $649. To sweeten the deal we are including it as a perk to this project at a 30% discount -- a remarkable value not to be passed up.
Additional high resolution photos can be see here: https://goo.gl/photos/Ro9JxLy47K7tTHv99

NuPrime WR-100 AllPlay receiver is now bundled with SP One free of charge (we can't change the Perk's description)
The WR-100 is a hi-resolution (24-bit/96kHz) wireless and wired (with ethernet port) audio receiver that can be used to stream local, network (NAS, DLNA server) or online music (Spotify, etc) to multiple WR-100 throughout the home WiFi network. WR-100 can also accept analog input from your turntable or old iPod for streaming. You can connect the output of WR-100 to active speakers such as the Celsus Sound SP One, or to your existing audio components, including home theater receivers.
Note about OEM 600X earphones Perks - it was featured in our previous campaign ""Encore Headphones""

Sonic Unity was formed in early 2015 as a collaboration between a group of music lovers, audio experts, musicians, and audiophiles. Our aim was to offer the best possible sound regardless of price -- products that offer the listener a true high-end audio listening experience.

Together with their manufacturing partners, Sonic Unity CEO Rick Hopkins and development partner Jason Lim have created a worldwide on-line store, dedicated to offering unique high-quality audio products and unique portable audio devices.

With a background in music, concert design, consumer and pro audio, Rick's experience and passion for sound reproduction, is unique. As a designer, Rick has created concert events for Bryan Adams, Rush, Van Halen, Spinal Tap, Rod Stewart and The Rolling Stones. He has provided planning and site management for music festivals such as Lollapalooza featuring acts such as Primus, Alice in Chains, Tool, Rage Against the Machine, The Smashing Pumpkins, and Green Day. Rick has also worked with architect Mark Fisher, designer for U2, Genesis, Pink Floyd, The Rolling Stones and many others.

Jason Lim is an established audio industry leader who co-founded NuForce and served as its CEO from 2004 to 2013. Jason and NuForce have been featured in Forbes magazine as well as Wired, Stereophile, c|net, The New York Times, The Absolute Sound, Hi-Fi+ and Sound and Vision. Serving as CEO of NuPrime Audio, Jason has led the company to four Product Of The Year Awards in 2015, achieving a new record in the high-end audio industry.

column2: >Among the top awards that Jason gathered over the years were:
>Four Product Of The Year Awards for 2015 from The Absolute Sound and SoundStage! Network.
>Two Editors Choice Awards for earphones by Wired magazine, with one being awarded the ""Best Under $50""
>Two Power Amp Of The Year Awards from audiophile magazines in the USA and Japan

column1: With a proven track record developing high-fidelity audio products, Jason Lim has the industry experience to deliver the products as promised.

Sonic Unity, together with our development team, brings new high-performance audio products to market through crowdfunding and social media campaigns. We invite you to share in our goal of providing superior sounding, high quality audio products that perform well above their price point, to a greater number of people.

With our team of audiophiles and our experienced manufacturing partner, we have what it takes to make this happen! Our combined experience designing award winning audio products has resulted in numerous audio awards and industry accolades.

As our second crowdfunding project and third audio product introduced through Indiegogo, we have the experience not only to create this exceptional audio product but to deliver your new USB powered DAC in a timely fashion. Our new and improved distribution team will be able to deliver your mDSD to your door as promised once complete. Count on it!
Production will begin in late Feburary with the first units shipping at the end of March. We are very confident with the production schedule being on time.

Encore mDSD will be produced by NuPrime's factory in Taiwan and shipped by postal mail to customers worldwide. The risks and challenges are minimal. We already have several working samples created. Research and development has been completed. All we need now is your support and you can own one of the most compact, highest performing USB powered DACs ever designed.
The ENCORE mDSD USB powered DAC and headphone amplifier PCB.

We need your help. Tell your friends about us. Share us on Facebook, Pinterest, Instagram, Twitter and other social media. Post on reddit and other audio forums like Head-Fi and Headphonics. Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out and let people know about this great new product.
Help us reach our stretched goal of $45,000 and everyone will get a free earphones of our choosing: either 600X (see wired.com review) or ID Bullet Black (see photo here).

Visit the Sonic Unity on-line store and sign up for our newsletter. We will keep you informed every step of the way throughout the manufacturing process as well as about new products. You will be among the first to hear about what we have planned next.
Interested? Sign up and tell your friends about us. There is more to come!
What we have to offer is outstanding value but we can't depend on marketing dollars to get us there. Lend us a hand and together we can create a truly remarkable products that anyone can afford.
Excellent sound quality. Affordable pricing. That's what we have to offer.

column3:
/>

Listening to your favorite music on a pair of incredible speakers is a transformative experience. That's why we created the ESSENCE, to bring that amazing feeling to as many people as possible. It's the world's best desktop speaker system, the only truly high-end computer speaker system, and the smallest high-end speaker system in the world. It's already receiving awards and accolades from the toughest critics in the audio press. See the reviews below! 

If you love quality audio and use your computer to listen to music, watch films, or play games, your search for the ultimate sound system is over! The ESSENCE is the perfect choice if you use the desktop apps of Spotify, Tidal, Apple Music, or other popular music streaming services, or have a large music collection on your harddrive. Best of all, it's plug-and-play, so even if you've never used a high-end audio product before, you'll be up and running in minutes.

The ESSENCE is a cost-no-object design, without compromises. The sophisticated engineering is all encompassing, with every component part of a greater whole. The results speak for themselves, and it's easy to see why we say that it's more like a precision instrument than a traditional speaker:

For no more than a Phantom 4 drone or mid-level DSLR, you'll get one of the most advanced speaker systems in the world, a beautiful product which will have a huge impact on your enjoyment of music and quality of life. It's packed with state-of-the-art electronics, superb engineering, has amazing quality, and will bring you many, many years of enjoyment.

 

More than just being about a product, the ESSENCE is about bringing quality audio back into mainstream eyes, about enabling listeners to hear their music like never before. The ESSENCE is a #QualityRevolution!

Watch Youtube channel Hardwarecanuck's video review below (over 75,000 views!) - ""I didn't think I'd be satisfied with any set of speakers, until now... deliver an absolutely fantastic listening experience."" And yes, we've contacted 3M and the rubber feet issue has now been resolved.

column1: The ESSENCE is being hailed by the audio press as the world's best computer speaker system and a standout product heralding the future of audio. It's a beautiful, incredible product for audiophiles, music lovers, film buffs, gamers, or anyone who loves high quality audio. The ESSENCE represents the best of the best in loudspeaker engineering and design, leveraging sophisticated methods and techniques, a coaxial driver, resonance-free die-cast aluminium cabinet, and the finest components to drastically miniaturize the high-end experience.

It's almost hard to believe how many advanced features have been packed into such a compact form, making the ESSENCE the ideal sound system for computers, televisions, turntables, and for use in small recording studios. Beautiful and compact, it features:
in-house developed 4.5"" coaxial driver for superior stereo imaging
integrated 24-bit/96kHz DAC custom designed for the ESSENCE, based around the latest ESS Sabre DAC chip technology
• three-panel die-cast aluminium cabinet, held together internally under immense pressure with stainless steel bolts to eliminate resonances, an industry-first concept
• audiophile-quality amplified headphone stage for late night listening
• designed and assembled by hand in Switzerland

An obsessive attention to detail and an innovative modular assembly system ensure that craftsmanship is second to none. With the exception of a few screws, every component is custom designed and manufactured exclusively for the ESSENCE or not available off-the-shelf.
Less than 20cm tall and just 12cm wide, the ESSENCE is:
• a work of art for the eyes, ears, and soul
• the smallest genuinely high-end speaker system in the world
• the first high-end computer speaker system in the world designed from the outset for this very purpose. It's not just a retrofit of a traditional, over-sized MDF speaker
• in a review by popular audiophile website 6moons received the rare Blue Moon Award and was called the “world’s best computer speaker system”.

You won't find a speaker system of similar quality and functionality for anywhere near the price of the ESSENCE. Before we decided to do a Kickstarter campaign, we looked into the traditional distributor sales model, but the high margins would have required setting the price at close to $3000, not a good option for our customers. Thanks to e-commerce, we can now offer them for half that!

With USB, Toslink, and analog inputs, the ESSENCE is far from being just a computer speaker system, even though that's what we set out to design. It's an incredibly versatile system ideal for a wide range of devices.
• asynchronous USB for amazing quality and plug-and-play operation on any Windows or Mac computer
• can also use with an Apple USB Camera Adapter (iPhone/iPad) or OTG adapter (Android 5.0+) to play music from your phone
• the system automatically enters and wakes from standby when you turn off your computer or put it to sleep
• Televisions which have an Optical audio out
• Bluetooth receivers which have an Optical audio out
• many other digital devices such as CD players
• the system automatically enters and wakes from standby when you turn your digital device on or off
• RCA/AUX inputs for phono stages for an awesome compact turntable system
• the analog and digital signals in the Essence run in parallel, meaning the analog signal is never digitized for a pure analog experience, so you can also use an external DAC with no loss of quality

Today, the highest audio quality possible is from computers. Surprising as it sounds, it's the truth, and explains why most audio companies now use computers and lossless audio files to demonstrate their products at audio shows. Which is great news, because today, more than ever before, many of us spend our days in front of a computer. And often, we listen to music when we do. Now, with the ESSENCE, you no longer have to sacrifice sound quality as a result.

For true fans of music and films, few things beat out the experience of listening on a pair of really great speakers. Speakers vibrate the air and your body in a way no headphone ever could. For those who want the ultimate desktop sound quality, there is no better option than the ESSENCE. It's a true high end product, designed with a purist approach, aiming for the highest levels of sonic quality, and using the highest quality components.

More than one person has remarked that listening to their favorite music through the ESSENCE is like hearing it for the first time. It'll transport you to a different world of newfound clarity. Whether you see it as an amazing computer speaker, or simply an impossibly small high-end monitor, reviews confirm that the ESSENCE is the real deal, setting new paradigms for a speaker of this size and price.
The Essence is 3x smaller than any other high-end speaker system on the market. State-of-the-art electronics play their part, but the real secret is preservation of energy. Here's how.

The cabinet: Most speakers have an MDF cabinet. MDF is an inexpensive, relatively soft material which acts like a sponge. It eats energy, softening and deadening the sound. The Essence, in contrast, has a thick die-cast aluminium cabinet, far more expensive than MDF, but it doesn't swallow energy. Like all metals, however, aluminium has a tendency to ring, which is why most aluminium cabinets from other manufacturers are not successful. To counteract this trait, in the Essence the panels are locked together with a complex series of grooves, then tightened under immense forces with stainless steel bolts that run the length of the cabinet, essentially turning the cabinet into one solid, inert block free of resonances. This preserves all the positives of an aluminium cabinet, with none of the negatives. Combined, these two unique attributes are very difficult and expensive to make, but result in the exceptional clarity the Essence is becoming known for.

The driver: The coaxial driver also plays its part. Besides the superior stereo imaging inherent to a coaxial driver, it has an extremely light moving mass of just 4.5 grams, which is less than half the weight typical for a 4.5"" driver. You can't beat physics, and just like a small, light car can change direction quicker than a heavier car, a light moving mass results in sound that is far quicker, livelier, and more engaging. Combine that with the inert cabinet, and you start to understand why the Essence is so special and why it sounds so powerful despite its small size.

It's hard to argue that this isn't the most important aspect of a speaker, so the audio performance of the Essence has been our primary focus and driving force from the start. It's also the aspect we're most proud of.

The sound quality of the Essence turns everyone's heads, whether they've never heard a high-end system before or are an audiophile veteran who's heard everything. The greatest skeptic is convinced the moment they hear them. They're that good, something multiple audio critics have confirmed in their reviews.

In short, they sound fantastic, with a powerful, dynamic presentation, and superb stereo imaging. The way the sound is spread between the speakers is almost holographic. Listeners particularly praise the incredible clarity and speed of the sound. The purity of the sound takes the breath away.

The Essence has a very rich, clear midrange, so vocals, horns, and guitars are particularly impressive. A local female vocalist told us she has never heard herself sound as good, and as realistic, as on the Essence.
Bass is quick, tight, and rhythmic, not mushy and boomy like many other speakers. They have what is often referred to as the ""jump factor"".

It's the sound quality of the Essence that most turns heads during demonstrations, and as good as they are as a home or office system, they are also ideally suited as compact studio monitors due to the neutrality and pureness of the sound.
• auto standby/wake function so once you choose an input, you almost never have to press a button again
• top-mounted volume wheel with a Teflon washer for buttery-smooth operation

• the cabinet is entirely die-cast aluminium and composed of a total of three interlocking panels that go together in a unique fully modular assembly method called Feniks Modular Assembly System (FMAS)
• a system of grooves which run along all joints and tension rods across the length of the cabinet acoustically seal and lock the entire cabinet to form one solid inert block free from resonances
• in-house developed 4.5"" coaxial driver for point-source stereo imaging and breathtaking time coherence, resulting in powerful dynamics unheard of for speakers of this size
• designed and assembled by hand in Switzerland

The standard speaker cable is 1.8 meters long. A 3.0 meter cable is available by request. 
The Essence is CE-certified.
The Essence is available in 8 visually striking and unique two-tone color combinations.
Front panel: durable matte powder-coating in black or white
Side panel: glossy powder-coating in black, white, blue, or red
$1449 (~$150 off the future SFr 1599 retail price) - Free worldwide shipping included!

Feniks was founded with the aim of providing the best listening experience and exceptional quality to as many customers as possible without compromises. With the shifts in listening habits over the past decade away from traditional hi-fi to computers and all-in-one devices, true not just among general consumers but audiophiles, too, a regular speaker made no sense at all. The same was true with us. We spent hours each day on the computer working, watching YouTube and movies, and listening to music. Problem was there was no high quality computer speaker available on the market so you had to settle between either generic plastic junk or spring for a pair of high-end monitors and the associated electronics (not ideal anyway as they’re designed for farfield listening). So we decided we had to do it ourselves, and Feniks was born.

The Essence, with an internal 24-bit/96kHz DAC, is the latest generation of this concept, and it’s the only high-end computer speaker system designed from the ground up to be a computer speaker system. Putting a DAC into a traditional large bookshelf speaker, as the “competition” has tried, does not a computer speaker make. More than just that, however, the Essence is the most compact high-end speaker available today, period. If you want truly stellar performance in a small package or have limited space, there is no better speaker on the market for you.
The Essence is the result of over two years of development, thousands of man hours, and 15 prototypes, to get to where we are today.
column2: >We set out to design an extremely thorough and mature product, both in terms of design and technology.
>An internal DAC was a must.
column3: >It was also essential that it be both superior to preceding technologies while still being efficient to manufacture, so a die-cast aluminium cabinet was chosen, using a special grade, low resonance alloy. One of the huge benefits of die-casting is that every piece is identical to within a few microns, giving us far more control over the final outcome and quality.

column1: After the design was more or less complete, we proceeded to the prototype stage. These were made using a method called sand casting, wherein an expensive one-off mold is made. It's the same method Ferrari uses to cast their engine blocks.
After further adjustments, molds were ordered, with one mold for each panel (six in total). The molds costs over $10,000 each and weigh many tons.

The speakers you see in the photos are among 12 preproduction samples made. They're made using the same die-cast molds that will be used to manufacture the production versions you will receive, and are therefore nearly identical to the final product.

The Essence is packed with industry-first innovations aimed at making the best sounding speaker possible, and it's not value engineered to reach a target price: this is a superbly engineered cost-no-object precision machine with every visible surface made from metal.
• Each speaker cabinet consists of just 3 thick aluminium precision die-cast panels made of a special low resonance aluminium alloy.

• The side panel is clamped between the front and rear panel using threaded stainless steel tension rods, interlocking with each other thanks to a system of grooves which run along the entire length of the joints.

• The immense pressure under which the rods are tightened bonds the panels together, almost as if they were one solid block. The panels stay under continuous compression, further eliminating unwanted resonances.
• Internal ribs not only reinforce the panels, but their irregular placement eliminates resonances at different frequencies.
• The thick panels work as radiators for the electronics inside.

• In the Essence, each component serves as part of a whole, all being bolted one after another to the front panel, which in turn is sandwiched between the driver basket and external grill ring, forming a 14mm thick front panel.
• We call the modular nature of this system the Feniks Modular Assembly System, or FMAS.

• The bass ports, integrated into the casts of the side panels, are different lengths in the right and left channels, thus covering different frequencies. The foot panel below acts to extend the length of the port.

• In most speakers the bass port is tuned to add volume to the bass, usually creating a distorted ""boom"" at a specific frequency. In the Essence the port serves to extend the low frequencies, thereby giving a more balanced, clean, and natural sound.

The 4.5"" custom-designed coaxial driver of the Essence is the heart of the system. A coaxial driver is the ideal choice for a nearfield computer system as it guarantees a point-source sound, meaning superior stereo imaging. A coaxial driver is also less sensitive to proper placement because you don't need to match the alignment of multiple drivers.
• Rigid die-cast aluminum basket, aerodynamic to minimize rearward reflections
• Combination of a very light cellulose membrane (moving mass of only 4.5g) and powerful neodymium magnets ensures high efficiency and awesome dynamic range
• High power handling due to large 32mm voice coil and Kapton™ voice coil former
• Integrated high quality passive crossover, made exclusively with audiophile grade components such as air core inductors and PP caps

Feniks is the incredibly passionate father and son team of Ted and Robert Kwolek, an ideal combination of an engineer and a designer. We've always been obsessed with quality and the best of the best, and that's translated into everything we do at Feniks. We love music and films, and strongly believe that everyone deserves to hear their favorite tracks in the best possible way, without compromises.
We're based in the Canton of Schaffhausen in Switzerland, known around the world as the home of renowned watchmaker IWC.

column2: >As amazing as the Essence is, we hit a roadblock: the steep margins of high-end audio distributors and dealers. This industry is not geared for selling products to the masses. Rather, it aims for low-volume yet high margin products, where a single sale can net a distributor and dealer thousands of dollars. Did you know a high-end audio manufacturer only gets about a third of the retail price? The result, plain to see across the industry, is increasingly high prices and little interest in fair pricing. This situation doesn’t leave much room for comparatively inexpensive yet exceptionally innovative and high-quality products like the Essence, and goes completely against our original aim of getting great quality to as many customers as possible.

column1: The industry was pushing us to set a US MSRP at close to $3000. Are they worth it? Compared to other products on the market with similarly high margins, absolutely yes, but a price like that closes the door on the every day music lover we most want to reach. It would transform our product from something an enthusiast can afford to a luxury product for the 1%. That’s not what we want, hence why we did a Kickstarter campaign. By offering direct sales to you, our fans and customers, we're giving you a chance to purchase the Essence at half price, and worldwide shipping is included! Did we mention they’re actually assembled by hand in Switzerland? It’s the only way to maintain strict control over our exacting standards.

We believe that everyone deserves to experience the highest fidelity sound in the comfort of their own home. If you want the best desktop listening experience in the world, and appreciate the beautiful design and bulletproof construction, look no further than the Essence. You’ll get to experience some of the best stereo imaging on the market, a pure clear sound that rivals the best of the best at any price, and a fantastic DAC and headphone amp to boot. Let it enable you to enjoy your music and films more than you ever have before. Reviews confirm that the Essence is the real deal: don’t miss your chance to back the “world’s best computer speaker system”.

It's been a long and hard road to get to where we are now and bring the Essence into reality, and we're incredibly proud of what we've achieved as underdogs in this industry. But we need your support to get to the next step and bring the Essence into production and into the hands of lovers of true quality.
More than anything that's what we believe the Essence is about, a vote for true quality, craftsmanship, and beauty.
Join the #QualityRevolution and support our project. Thank you.
Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter for more updates!

With the Essence, we set out to make a timeless classic, focusing heavily on making bulletproof build quality so that they will bring you many years of enjoyment. Wireless standards are constantly changing, so we didn't want such a high quality product to have an aspect which could become obsolete in a short period of time (even the best current Bluetooth standard, aptX, is limited to only 352kbps, not enough for a lossless FLAC file such as TIDAL provides, let alone 24-bit).

We recommend using a relatively inexpensive Bluetooth receiver with an Optical audio out (so that you still take advantage of the excellent DAC). This way when wireless technologies improve down the road, you only need to replace the inexpensive receiver, not the whole system.
However, you'll get the best quality from your phone by using an Apple Camera Connection Kit (iPhone/iPad) or OTG adapter (Android), which allows your phone to be plugged into the USB input.
An incredible desktop experience was our primary aim in developing the Essence, so it was a priority for the top-mounted volume wheel to be a delight to use.

For the best sound quality, we chose to use an analog preamp (a preamp prepares the signal for the amplifier). With an analog preamp, we would have had to use a motorized potentiometer for remote functionality, which would greatly increase the resistance of the wheel and no longer would it be buttery-smooth.

Compromises are always a part of a design, especially with an advanced product like the Essence. This is one of those compromises we felt was the right one, and part of what makes the Essence the ultimate desktop sound system.
Yes! The user guide is in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, and Simplified Chinese.
The Essence is now shipping to backers! See more of the assembly process here.
