Each speaker cabinet consists of just 3 thick aluminium precision die-cast panels made of a special low resonance aluminium alloy.

The side panel is clamped between the front and rear panel using threaded stainless steel tension rods, interlocking with each other thanks to a system of grooves which run along the entire length of the joints.

The immense pressure under which the rods are tightened bonds the panels together, almost as if they were one solid block. The panels stay under continuous compression, further eliminating unwanted resonances.
Internal ribs not only reinforce the panels, but their irregular placement eliminates resonances at different frequencies.
The thick panels work as radiators for the electronics inside.

In the Essence, each component serves as part of a whole, all being bolted one after another to the front panel, which in turn is sandwiched between the driver basket and external grill ring, forming a 14mm thick front panel.
We call the modular nature of this system the Feniks Modular Assembly System, or FMAS.

The bass ports, integrated into the casts of the side panels, are different lengths in the right and left channels, thus covering different frequencies. The foot panel below acts to extend the length of the port.

In most speakers the bass port is tuned to add volume to the bass, usually creating a distorted ""boom"" at a specific frequency. In the Essence the port serves to extend the low frequencies, thereby giving a more balanced, clean, and natural sound.

The 4.5"" custom-designed coaxial driver of the Essence is the heart of the system. A coaxial driver is the ideal choice for a nearfield computer system as it guarantees a point-source sound, meaning superior stereo imaging. A coaxial driver is also less sensitive to proper placement because you don't need to match the alignment of multiple drivers.
Rigid die-cast aluminum basket, aerodynamic to minimize rearward reflections
Combination of a very light cellulose membrane (moving mass of only 4.5g) and powerful neodymium magnets ensures high efficiency and awesome dynamic range
High power handling due to large 32mm voice coil and Kapton™ voice coil former
Integrated high quality passive crossover, made exclusively with audiophile grade components such as air core inductors and PP caps
Pro grade gold plated connector terminals

Feniks is the incredibly passionate father and son team of Ted and Robert Kwolek, an ideal combination of an engineer and a designer. We've always been obsessed with quality and the best of the best, and that's translated into everything we do at Feniks. We love music and films, and strongly believe that everyone deserves to hear their favorite tracks in the best possible way, without compromises.
We're based in the Canton of Schaffhausen in Switzerland, known around the world as the home of renowned watchmaker IWC.

As amazing as the Essence is, we hit a roadblock: the steep margins of high-end audio distributors and dealers. This industry is not geared for selling products to the masses. Rather, it aims for low-volume yet high margin products, where a single sale can net a distributor and dealer thousands of dollars. Did you know a high-end audio manufacturer only gets about a third of the retail price? The result, plain to see across the industry, is increasingly high prices and little interest in fair pricing. This situation doesn’t leave much room for comparatively inexpensive yet exceptionally innovative and high-quality products like the Essence, and goes completely against our original aim of getting great quality to as many customers as possible.

The industry was pushing us to set a US MSRP at close to $3000. Are they worth it? Compared to other products on the market with similarly high margins, absolutely yes, but a price like that closes the door on the every day music lover we most want to reach. It would transform our product from something an enthusiast can afford to a luxury product for the 1%. That’s not what we want, hence why we did a Kickstarter campaign. By offering direct sales to you, our fans and customers, we're giving you a chance to purchase the Essence at half price, and worldwide shipping is included! Did we mention they’re actually assembled by hand in Switzerland? It’s the only way to maintain strict control over our exacting standards.

We believe that everyone deserves to experience the highest fidelity sound in the comfort of their own home. If you want the best desktop listening experience in the world, and appreciate the beautiful design and bulletproof construction, look no further than the Essence. You’ll get to experience some of the best stereo imaging on the market, a pure clear sound that rivals the best of the best at any price, and a fantastic DAC and headphone amp to boot. Let it enable you to enjoy your music and films more than you ever have before. Reviews confirm that the Essence is the real deal: don’t miss your chance to back the “world’s best computer speaker system”.

It's been a long and hard road to get to where we are now and bring the Essence into reality, and we're incredibly proud of what we've achieved as underdogs in this industry. But we need your support to get to the next step and bring the Essence into production and into the hands of lovers of true quality.
More than anything that's what we believe the Essence is about, a vote for true quality, craftsmanship, and beauty.
Join the #QualityRevolution and support our project. Thank you.
Follow us on Facebook, Instagram and Twitter for more updates!

With the Essence, we set out to make a timeless classic, focusing heavily on making bulletproof build quality so that they will bring you many years of enjoyment. Wireless standards are constantly changing, so we didn't want such a high quality product to have an aspect which could become obsolete in a short period of time (even the best current Bluetooth standard, aptX, is limited to only 352kbps, not enough for a lossless FLAC file such as TIDAL provides, let alone 24-bit).

We recommend using a relatively inexpensive Bluetooth receiver with an Optical audio out (so that you still take advantage of the excellent DAC). This way when wireless technologies improve down the road, you only need to replace the inexpensive receiver, not the whole system.
However, you'll get the best quality from your phone by using an Apple Camera Connection Kit (iPhone/iPad) or OTG adapter (Android), which allows your phone to be plugged into the USB input.
An incredible desktop experience was our primary aim in developing the Essence, so it was a priority for the top-mounted volume wheel to be a delight to use.

For the best sound quality, we chose to use an analog preamp (a preamp prepares the signal for the amplifier). With an analog preamp, we would have had to use a motorized potentiometer for remote functionality, which would greatly increase the resistance of the wheel and no longer would it be buttery-smooth.

Compromises are always a part of a design, especially with an advanced product like the Essence. This is one of those compromises we felt was the right one, and part of what makes the Essence the ultimate desktop sound system.
Yes! The user guide is in English, German, French, Italian, Spanish, and Simplified Chinese.
The Essence is now shipping to backers! See more of the assembly process here.",61.0,3,"1 Campaign

The Fuse Vert is a premium vertical vinyl audio system  which can also play FM radio, stream  songs via Bluetooth, USB MP3's, Alarm Clock, Line in and Line out. We took the plain record player and flipped it up into a beautiful mid century modern style audio player. Visually a head turner and audibly a stunner.  

By taking cues from Mid Century Modern Design, the Fuse Vert took the plain record player and flipped it up. The Vert showcases your favorite vinyl records in pure form with the record spinning  vertically. A unique design while still maintaining a premium high-quality sound.

A smooth grained hardwood that has a durable aesthetically beautiful finish. The Ashtree wood veneer is gracefully wrapped around a MDF box. Ashtree complements mid-century modern style to its finest. 

 

PLAY

With no extra set-up needed to play, it's simple enough for everyone to enjoy. This means first-time vinyl listeners are able to use it as easily and efficiently as record enthusiasts!

You can connect the Vert to your external speaker system, or use the built-in speakers on its own as a standalone audio player.

The Vert has the following playback options

Vinyl Records - 3 speeds

Bluetooth to stream from your smartphone

FM Radio

USB memory stick for MP3s

Aux In - 3.5mm line in

A ceramic cartridge with diamond needle, fine tuned for an amazing playback on the Vert.  It's Dual Channel (Stereo), frequency range of 80-10000Hz with Channel balance of <
column2:
3dB. The ceramic cartridge provides a rich mid end and beautiful upper range sound.

OPTIONAL Upgrade - The Audio Technica AT3600L cartridge is one of the world's best selling needle cartridges. The needle is a Conical Styli with a Bonded Round Shank. Stereo Dual Moving Magnet, frequency of 20 to 20,000Hz with Channel balance of 2dB. It provides a warm bass and balanced sound through the upper mid range. 

Perfectly balanced and counter weighted tone arm allows for the record to be played in a vertical position without wobbling from side to side. Each tone arm is dynamically adjusted to ensure the tracking force is applied at the correct weight (4g) without damaging your favorite records. This sets a steady sound even when the vinyl has a wobble preventing anti-skating. 

Ashtree Wood Base 

Auto Balanced and Weighted Tone-Arm w/ dynamically set tracking force 

Standard: Ceramic Cartridge Diamond Needle ( Optional: Audio Technica At3600L Needle Cartridge)

Two 2” 8 Ohm 5 Watt Full-Range Stereo Speakers 

Manual Belt-Drive System (78, 45, or 33 1/3 RPM) 

11"" ABS Platter

Bluetooth 4.1 Connectivity

FM Radio with Preset Stations

RCA Line Out 

Aux In 

Alarm Clock

Universal AC to DC power supply compatible with standard 50/60 Hz, 100-240 V 

14” Wide x 9” Deep x 15” Tall 

7 lbs. 

Vibration Damping Feet

1. Fuse Vert Vertical Audio Player (Ashtree Veneer Base) 

2. Record Clamp (78, 45 &
column3:
33 1/3 RPM)

3. Aux In 3.5mm Cable

4. A/C Adapter 

The Fuse Vert will ship from our facility located in Los Angeles, California. Each system will be carefully packaged and insulated with foam. 

United States: $25. Package will be sent via UPS Ground for 1-5 day delivery once shipped.

Canada: $55. Package will be sent via UPS/DHL Worldwide for 2-5 day delivery once shipped. Local taxes/duties may apply. 

Rest of the World: $85. Package will be sent via UPS/DHL Worldwide for delivery. Local taxes/duties may apply.

We believe that the best way to fund causes is by harnessing the power of business. We are launching a campaign to raise funds to set up a social enterprise called Beat Cancer which sells noise cancelling, Bluetooth, wireless headphones and all profits are used to fund cancer research.  

We have priced the headphones at under $100 ($99.95) to make them as affordable as possible. Comparable headphones sell for between $300-$550.  

We can sell high-quality headphones at this price because we don’t have the costs that other businesses do. We buy from the manufacturer, so there is no middleman, we don’t pay for advertising, we don’t have an office. The whole business runs off a laptop and a dream of a cancer-free life.  

We have no marketing budget and we are relying on word of mouth, so it would be great if you could share our campaign with your friends and family. The more people who see the campaign, the more likely we are to reach (and smash) the funding goal.  

Crowd Funding  Campaign Details  

The details of the campaign are as follows:

The headphones are available in 3 colours black, pink and red that will be released as we reach our funding goals. All pre-sales by default will be for a Black pair of Beat Cancer Founder Series Headphones. The red and pink options will become available if we can achieve pre-sales of 300 per colour. 

If we sell 300 pairs, we will generate revenue of $30,000, which will cover the $25,000 cost of the minimum order of 500 units. As soon as we reach our funding goal of $30,000 Beat Cancer comes to life! We have a second funding goal of $50,000, as this level of funding will allow us to purchase a second stock order, and we can set up a sustainable, ongoing online store. 

Once the campaign closes we expect to be mailing the headphones to you from Australia within 30 days. 

Headphone Features  

Wireless Bluetooth Acoustic Noise Cancelling

Compatible with different phones – iPhone and Android     

Suitable for various environments: Aeroplane, tram, train and noisy office. 

Transmission distance - 10m 

Chord and connectors for use on an aeroplane

Charging port – USB 

Standby time – 120 Hours 

Talking time – 18 Hours 

Playing time – 10 Hours (with ANC on) 

Charging time – 3 Hours 

Battery type - Built-in 600mah rechargeable lithium battery 

Certification - CE,FCC,ROHS UN38.3 600mAh 

High-quality rechargeable Lithium battery

Benefits 

These are some of the benefits to pledging today:

- We will place you on our Register of Founders that will live forever live stapled to the company's constitution.  

- You get a pair of BEAT Cancer founder series headphones. After the campaign, the founder series will never be sold again.  

- You get to play a key role in bringing our business to life, a business with the power to change the world. We give you additional choice by empowering you to choose what happens with the profits from your purchases. 

Which charities receive the profits from Beat Cancer Headphones? You can help decide!

Our strategy is to partner with a number of charities over time. We will aim to partner with a single charity for a fixed period that aligns to the charity's main fundraising efforts and give them the profits from  Beat Cancer that are earned in the period.
 
Here are  a few examples that we have identified:
 
Cancer Council Daffodil Day
It would be great to partner with the Cancer Council for Daffodil Day. We would donate all profits for August and September. We could also consider creating a special yellow pair of headphones for the campaign!
 
McGrath Foundation Pink Test
We would love to partner with the McGrath Foundation for the Pink Test and donate all the profits for Beat Cancer for January. We think our pink headphones tie in really well with the Pink Test.  
 
Olivia Newton-John Cancer Wellness and Research Center
We could partner with the Olivia Newton-John Cancer Wellness and Research Center during Run Melbourne or The Wellness Walk &
column2:
Research Run and donate the profits for the months in which these events are held. Given Olivia Newton-John’s relationship with the music industry, we see some great synergies with Beat Cancer Headphones.

Before the campaign, we approached many charities about forming a partnership, however, as many charities are extremely time poor and that just two weeks ago Beat Cancer was just a dream, we have had little response. As we get closer and closer to making Beat Cancer a reality (we are about 60 pairs away from making this happen) and our ability to make donations grows stronger we expect that it will be easier to form relationships with charities.
 
You can help decide who receives our profits
As we are still looking for partners, you can play a key role in deciding who receives our profits. If you have a charity that means a lot to you and you can connect us with their ‘fundraising decision maker’ CEO  et cetera we would love to talk to you about setting up a relationship where we donate our profits to the charity during their main fundraising period.
 
Please let me know if you have any questions.

Make the world what you want it to be!

#PurposeGeneration

0,"

 

 

Muve (in PowerPlus case)

Graphene is layered in a honeycomb-like pattern that are made up of sheet of carbon atoms. It is considered to be the most thinnest conductive material that produces wider range of sound experience and also it prevents from undesirable frequency response without dampening the material.

Long hours of earphone wear can cause discomfort and irritability. Muve earbud, weighing only at 0.1 oz, allows the user to experience all-day comfort and freedom. In addition, its innovative design features customized to fit each individual’s unique ear shape.
The size is smaller than a penny coin.

Designed with high sensitivity touch sensors, you can easily control Muve with simple gestures. No more uncomfortable pressure brought by pushing buttons, and no more worry about water leaking into the button seams.

Muve is not only perfect for on the go, but it is also designed to fit an active lifestyle with its sweat resistant and waterproof technology. The hydrophobic nano-coating will keep moisture away, whether it is sweat, rain, or snow.

The earbuds have IPX7 waterproof rating, meaning it can be immersed into one-meter deep water for half an hour without any leakage, mechanical or functional damage. It is the highest rating in all earphone crowdfunding campaigns.
Strong magnetic base keep your earbuds from losing. Thanks for the clever mechanical design, it is simple and easy to take the earbuds out of case by hand.

Recharge your battery on the go with the portable charging case, featuring a built-in 2600mAh battery which allows you to give 18 to 20 additional charges to your muve earbuds for up to 100 hours of music playtime. It can also be the backup battery as your smartphone, and can charge an iPhone X to 65%.
The PowerPlus case is sold separately as an add-on item.
Targeting at the top tier functions, specifications and user experience, Muve sits on the price which no other brands can compete with - Unfortunately, the price is for our Indiegogo backers only.
We want to be the most efficient crowdfunding campaigner by fulfilling your contributions in a month. We need your support to make the project successful.

We already ran small batch productions, in order to test and verify the product is ready for mass production with stable quality and consistent output. Please order soon so you can enjoy the earliest shipping!

My singing career started at the age of 16.  Having grown up in a musical family, I was heavily influenced by the American roots music my dad played to me as a child and he subsequently helped my sister and I form our Birmingham based family band The Toy Hearts during the early 2000s.

column2: >The Toy Hearts - The Captain (Official Video) - Directed &

column1: Throughout my fifteen-year career with ‘The Toy Hearts’ the trio’s accolades include touring the length and breadth of the UK, Ireland, Europe and USA.  The band have opened for prestigious acts such as Robert Plant, Imelda May, Chris Thile, Kitty, Daisy &
column2: Lewis, Ricky Skaggs, Tim O’Brien, Peter Rowan and Gene Watson to name but a few.

column1: I am a graduated alumni of  ‘The International Bluegrass Music Association’s, Leadership Bluegrass Program’, which I was selected for in 2009 and travelled to Nashville, Tennessee to proudly participate in.  The Toy Hearts received significant national press over the years, recorded live sessions for BBC Radio 2 and can count among their fans Ronnie Wood, Robert Plant and BBC broadcasting veteran Bob Harris.

column2: >Photography by CBR Photography

column1: I'm currently using indiegogo to raise funds towards the costs involved in finishing &
column2: releasing a CD as an independent artist.  I am so, so thrilled to finally be making my debut, full length studio album, 'Shaken'.  Although based in Birmingham, UK I have been visiting Austin, Texas regularly since 2008.  Working with engineer/producer Cris Burns during December 2016 at Ameripolitan Studios ATX, we recorded 11 tracks in total with 3 original songs and 8 covers by artists who have inspired me throughout the years.  Such covers include works by Patsy Cline, Willie Nelson, Cindy Walker, Charlie Patton, Skeets McDonald and Roger Miller.  My aim is to have the album completed by the beginning of June 2017, with it's official release scheduled for July 2017.  This solo record is so very special to me and it's completion will fulfil a life long ambition if we can make it happen! The magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve is hard to articulate but believe me when I assure you that I have and will continue to work my ass off to make a killer first record...

column1: As you can imagine, there are a whole host of different costs involved in making an album as an independent artist.  Below is what I hope you will find to be a transparent approximation of the finances I have to consider in making/releasing/marketing 'Shaken'.

Although some of these fees have already been paid by myself 100% OF THE MONEY PLEDGED will be put towards my remaining, outstanding costs.  If, by chance, I raise more than my target of £4K ALL of the proceeds shall  be utilised to help promote the album, both physically and digitally.

column2: >YOU CAN MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE AND HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT ARTISTRY!
>Please check out my list of rewards and perks on the righthand margin <strong>----------&gt
>If any of these unique perks appeal to you

column1: I want you to know just how much difference as a valuable contributor you will make to the artistic integrity of this project...
<li>Without wading in the quagmire of debate about what is and what defines ‘Americana Music’, Hannah Johnson &amp
column2: The Broken Hearts seek to reveal the music that used to be called ‘COUNTRY’ in the impassioned era of Honky Tonk: when musicians sought only to play the best music possible and get folks up dancing!  My material is a celebration of Honky Tonk, classic ‘old’ country, western swing, blues and standards with original songs written in these genres... This is rare for a UK artist!

column1: • Although this will be my sixth album, I have never before sought 'crowd funding' of any type, although I have myself pledged for artists who I respect and admire.  After discussing it at length with my family and friends, I am both hopeful and positive that it IS possible to get financial baking from people who've supported me over the years and believe in me today.  Could that be you? ​

column2: >Any contribution you attribute will make A HUGE DIFFERENCE TO ME

column1: I completely understand and appreciate that some people are simply not in a financial position to contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

• You can aid me through making some noise about my campaign, by simply sharing links to social media sites, blogs and websites... Most importantly, you can help me hugely through spreading my news to your family and friends  through word of mouth... This makes a massive difference!
• You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to link people directly to my fundraising page.
I want to sincerely thank-you for reading about my story and journey... It means the world to me.
column2:
>Let's do this people!

Sincerely, Hannah x

","WHO AM I?

column1: My singing career started at the age of 16.  Having grown up in a musical family, I was heavily influenced by the American roots music my dad played to me as a child and he subsequently helped my sister and I form our Birmingham based family band The Toy Hearts during the early 2000s.
The Toy Hearts - The Captain (Official Video) - Directed & Edited by Gabe Crozier

Throughout my fifteen-year career with ‘The Toy Hearts’ the trio’s accolades include touring the length and breadth of the UK, Ireland, Europe and USA.  The band have opened for prestigious acts such as Robert Plant, Imelda May, Chris Thile, Kitty, Daisy & Lewis, Ricky Skaggs, Tim O’Brien, Peter Rowan and Gene Watson to name but a few.
The Toy Hearts - Femme Fatale (Official Video) - Directed & Edited by James Cumpsty

I am a graduated alumni of  ‘The International Bluegrass Music Association’s, Leadership Bluegrass Program’, which I was selected for in 2009 and travelled to Nashville, Tennessee to proudly participate in.  The Toy Hearts received significant national press over the years, recorded live sessions for BBC Radio 2 and can count among their fans Ronnie Wood, Robert Plant and BBC broadcasting veteran Bob Harris.

I'm currently using indiegogo to raise funds towards the costs involved in finishing & releasing a CD as an independent artist.  I am so, so thrilled to finally be making my debut, full length studio album, 'Shaken'.  Although based in Birmingham, UK I have been visiting Austin, Texas regularly since 2008.  Working with engineer/producer Cris Burns during December 2016 at Ameripolitan Studios ATX, we recorded 11 tracks in total with 3 original songs and 8 covers by artists who have inspired me throughout the years.  Such covers include works by Patsy Cline, Willie Nelson, Cindy Walker, Charlie Patton, Skeets McDonald and Roger Miller.  My aim is to have the album completed by the beginning of June 2017, with it's official release scheduled for July 2017.  This solo record is so very special to me and it's completion will fulfil a life long ambition if we can make it happen! The magnitude of what contributors will help me achieve is hard to articulate but believe me when I assure you that I have and will continue to work my ass off to make a killer first record...

As you can imagine, there are a whole host of different costs involved in making an album as an independent artist.  Below is what I hope you will find to be a transparent approximation of the finances I have to consider in making/releasing/marketing 'Shaken'.
RECORDING, EDITING & MIXING AT THE RECORDING STUDIO - £2000.00
PACKAGING AND DUPLICATION OF x1000 CDS - £1000.00
PACKAGING AND DUPLICATION OF x500 VINYL - £1250.00

Although some of these fees have already been paid by myself 100% OF THE MONEY PLEDGED will be put towards my remaining, outstanding costs.  If, by chance, I raise more than my target of £4K ALL of the proceeds shall  be utilised to help promote the album, both physically and digitally.
YOU CAN MAKE A HUGE DIFFERENCE AND HELP SUPPORT INDEPENDENT ARTISTRY!
Please check out my list of rewards and perks on the righthand margin ---------->
If any of these unique perks appeal to you
YOU CAN MAKE A HUGE IMPACT!
I want you to know just how much difference as a valuable contributor you will make to the artistic integrity of this project...

Without wading in the quagmire of debate about what is and what defines ‘Americana Music’, Hannah Johnson & The Broken Hearts seek to reveal the music that used to be called ‘COUNTRY’ in the impassioned era of Honky Tonk: when musicians sought only to play the best music possible and get folks up dancing!  My material is a celebration of Honky Tonk, classic ‘old’ country, western swing, blues and standards with original songs written in these genres... This is rare for a UK artist!

Although this will be my sixth album, I have never before sought 'crowd funding' of any type, although I have myself pledged for artists who I respect and admire.  After discussing it at length with my family and friends, I am both hopeful and positive that it IS possible to get financial baking from people who've supported me over the years and believe in me today.  Could that be you? ​
Any contribution you attribute will make A HUGE DIFFERENCE TO ME
I completely understand and appreciate that some people are simply not in a financial position to contribute monetarily, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

You can aid me through making some noise about my campaign, by simply sharing links to social media sites, blogs and websites... Most importantly, you can help me hugely through spreading my news to your family and friends  through word of mouth... This makes a massive difference!
You can also use the Indiegogo share tools to link people directly to my fundraising page.

I want to sincerely thank-you for reading about my story and journey... It means the world to me.  Let's do this people!Sincerely, Hannah xLINKS:Website: www.hjbrokenhearts.comFacebook: www.facebook.com/hannahjohnsonandthebrokenheartsTwiiter: www.twitter.com/hjbrokenheartsInstagram: www.instagram.com/hjbrokenhearts YouTube: www.youtube.com/hjbrokenhearts",1.0,2,"1 Campaign

column1: INJECTION MOLDS:  We need molds made so we can manufacter them here in the USA.

We have sourced the best parts and materials we could find. Everything from the speakers to the material the shells are made from are exponentially more expensive than other brands in this price range. But how? We can do this because of two reasons. 1. We don't have dozens of employee's. 2. We aren't greedy.

The Boom 10's are based on higher end models that have removable earbuds. They do this because most of the cost are in the earbud its self.  We have taken it one step further and added a bluetooth set giving you more freedom.

They're made from a unique material that acts as rubber but is really a plastic.  This gives the product flexibility and characteristics not matched by other brands who use conventional hard plastics.
We import the parts needed, and manufacture the shells in our warehouse. They are designed and assembled in Orange County Ca. For now, and ever.
1. Go to your phones bluetooth settings tab and hit scan.
2. With the bluetooth control turned off, hold the middle button until pairing name appears.
For any other questions please email info@rawwheadphones.com
We will reply in less than 24hrs.

This is a product years in the making,  hundreds of hours of work and finally in the final phase of production. Not an Idea that may or may not work.  We are already making final productions units, its up to you on how many we are able to make.

By far the most challenging step was to design and make all the necessary tools needed to in-house manufacture the parts ourselves instead of relying on  manufactures.  This gives us ultimate control when it comes to cost, quality, and color options.

We need your help to make sure BC5 is the best we know it can be.

The Bicoastal Collective was formed in 2007 and in that time has released four critically acclaimed albums with Origin Arts/OA2 records . The Bicoastal Collective is co-led by Aaron Lington and Paul Tynan.

BC5 is recorded and sounds amazing, but we need your help in finishing it up. It's a full big band recording and well pulled out all the stops. It was recorded by Kent Stump at Crystal Clear in Dallas, mastered by the legendary Phil Bulla at Platinum Production in NYC, and was co-produced with Stockton Helbing
column2: BC5 features some of the best musicians from all across North America.

column1: We need your help with costs associated with post-production, art direction, release fee, and marketing.  We are aiming for a June 2017 release.
BC5 marks a high point for us
column2: we're going to push this as far as we can.

column1: Our release costs with OA2 will run us $3500, this includes art direction, radio/review mail-outs, publicity, liner notes, and final post productions costs.
Saxes -Bobby Selvaggio, Steve Jones, Dave Lown, Marcus Wolfe, Aaron Lington
Trumpets - Jason Levi, Ken Edwards, Daniel Matthews, Micah Bell, Paul Tynan
Trombones - Paul Compton, Carl Lundgren, Alex Dubrov, Josh Brown
Rhythm - Noel Johnston, Josh Hanlon, Mike Luzecky, Stockton Helbing
$15 – Digital Download and Public Thanks by Aaron and Paul on Facebook.
$25 – Hard copy of BC5, DDL, and FB thanks
$40 – HC, DDL, FB thanks, One additional CD from Paul or Aaron’s discography (we pick)
$75 – HC, DDL, FB thanks, Three additional CDs from Paul or Aaron’s discography (we pick)
$100 – HC, DDL, FB thanks, Hard Copies of BC 1,2,3 and 4. + PDF of one score from BC5. You pick the score at a later date.

$150 - HC, DDL, FB thanks, Paul or Aaron will compose a song for you and send you the lead sheet. You will be listed as the commissioner of the piece. You pick the composer (Aaron or Paul) and get to give the piece its title.
$250 – HC, DDL, FB thanks, PDF copies of all eight scores from BC5.
$500 – HC, DDL, FB Thanks, Full set of Scores and Parts from BC5, Personal Thank you in the liner notes of CD.
$1000 – HC, DDL, FB thanks, Full set of Scores and Parts from BC5, and Listed as Executive Producer in the Liner Notes of CD.

If we don't reach our entire goal - BC5 will still go ahead. We'll adjust our budget and keep on keeping on. However, reaching this goal will allow us to help this fantastic record realize its full potential.

If you can't contribute, you can still help! You can help us get the word out and make some noise for us! Every bit helps. Share this campaign's link on Facebook, Twitter and other social media outlets.

Inventor of the technology and the product Honeycomb Broadband Antenna. Provisional patent applied for in October 11, 2011

After being forced to retire as a result of arthritis, I found out that being 49 years old with a medical condition made it impossible to find work. I am just not willing to give up, I have allot to offer the world. I believe in this project so much that I have put my money where my mouth is. I draw $109 a week in unemployment, I live on P&
column2: J. I work hard everyday to make advances to the technology and to make connections to further the product. I spend time to do patent searches and market research. I can only offer one guarantee and that is no one will work harder than me to make this happen.

column1: When the thought of combining two brand new technology's together came to me, I never thought that this new technology would change the way antennas are made. This new technology is rewriting the laws of physics in regards to antennas. The first series of antennas were the size of a silver dollar, as I further researched the technology. The antennas got very tiny without losing any integrity. Imagine this, I developed an antenna the size of a cigarette butt able to receive digital and analog channels from as far as 100 miles away. A cell phone antenna the size of a dime able to receive 3G to 6G's for the
column2:
title=""Powered by Text-Enhance"">phones of the future. It will do away with the external automobile antennas and allow your car not only the ability to get AM/FM but to turn your car into a Wi-Fi hot spot.

At this stage we are in the final prototyping stage of the HDTV series and mid way through the Automobile prototyping series. Currently we are starting into the design and development of this new technology for
column3:
title=""Powered by Text-Enhance"">cell phones. Provisional and utility patents have been filed for the early stage products. Our plan is to be in the market as early as 2014. This project has a world market, crossing the boundaries of Residential, Commercial and Military uses. We have already began to make connections in the retail and automotive markets, and will be establishing connections in overseas manufacturing  as well retail markets.

Funding for this project will be used for advanced testing equipment to advance the technology. It is my hope to someday to have a lab to explore all the different uses of the technology.

column1: With your help we can advance this new technology.We have a manufacturing prototype ready and will be looking for manufacturers.

Entering the Market

The key element in W. P. Spencer, LLC strategy is to license its technology to manufacturing companies, both national and international. Once research data and publicity have been generated, the sales force will step in to encourage the initial investment in the Honeycomb Broadband Antenna, creating a ""demand push."" After this investment has been made, a ""demand pull"" will be generated for manufacturing companies
column2: title=""Powered by Text-Enhance"">to begin production. The sales team will begin with six seasoned sales personnel and swell to forty members by Year 5. The sales team will work closely with the manufacturers in order to promote the technology in the world market.

","Wilburn.Spencer Owner | C.E.O
Inventor of the technology and the product Honeycomb Broadband Antenna. Provisional patent applied for in October 11, 2011

After being forced to retire as a result of arthritis, I found out that being 49 years old with a medical condition made it impossible to find work. I am just not willing to give up, I have allot to offer the world. I believe in this project so much that I have put my money where my mouth is. I draw $109 a week in unemployment, I live on P&J. I work hard everyday to make advances to the technology and to make connections to further the product. I spend time to do patent searches and market research. I can only offer one guarantee and that is no one will work harder than me to make this happen.

When the thought of combining two brand new technology's together came to me, I never thought that this new technology would change the way antennas are made. This new technology is rewriting the laws of physics in regards to antennas. The first series of antennas were the size of a silver dollar, as I further researched the technology. The antennas got very tiny without losing any integrity. Imagine this, I developed an antenna the size of a cigarette butt able to receive digital and analog channels from as far as 100 miles away. A cell phone antenna the size of a dime able to receive 3G to 6G's for the phones of the future. It will do away with the external automobile antennas and allow your car not only the ability to get AM/FM but to turn your car into a Wi-Fi hot spot. At this stage we are in the final prototyping stage of the HDTV series and mid way through the Automobile prototyping series. Currently we are starting into the design and development of this new technology for cell phones. Provisional and utility patents have been filed for the early stage products. Our plan is to be in the market as early as 2014. This project has a world market, crossing the boundaries of Residential, Commercial and Military uses. We have already began to make connections in the retail and automotive markets, and will be establishing connections in overseas manufacturing  as well retail markets. Funding for this project will be used for advanced testing equipment to advance the technology. It is my hope to someday to have a lab to explore all the different uses of the technology.
With your help we can advance this new technology.We have a manufacturing prototype ready and will be looking for manufacturers.

Entering the Market The key element in W. P. Spencer, LLC strategy is to license its technology to manufacturing companies, both national and international. Once research data and publicity have been generated, the sales force will step in to encourage the initial investment in the Honeycomb Broadband Antenna, creating a ""demand push."" After this investment has been made, a ""demand pull"" will be generated for manufacturing companies to begin production. The sales team will begin with six seasoned sales personnel and swell to forty members by Year 5. The sales team will work closely with the manufacturers in order to promote the technology in the world market.
John Waszczak PhD SBIR Phase Zero government grant. John retired from Raytheon's Titan cruse Missal Program as director.
Richard W. Ziolkowski PhD University of Arizona Science Dept. Technology validation.
Brian Harlow Attorney at Law, Brian is our Business attorney.
For a full business plan visit our website

[Note: aftershokz.com ships orders in North America only.]

The power of the AfterShokz brand lies in a single key concept: be open. Yes, we're talking about headphones here. It's about your safety. It's about serious comfort. And, most importantly, staying connected—from your music to your moments—without compromise.

open ear listening experience is our patented bone conduction technology.  We've been in this business for years now. We know the benefits and we're all too familiar with the challenges. That's why we're confident in saying we've mastered the solution to bring you powerful, dynamic audio without the traditional limitations.

Trekz Titanium™ use bone conduction technology to transmit audio waves to the inner ears through the skull, bypassing the eardrums completely. Place them on your cheekbones, just in front of your ears. This leaves your ear canals open, allowing you to remain alert and aware of ambient sounds while you enjoy your music or tune in to calls.
You'll have complete control of your music and calls right from the
unit, so you can keep mobile devices safely tucked away during use.
Excellent question. For those of you not familiar with bone conduction, it's actually a natural part of the hearing process, as sound already travels through our eardrums and bones simultaneously.

You can help put the finishing touches on Trekz Titanium™ before we launch. After several months of tooling and molding, then testing and tweaks, we're ready to move on to build our golden sample. Your support will take us through trial production and into mass production on schedule!

It goes without saying that our team is AWESOME. Since our inception in 2011, AfterShokz has been committed to innovating unconventionally and making situational awareness a priority. We span the globe, reaching from East Syracuse, New York, all the way to Shenzhen, China, joined together in a mission: to enhance lives through our technology.
Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?
If you are in the U.S, Canada, Hong Kong or China,

When we're close to shipping we will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to specify your color choice and confirm your shipping address.
What do I do if I've changed my mind and would like a refund?

column2: but if you're willing to share your reasoning and allow us a chance to keep you as part of our community, please let us know here. Otherwise, the Indiegogo Support team handles all refund requests. Contributors can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign deadline, for prompt processing of all such requests. column1: <u><b>What types of mobile devices will Trekz Titanium™ work
Bluetooth® v4.0 and is compatible with all iOS and Android Bluetooth-ready
devices, such as smartphones, tablets, Mac and PC computers and laptops.
Standard pairing will vary per your mobile device.
Yes, Trekz Titanium™ does support multipoint. You will be able to be connect your Trekz to two different devices simultaneously.
be dust, sweat and water resistant to handle the wear of everyday use of
rigorous workouts and wicked weather. Trekz Titanium™ is safe for use during
post workout activities, such as saunas and steam rooms, though we recommend
you dry off excess moisture prior to storage in the included zipper case. Trekz Titanium™ are not recommended to be worn swimming or in the shower.
them over your ears with the headband wrapping behind the back of your head, creating a secure fit.

The frame of the headband is made of memory alloy with titanium as the main ingredient. Memory alloy allows large shape change (flexibility) while maintaining the original shape when force is removed. During deformation, memory alloy actually goes through a phase change which is what allows the elastic deformation to be reversible.
Can Trekz Titanium™ be worn with eyeglasses, sunglasses
prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses, we recommend putting on your Trekz
Titanium™ first, then slipping your glasses into place. You’ll notice the
titanium band is quite flexible and will adjust easily into proper position on
your cheekbones. For use with a helmet, simply shift the headband down, below
the bottom edge of the helmet.

column2: >How long will the Trekz Titanium™ battery last?

column1: Trekz Titanium™ is equipped with a r
column2: >echargeable lithium ion battery that delivers six (6) hours of continuous play

column1: (replenish charge completely in 1.5 hours). You are also able use your Trekz Titanium™ while simultaneously charging them.

Each Trekz Titanium™ is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. You simply plug your headphones into a USB port in your computer or wall via the micro-USB charging cable and your unit will be fully charged in under two hours.
What's the wireless range of Trekz Titanium™?

column2: >eliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft (10m).

column1: Can bone conducted sound cause hearing loss?

No. In fact, that's a key benefit of bone conduction headphones! We don't have a medical professional on staff, but we did research the concept. Here's the professional opinion of an M.D. from the largest ENT comprehensive care provider in the New York tri-state area:
""Unlike conventional headphones, bone conduction headphones have an inherent volume limit which should reduce noise related hearing loss.
column2: >This technology also keeps the ear canals open, which makes it ideal for sports requiring heightened situational awareness, such as cycling or running.""

column1: ENT and Allergy Associates, LLP |
Is bone conduction technology a solution for someone with hearing loss?
Yes and no. Trekz are not intended to be used as a hearing aid
column2: however, they are a solution for some people with hearing loss (depending on where the damage is in the ear) to play music and make/take calls.

column1: What colors does Trekz Titanium™ come in?
To start, Trekz Titanium™ will be produced in Ocean (Blue/Black), Ivy (Green/Black), and Slate (Grey/Black). Additional colors are planned for 2016.
What are the specifications for the activity belt?
The adjustable activity belt holds large smartphones (up to iPhone 6 Plus &
column2: Samsung Galaxy S6), keys, cash, ID/credit cards, passports &amp
column3: other small personal items. The comfortable band fits securely &amp
column4: prevents chafing and bouncing. It fits waist size 25""-47"" (63.5cm – 119.4cm), pocket expands to 8″×4″x 2"" (20.3cm-10.2cm-5.1cm).

column1: How can I reach out to your team directly?

We love connecting with our customers, so if you'd like to reach someone on our team directly, please drop us a note. Be sure to include your phone number in your note if you'd like to speak with someone urgently.
We offer a hassle-free two-year warranty with all AfterShokz headphones. To submit a warranty claim, simply fill out this form and our friendly Customer Service team will be in touch to help.
AfterShokz will provide a 90-day money back guarantee to all Indiegogo backers. Please contact support@aftershokz.com if you are not completely satisfied with your Trekz Titanium™ headphones.

Where can I find my unique referral code?
First, make sure you're logged in to
Indiegogo (your name will appear on the upper right corner of the page). Then
use any of the buttons that appear to the left of the video. You'll see a several digit code at the end of the
link (which is different for everyone), and that's your unique code!
How can I check to see how many people I've referred?
Sign in on Indiegogo, and click on
your name above the search box at the top right of the page. Click ""My
Profile"" from the drop-down menu, then click on the “Referrals” tab to see
totals of your referrals and contributions that resulted from your sharing!
When will I receive my referral incentive?
We'll add up the all of your referrals at the end of the
campaign, and anyone who has successfully referred others to buy Trekz Titanium™ will
be contacted via email to confirm total earned as well as your shipping address.

functioning prototype with technology that far exceeds any other product we’ve
developed in the past. We’re confident that Trekz Titanium™ will be produced with the highest quality
We are committed to keeping our campaign transparent and will
openly communicate with our supporters on our project, as well as any obstacles
We are preparing for future challenges that could impact our
planned production timeline, including minor adjustments that might be made
during production to improve the final product. We will prepare for any delays
this may cause in order to deliver the best quality product with a timely
Our priority is to deliver a product that will exceed your
expectations to those who support us and believe in us. We’re so grateful for
you and promise to provide you with the best version of this revolutionary
","[Note: aftershokz.com ships orders in North America only.]

The power of the AfterShokz brand lies in a single key concept: be open. Yes, we're talking about headphones here. It's about your safety. It's about serious comfort. And, most importantly, staying connected—from your music to your moments—without compromise.

open ear listening experience is our patented bone conduction technology.  We've been in this business for years now. We know the benefits and we're all too familiar with the challenges. That's why we're confident in saying we've mastered the solution to bring you powerful, dynamic audio without the traditional limitations.

Trekz Titanium™ use bone conduction technology to transmit audio waves to the inner ears through the skull, bypassing the eardrums completely. Place them on your cheekbones, just in front of your ears. This leaves your ear canals open, allowing you to remain alert and aware of ambient sounds while you enjoy your music or tune in to calls.
You'll have complete control of your music and calls right from the
unit, so you can keep mobile devices safely tucked away during use.
Excellent question. For those of you not familiar with bone conduction, it's actually a natural part of the hearing process, as sound already travels through our eardrums and bones simultaneously.

You can help put the finishing touches on Trekz Titanium™ before we launch. After several months of tooling and molding, then testing and tweaks, we're ready to move on to build our golden sample. Your support will take us through trial production and into mass production on schedule!

It goes without saying that our team is AWESOME. Since our inception in 2011, AfterShokz has been committed to innovating unconventionally and making situational awareness a priority. We span the globe, reaching from East Syracuse, New York, all the way to Shenzhen, China, joined together in a mission: to enhance lives through our technology.
Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?
If you are in the U.S, Canada, Hong Kong or China, shipping is FREE. For shipping to the rest of the world, costs are included as line items within associated perks.
How will my Trekz Titanium™ be shipped?

In the U.S. and Canada, shipping will be handled via the U.S. Postal Service. International shipments will depend on region, but AfterShokz has distribution partners worldwide set up to accommodate all of our backers.
How will I know when my Trekz Titanium™ has shipped?
You will receive an email with a tracking number when your Trekz Titanium™ ships.

In the U.S., Canada, Hong Kong or China: once a shipping confirmation is sent, you should receive your package in 3-5 business days. International backers can expect to receive packages within 4-7 business days. Expedited shipping is not available through our Indiegogo campaign.
How do I choose my color and verify my shipping address?
When we're close to shipping we will ask you to fill out a form where you will be able to specify your color choice and confirm your shipping address.
What do I do if I've changed my mind and would like a refund?

column2: but if you're willing to share your reasoning and allow us a chance to keep you as part of our community, please let us know here. Otherwise, the Indiegogo Support team handles all refund requests. Contributors can contact support@indiegogo.com directly, before the campaign deadline, for prompt processing of all such requests. [Note: Should our campaign enter InDemand, the Indiegogo Support team can also process refund requests made within 10 days of the contribution.]

column1: What types of mobile devices will Trekz Titanium™ work
Bluetooth® v4.0 and is compatible with all iOS and Android Bluetooth-ready
devices, such as smartphones, tablets, Mac and PC computers and laptops.
Standard pairing will vary per your mobile device.
Yes, Trekz Titanium™ does support multipoint. You will be able to be connect your Trekz to two different devices simultaneously.
No. Trekz Titanium™ is designed to
be dust, sweat and water resistant to handle the wear of everyday use of
rigorous workouts and wicked weather. Trekz Titanium™ is safe for use during
post workout activities, such as saunas and steam rooms, though we recommend
you dry off excess moisture prior to storage in the included zipper case. Trekz Titanium™ are not recommended to be worn swimming or in the shower.
How do I wear Trekz Titanium™?
Put Trekz Titanium™ on by curling
them over your ears with the headband wrapping behind the back of your head, creating a secure fit.
What makes Trekz Titanium™ so flexible?

The frame of the headband is made of memory alloy with titanium as the main ingredient. Memory alloy allows large shape change (flexibility) while maintaining the original shape when force is removed. During deformation, memory alloy actually goes through a phase change which is what allows the elastic deformation to be reversible.
Can Trekz Titanium™ be worn with eyeglasses, sunglasses
prescription eyeglasses or sunglasses, we recommend putting on your Trekz
Titanium™ first, then slipping your glasses into place. You’ll notice the
titanium band is quite flexible and will adjust easily into proper position on
your cheekbones. For use with a helmet, simply shift the headband down, below
the bottom edge of the helmet.
How long will the Trekz Titanium™ battery last?
Trekz Titanium™ is equipped with a rechargeable lithium ion battery that delivers six (6) hours of continuous play
(replenish charge completely in 1.5 hours). You are also able use your Trekz Titanium™ while simultaneously charging them.
How do I charge Trekz Titanium™?

Each Trekz Titanium™ is shipped with a standard micro-USB charging cable. You simply plug your headphones into a USB port in your computer or wall via the micro-USB charging cable and your unit will be fully charged in under two hours.
What's the wireless range of Trekz Titanium™?
Trekz Titanium™ will offer reliable connectivity within a wireless range of 33 ft (10m).
Can bone conducted sound cause hearing loss?

No. In fact, that's a key benefit of bone conduction headphones! We don't have a medical professional on staff, but we did research the concept. Here's the professional opinion of an M.D. from the largest ENT comprehensive care provider in the New York tri-state area:

Unlike conventional headphones, bone conduction headphones have an inherent volume limit which should reduce noise related hearing loss. This technology also keeps the ear canals open, which makes it ideal for sports requiring heightened situational awareness, such as cycling or running.""
Otology/Neurotology and Lateral Skull Base Surgery
ENT and Allergy Associates, LLP |  www.entandallergy.com
Is bone conduction technology a solution for someone with hearing loss?
Yes and no. Trekz are not intended to be used as a hearing aid
column2: however, they are a solution for some people with hearing loss (depending on where the damage is in the ear) to play music and make/take calls.

column1: What colors does Trekz Titanium™ come in?
To start, Trekz Titanium™ will be produced in Ocean (Blue/Black), Ivy (Green/Black), and Slate (Grey/Black). Additional colors are planned for 2016.
What are the specifications for the activity belt?

The adjustable activity belt holds large smartphones (up to iPhone 6 Plus & Samsung Galaxy S6), keys, cash, ID/credit cards, passports & other small personal items. The comfortable band fits securely & prevents chafing and bouncing. It fits waist size 25""-47"" (63.5cm – 119.4cm), pocket expands to 8″×4″x 2"" (20.3cm-10.2cm-5.1cm).
How can I reach out to your team directly?

We love connecting with our customers, so if you'd like to reach someone on our team directly, please drop us a note. Be sure to include your phone number in your note if you'd like to speak with someone urgently.
We offer a hassle-free two-year warranty with all AfterShokz headphones. To submit a warranty claim, simply fill out this form and our friendly Customer Service team will be in touch to help.
AfterShokz will provide a 90-day money back guarantee to all Indiegogo backers. Please contact support@aftershokz.com if you are not completely satisfied with your Trekz Titanium™ headphones.
How does your referral program work?
We want to reward you for referring
your friends and family to support Trekz Titanium™. We’ll give you $25 back
every time someone buys a Trekz Titanium™ (up to the amount of your total
Where can I find my unique referral code?
First, make sure you're logged in to
Indiegogo (your name will appear on the upper right corner of the page). Then
use any of the buttons that appear to the left of the video. You'll see a several digit code at the end of the
link (which is different for everyone), and that's your unique code!
How can I check to see how many people I've referred?
Sign in on Indiegogo, and click on
your name above the search box at the top right of the page. Click ""My
Profile"" from the drop-down menu, then click on the “Referrals” tab to see
totals of your referrals and contributions that resulted from your sharing!
When will I receive my referral incentive?
We'll add up the all of your referrals at the end of the
campaign, and anyone who has successfully referred others to buy Trekz Titanium™ will
be contacted via email to confirm total earned as well as your shipping address.
We are excited to launch our first ever crowdfunding campaign
to introduce a bone conduction product unlike anything on the market.
AfterShokz has developed a highly innovative product and fully
functioning prototype with technology that far exceeds any other product we’ve
developed in the past. We’re confident that Trekz Titanium™ will be produced with the highest quality

Your hearing capabilities are different to the other 7.4 billion people on this earth, we believe your headphones should be as well.

column2: >""They check off all my must-haves as daily drivers: wireless, great sound and excellent comfort!""

column1: Like fingerprints or DNA, each person’s ears and hearing ability are unique. So why are we currently sold a ""one size fits all"" within the headphone market?

As we use our sense of hearing everyday, our ears can become less sensitive to certain frequencies due to fatigue and damage. Important details in our music, films and games can be lost due to the resulting imbalance in our ears.
 
 
Often, people will simply turn up the volume to compensate, but the frequencies which were acceptable before could now create a sense of audio distortion, increasing the amount of listening fatigue and potentially damaging your sense of hearing even further.
Now with MyAudioSession you can immerse yourself in enriched audio which is uniquely optimized for you and without the limitation of wires.

We have licensed and integrated Aumeo Audio’s patented technology into our headphones and our mobile app, which aims to balance the user’s listening profile and enhance their audio enjoyment without the issues that volume adjustment and traditional equalizers create.

Test your ears by letting the app know when you can hear the low beeps across certain frequency ranges. The app will then sync this information with your headphones, which will then adapt to your profile, making sure you hear your music the way it was intended.

The video below demonstrates how to...
1) Easily calibrate and optimize your listening experience 
2) Pair MyAudioSession effortlessly with NFC 
3) Skip the cables and utilise QI-compatible wireless charging (charging platform included)

column1:
Hong Kong Electronics Fair

 
 
 
Here at The Audio Session we are committed to creating cutting-edge audio equipment, to give you, our community, a ground breaking musical experience and we can't wait for you to join us!
column2:
>
 
 
From humble beginnings as a Hong Kong-based company, the members of The Audio Session have been involved in the design and development of personal audio equipment with major industry leaders around the world for over 30 years.

column1: Located in Hong Kong Science Park, we are continually inspired by the state-of-the-art environment and have been regularly collaborating with local tech teams to integrate advanced wireless and audio technology with our headphones.
Launched in 2017, The Audio Session brand was created with the purpose of providing an exceptional listening experience with thoughtfully-crafted and expertly-engineered headphones.

Our latest project, MyAudioSession, aims to unite our decades of audio expertise with innovative sound-personalization technology to create an acoustically superior headphone that can enrich the user’s enjoyment of music.

As with all hardware projects, there are always risks associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. Unlike most startups and designer-centric ventures, the members of The Audio Session have already successfully brought thousands of headphones and audio hardware products to market.

With over 30 years of experience, we have built robust, long-lasting relationships with industry-leading suppliers, manufacturers and shipping partners to ensure a smooth process from design to fulfilment. We are confident in our ability to identify and mitigate any potential issues that may arise, so that we can produce and deliver MyAudioSession on time.
We are using the most advanced Bluetooth solution currently available, with an aptX-HD codec capable of 24-bit music quality.
Wireless playback time for MyAudioSession headphones is up to 30 hours. A full charge will take up to 90 minutes.
MyAudioSession headphones are compatible with QI wireless charging and will take up to 90 minutes for a full charge.
Does MyAudioSession come with a mic cable?
Yes, MyAudioSession will come with a one-button mic cable.
Where can I get the MyAudioSession app?
The MyAudioSession app will be available on the Apple Store and Google Play store. The app will be compatible with iOS and Android.
How does the personal hearing profile work?

The MyAudioSession app will provide a short hearing test for your ears by emitting beeps at specific frequencies. You will use a dial to determine when you can just barely hear the tone. After going through specific frequencies for both left and right ears, the app will calibrate a personal audio profile optimized just for you.
Will I need to do the test every time I want to use the profile?

No, your custom profile will be saved onto the headphone, so you won’t even have to open the app after unless you would like to create or apply a different hearing profile. We do recommend re-testing your hearing on a regular basis to ensure the most accurate, optimized profile.
Why do I need a personalized profile? Doesn’t an equalizer do the same thing?

While modern equalizers can perform functions that seem similar on the surface, MyAudioSession completely tailors your listening experience by enhancing your audio profile based on actual clinical trials and calibrating a 15-band- per-ear result superior to standard EQs.
Can I use my personalized hearing profile without Bluetooth?
Currently, your personalized profile can only be used with Bluetooth. When using an audio cable, the personal hearing profile will be inactive.
What content can I use the personal hearing profile for?
Whether it be music, calls, or Youtube videos, the personalized hearing profile will enhance the sound through the headphone.
Do you support AAC for Apple devices?
Will the personalized hearing profile work if I have severe hearing loss?
The personalized hearing profile can improve your audio experience but is not meant to be a substitute for hearing aids.
All our perks will come with FREE SHIPPING. You will be responsible for paying import duties or taxes, if applicable, in your country or state.
Do MyAudioSession headphones come with a warranty?

MyAudioSession headphones come with a 30-day money back guarantee – be it comfort or sound, we will provide a full refund if there is anything you don’t like about the headphone. After 30 days, we will repair or replace any defective units at no cost for up to a year following delivery.
I have a question that’s not listed
Give us a shout at cs@theaudiosession.com if you have any additional questions or just drop a question into the comments section!

column5: >The world's first Hi-Fi Spatial Audio headphones.
column7:
>

 

CAPE Rebellion is here to revolutionize the way you listen. Enjoy the most realistic sound experience with Spatial audio and Spatial-active noise cancelling technology. The detailed sound, extra accurate sound location, expanded sound eld, and consistent high quality sound, which will make truly, the most epic listening experience you will ever have.
column17:
>Music: Experience music in a whole new way

You haven’t truly experienced your music until you’ve experienced it with spatial audio. Rebellion Headphones create a high quality audio experience so immersive and customizable you must try it to believe it.

column1: Put yourself in the middle of your movies and shows with a surround sound home theater experience that you can take anywhere.

column2: >VR: Truly inhabit your VR or video games

column1: Accurate sound orientation immerses you in the world of your game, improving your reaction time and giving you an advantage over your opponents. Ordinary gaming and VR headphones are big and bulky. After wearing them for a while, you begin to feel tired and uncomfortable. CAPE Rebellion headphones on the other hand are ultra-lightweight and utilize an amazing heat radiating system to keep you cool, comfortable, and playing all day. VR might be the future of gaming, but CAPE Rebellion headphones are the future of VR.
Ergonomic on-ear design and powerful noise cancelling technology allows you to focus on your work, not your surrounds.

column2:
>Travel: Take them with you wherever you go

Our headphones are light, comfortable, and can hold a charge for up to fifteen hours making them perfect for trips or all day wearing. With wireless mode, you can enjoy CAPE's CD-Like quality sound for fifteen hours. Even when it runs out of battery, you can also switch to CAPE's wired mode to continue listening.
column4:
>Relax yourself: Calm your mind.

Listen to the 3D music when you are on bed. Immersive and spatially accurate 3D recordings can help you to relax and make sure you sleep soundly.

column1: Fun: Create your own spatial music with the 3D app.
Have fun and be creative composing beautiful melodies that surround you.
column4:
> 

Transform 2D audio into a 3-dimensional sphere of sound. Rebellion creates a beautiful environment of sound in which your audio comes at you from every direction, even behind you. This creates a listening experience like you enjoy in the real world, but have never before heard on headphones.
column7:
>

You will never have to sacrifice audio quality for wireless convenience ever again. Rebellion brings you the best audio quality through your smartphone, allowing you to enjoy wireless music with CD audio quality.  This results in a new level of wireless audio quality.
column8:
>

Don’t let noisy crowds or howling winds interrupt your important phone calls ever again. HD Voice Calling and digital noise cancellation take care of this problem, allowing you to converse in a noise free environment.
column10:
>

             

You can wear your headphones in comfort all day long thanks to the Rebellion’s thoughtful design. The tuned clamping force means your headphones will stay secure while only creating the lightest necessary pressure on your ears. The ear cup design funnels heat away from your ears to the thermoconductive outer shell of the headphones where it dissipates into the air. Hypoallergenic bicast leather cushions are smooth and soft for velvety ear-cradling goodness. You will be cool and comfortable for all day listening.
column11:
/>

 

At CAPE, we never compromising, and we don’t think you should have to either. That’s why all of our materials and designs have been hand-picked and tuned by expert craftsmen and leading audio experts.
column13:
>

Rebellion headphones are hands free and easy to use, so you can go about your daily tasks while enjoying beautiful spatial audio.
column14:
> 

While the CAPE App is available only to CAPE Rebellion Headphone users, it is compatible with both Android and IOS devices. 
-Download and install THE CAPE APP on your compatible iPhone or android smartphone.
-Put on the CAPE Rebellion headphones.
-Power up the headphones.
-Import music and adjust the listening point to create the perfect spatial audio effect.
column17:
>

Rebellion Headphones use a 3D Digital Signal Processor chip and reverberation algorithms to create a three dimensional soundstage. This gives you the powerful, immersive experience of listening in a surround sound theater. The experience is increased by the Head Related Transfer Function that transforms two dimensional audio into a 360 degree sphere of sound. By combining the DSP chip and HRTF technology, you get to enjoy the immersive three spatial sound effect of a home theater wherever and whenever you want.
column18:
>Acoustic chamber design

Lose yourself in the vastness of sound. The Acoustic Chamber is the very best platform for Spatial Audio or 3D Audio. A trademarked honeycomb design and ergonomically angled speakers combine to create the largest eld of sound possible.
column19:
>Digital-adaptive noise cancelling

 

Never be distracted again. ANC is able to reduce background noise by up to 27dB. The system that CAPE Rebellion headphones uses is called “real-time noise canceling,” because it interprets the background noise as it hits you and neutralizes it with the existing sound waves of your audio. In this way, your Spatial Audio experience is not diminished by annoying “white noise.” All you will hear is the very best audio quality.
column20:
>Accurate and balanced sound

 

Using audio adjusting and digital balancing, CAPE Rebellion headphones deliver the highest fidelity audio experience. The system improves upon traditional coil arrangements by buffering the voice coil, keeping it from vibrating against the inside of the speakers, giving you only the purest sound.
column21:
>

Minimalist, with no superfluous features, CAPE Headphones look sleek and elegant. Not only will you enjoy the very best personal audio experience, you will look stylish while you do it.
column23:
>Lights up your CAPE with vibrant laser

CAPE has been upgraded to laser breathing light logo version. The laser breathing light logo will make CAPE Rebellion look even more fantastic than before! Please check the video for the laser breathing light logo version CAPE you will receive.
column25: >
column26:
>

CAPE is a hardware and software solutions brand that focuses on spatial audio technology research, 3D spatial audio equipment, and acoustic algorithm development. CAPE’s research and development team is made up of engineers from Foxconn, IBM and other Fortune 500 companies. More importantly, we are bunch of audiophiles who want to bring the beauty of spatial audio to the world. We look forward to sharing our passion with you.

COOLHEAR is an electro-acoustic, technology oriented high-end brand that serves customers globally by providing spatial audio effect solutions. Fields that we work in include 3D music recording and play, 3D gaming and sound effects, 3D audio field interactive products, holographic sound eld dubbing, 3D TV audio effects, and next generation smart home audio.
column27: >
column28:
>

If CAPE Rebellion didn’t achieve its crowdfunding goal would we get the product? 

Yes. Even if CAPE Rebellion headphones does not achieve its crowdfunding goal, we would still deliver the Rebellion headphone to every backer. We are grateful for everyone who has faith in us. Moreover, we have 100% confidence that Rebellion will be in mass production so there is no need to worry about it.

 

Shipping Questions：

When can I expect it to be shipped?

The first batch of CAPE for campaign backers is expected to ship around November 2016. We will keep campaign contributors updated with our progress on a regular basis.

 

How much does the package weigh?

CAPE:    9.17oz (260g)

Cables：0.88oz（25g）

Packaging：7.97oz (226g)

 

Are there any countries you cannot ship to?

Yes, unfortunately, we are not able to ship to Croatia, Iraq and Guadeloupe.

 

Product Questions: 

Can I use Rebellion headphones to watch movies or play VR games? 

Yes. Rebellion headphones can play all the front ends and sound sources including Dolby atmos, DTS:X or Ambeo 3D. Also, Rebellion 3D is compatible with all the players and VR platforms/ wearable devices including Oculus. 

 

How is the audio quality? 

Rebellion headphones’ audio is very balanced, producing a great sound experience. Every CAPE has been manually adjusted by audio masters, every one!

 

What is the difference between Rebellion about other active noise cancelling headphone? 

Rebellion headphones’ adaptive noise cancelling technology can expand the headphone’s field of sound, eliminate noise without making you feel dizzy, and clean the noise floor. As well, there is no obvious pressure on your ears which makes you more comfortable.

 

How about actual experience of Rebellion’s noise cancelling function? 

Rebellion headphones’ peak noise cancellation is 27dB. It can offset most low- frequency noise even in 90dB environments. In a noisy environment, you would only need half of your usual volume to listen to music or to have a call easily without screaming.

 

How long does it take to fully charge the headphone?
It needs around 2.5hrs to fully charge it from empty.

 

How long would it last after fully charged? 

The battery can last more than 15 hours. 

 

Can I return or change the product if it has problems? 

If there is a quality issue with the headphones, or the product was damaged during shipping, we guarantee a new replacement product. However, we do not accept product returns besides for the aforementioned reasons.
column29:
>REFUND POLICY

You can initiate 100% refunds within the first 8 days of backing an Indiegogo campaign by going to your contributions tab on the Indiegogo page.
column30:
>RETURN AND EXCHANGE POLICY

Please note all sales are final. Contributing to a campaign and claiming a perk on Indiegogo is not the same as buying a product online. There will be no exchanges or returns for change of mind. If you have a factory defect, please email the Customer Happiness Team on support@itiwant.us to arrange an assessment and replacement if deemed defective.

Great products do not have to reinvent the wheel, they just need to be better than others. Antaio A-Buds and A-Buds SE are designed to be comfortable, cool and affordable. It is also the first collaboration between Toronto based Antaio team and Moscow based cutting-edge fashion design house FUTUREISNOWN.
column7:
/>


It's about time. Say goodbye to wires. Say hello to true seamless connectivity. With lightning-fast Bluetooth 5.0 technology, 20-hour(with case) battery life, these truly wireless, auto-pairing earbuds are exactly what you’ve been waiting for. Two designs, two pairs of beautiful wireless buds packed with awesomeness.
column8:
/>


At Antaio, we believe good sound is not just a feature, but an attitude. With A-Buds, we did not jam it with useless features. Instead, we focused on designing and delivering a device that’s not only comfortable and intuitive but also reflects your taste, your lifestyle, and your attitude.

column3:
>Two Designs. Same Awesomeness.

We know everyone is different. And sometimes even you could be feeling different depending on the day. So we have designed two versions of A-Buds with the same awesomeness. Whether you are feeling a bit old school or futuristic, rock on as always.
column18:

column1: As you may have noticed, the A-Buds are already in production stage, which means we have already completed all development and testing, and are now working on pre-production.
