column1: Introducing Flang, your personal speaker and HiFi player for wherever life takes you. The HiFi player offers the best audiophile sound source for Flang portable speaker to ensure the best sound experience. The type-C dock is designed specially to prevent signal loss compared to normal Bluetooth speakers.
You can use the Flang Audio Player Dock together for the best sound quality, or separately as a portable Bluetooth speaker and HiFi player to meet all your needs.",28.0,0,"1 Campaign

Hello guys! We are currently working on our sophomore effort and we need YOUR help. We have teamed up with Indiegogo to help raise funds for our next album.  We are an independent band and everything we do, we fund ourselves. We want to be able to give you the music that you love and deserve! Everything that we are able to do is because of you guys so please help us take this to the next level!
Every little bit helps! Get some EXCLUSIVE perks!

Although we do everything ourselves, there are some things that we do require help with. Your funds will help go towards the production and tracking of this album as well as the mixing and mastering.  We will also be marketing this album ourselves! We will be using the funds to shoot a music video for the first single off of the record as well as to promote to every news publication we can!
The funds will be allocated as follows:
• Music Video Shoot, Locations, Lights and Editing - $2000
• This campaign will be invaluable to our future success as a band and of course more music for all the Versus Me fans out there!

• We are currently at the halfway point with writing the new material and this is the boost we need to deliver this as efficiently and timely as possible! We ultimately want to give you guys new music!

• We're just a handful of honest, hardworking midwest boys with grander aspirations and this campaign would be the catalyst for bringing this to the next level! We want to be able to tour and bring our music to everyone!

• We need your help!!! If the campaign funding is not met we will still release what we can. Obviously we don't like releasing material so sparsely and we want to be able to give you that next collection of songs but we can only do so much on our own (hence the need for this campaign)!

• Writing/Tracking a record is challenging enough on its own without the impending financial weight of such a large undertaking! We face sacrifices and challenges all the time but none are more significant than the financial toll of being in an active band. It isn't all bad though! You guys make this worth it and we wake up every day hungry for what's in store for us!

If you're not in a position where you are able to donate, we totally understand! Help us out by spreading the word of this campaign! Share this on your Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, go door to door, or protest in the streets! Whatever way you can let people know that we're gearing up for a second album!

column1: What if you could bring the thrill and excitement of motorsport and motorcycle riding with you wherever you go, whenever you want?

With Braaper, you can do exactly that: our speaker system combines the freedom, fun and unadulterated adrenaline of motorsport with state-of-the-art speaker technology for a truly awesome, truly mobile music experience.
Braaper is a Portable, Bluetooth Speaker that connects to your phone or music player, allowing you to play music wirelessly.

column4: >Italian Design to resemble a competition motorbike exhaust system
>Twin Power - Connect two Braaper for twice the sound

column56: >
column65: >Financial, Technology, Lifestyle:
column73: />

column4:
/>

At Braaper, we have a passion for two things: music and moto. So we set out on a mission to create a speaker system that captures the motorsport lifestyle, while bringing the state-of-the-art audio technology that 21st-century music fanatics demand of their speaker systems at the same time. The result: Braaper, the Pipe That Plays Music and More!

>Music and moto go together like harmony and melody. With Braaper, it’s never easier to crank the tunes that are the perfect soundtrack to the perfect ride. Do you braap iTunes? Or maybe Deezer, Spotify or iRadio is more your speed. Whatever your streaming service of choice, Braaper brings the music to life in big, beautiful, high fidelity sound.

column10: >The motorsport lifestyle is all about being on the go, so we wanted our speakers to be built for maximum mobility. Whether you’re at home, in the office, or off to the beach, Braaper goes wherever you go.
column27: >Built to Last the Road and Off Road
column30: >Braaper is built for maximum durability, too. Mud, dust, water… bring it on! After all, if our speakers pipe concept can survive the intense ride of motocross, they can survive anything!
column31: >
column35: >As in the racing world
column39: >Braaper speakers come in 2 feature-packed versions.
column43: >The Stock version and the Factory edition
column47:
>: 

The Stock Edition

Stock Edition Braaper speakers are made from high quality ABS plastic casing with attention to detail and motorsport-level finishing. Their unique design yields the maximum music performance and with standard GoPro supports compatibility for maximum portability. The finishing is completed by a real fine metal front wrap band, fixed with aluminum rivets! Ruggedized and water resistant to be used in different conditions.

column5: >Stock Edition Matte Black (soft touch)

column1:
The Factory Racing Edition 

Racing Grade Carbon Fiber-Aluminum

The Factory Racing Edition is the flagship of the Braaper line. Improving the Braaper Stock edition performances was no easy task. We teamed up with MotocrossLAB.com R&
column2:
D and Sound Engineers to create a factory-edition Braaper with racing-grade mechanical features and state of the art sound performances. Braaper Factory speakers are made entirely of CNC aluminum and real carbon fiber material, completed by a real fine metal front wrap band, fixed with aluminum rivets! Products in this line feature racing grade material and finishing, providing better shock and dirt resistance. Ruggedized and water resistant  to be used in different conditions. 


Audio performance mods we made from Stock Edition:

column4: >Adoption of a High performance acustic driver with neodymium magnet to get the best performance in the small Braaper size. Neodymium is a rare Earth element magnet.
>Integration of aptX® codec for high-quality Bluetooth stereo sound
>Improved Sound pressure level (SPL-A) from 85-90 dB to 90-95dB @ 0,5m/2ft (1 or 2 paired speakers)

column7: >And coming soon from Braaper: the Braaper Juke Box app, designed specifically to work with Braaper speakers!
column14:
>

When we say mobile, we mean mobile: wherever you go, you can take Braaper with you: 

At home 

At the office (this is our first prototype)
column49:
>

At the racetrack
column52:
/>

On the beach  

And more... 


We created Braaper to celebrate the moto lifestyle, and that mission was at the front of our minds throughout the Braaper design process. 

Braaper is designed by a leading Italian art designer to capture the look of a competition motorbike exhaust system. And the resemblance goes way beyond the visual. When you start up your Braaper, you'll hear the sound of an engine revving up. Crank the volume to max, and you’ll be met with another roar. And when you power Braaper down, you will hear an engine rumbling to a stop.
column67:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

After all, that's where Braaper gets its name: from that unmistakable motorcycle engine sound that means freedom, fun and an unforgettable ride. 

We made it our mission to pack innovative technology into Braaper at every turn. Here are just a few of the incredible features that make Braaper unlike any other speaker out there:

Play What You Want

Music, movies, TV, web videos, video games — if it’s got audio, Braaper's got it covered.
column70:
>

 

On the Go

Braaper works with GoPro action camera mounts, so you can mount Braaper in your car, on your bike, on a stroller — anywhere!


No Strings Attached

Braaper connects wirelessly with your iPhone, iPad, tablets, smartphones and more!
column75:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580""> 

Your Gadget, Your Music 

Braaper is compatible with iOS, Mac OSX, Android, Windows, Blackberry and more

That Sweet Stereo Sound

Sync two Braaper speakers together and just like that you’ll get true, dimensional stereo sound!
column80:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580"">

Look, No Hands!  

The Braaper speakerphone makes hands-free calling a breeze. Plus with built-in noise cancelling microphones, your call never sounded better!
column85:
schema=vimeo"" width=""580""> 

Recharge Your Ride

Braaper is powered by a rechargeable lithium battery for 8-10 hours of rich and vibrant sound, with standard micro-USB port for easy recharging.
column88:
/>

We have some amazing rewards lined up to thank you for being a part of the Braaper success story. We’re planning to have everything ready to ship before Christmas.
column106:
>


DUAL PACKAGES


Factory Edition Braaper Breakdowns

SINGLE PACKAGES


DUAL PACKAGES



Dealer Packages


Accessories and Gadgets

FREE COVER REWARDS 



We have prototypes of our Braaper speakers already complete, and distributors waiting in the wings to carry our products. But we have just a little more work to do before Braaper’s ready for the market, and that’s where your help comes in!

We didn't take Braaper to Indiegogo just to raise funds. Just like other successful entrepreneurs here in Indiegogo, we value the power of feedback from early adopters. Your feedback will help us to best determine the direction that the speaker takes in the future. We will poll your ideas to shape the final version.

With this fundraiser, our goal is to raise $15,000 to help us put the finishing touches on tooling and manufacturing, complete some patent and certification requirements.

If we can stretch to $30,000 we'll be able to develop the Braaper Juke Box app. 

If we reach 50.000 we can expand our line with new styles! This will be the addition of a shiny chrome or Black-Aluminum detailed speakers to our existing black matte version.
column109:
/>

We have completed the industrial design - and spent months testing (and more importantly using) prototypes and refining the Braaper from great to delightful. We also patented the Braaper design all over the world!

We are ready to complete the final production design and guide the Braaper through Bluetooth, CE, RoHS, FCC and REACH certifications, before tooling up at the factory and getting your pack of Braapers shipped as soon as possible.

This is the timeline:
column111:
/>

Additionally, we will also contribute to the Riders for Riders Association, a non profit organization dedicated to helping injured riders, as we will devote a percentage  of our revenues to help riders who have permanent riding related injuries as well families who have lost a child during a race. For more information:  www.riders4riders.it
column120: >Maurizio Di Mauro, the founder of Braaper, has been responsible for numerous inventions, including a remote-controlled wireless goggle system designed to push mud away from goggle lenses with the touch of a handlebar placed button, a marketplace system for matching demand and offers for truck transport services, a Chat Bluetooth mobile application in partnership with NOKIA, game app, software tools for managing and tracking  motorcycles maintenance and racing setup, Infrared and GPS Lap Timer Racing Chrono, up and more. Di Mauro has also won the Italian eCommerce Industrial Ministry Award and served as an assistant professor at IULM University and served as director of the Master in Multimedia Communication program at the IED-ISC in Milan.  His company MotocrossLAB.com designs, develops and  distributes top PowerSport brands throughout Europe.  During the last 3 years Di Mauro drove as Country Manager PartsEurope.eu (THOR, Moose, Drag, ICON, etc..) start-up in Italy.
column132: >Over the last 25 years, Braaper co-founder
column138: > has consulted on art direction, brand development, advertising, brand extension/licensing, marketing and communication some of the world’s largest companies including several of the Top Fortune 100 companies such as: Adidas, AC Milan, AC Juventus, Ciga, De Agostini, Ferrero, Fiat Group, Hummer, Piaggio-Vespa, Ferrero, Gazzetta dello Sport, Chiquita, Plasmon, Findus, Panini, Gruppo Fiat, RCS, De Agostini, Radio Italia, Mondadori, Mondo TV, San Siro Stadium, Sony, Hummer, Route66, F2 Championship and Swatch.

column167: >Braaper Factory Edition Specs (in red tuning mods from Stock version
column174: >1) Where the name Braaper come from?
column179: >“Braap” is a term originally coined by dirt bike and motorcross riders, and it eventually made its way into the world of all motorcycles. Braap is the term used to refer to the sound produced by the engine. We thought that this term uniquely fit the spirit of our concept!
column182:
>2) Why do EU customers need to add VAT?

Braaper is made by a company registered in the EU and is required by law to charge VAT on its sales.

However, if you are ordering on behalf of a european company with a valid VAT ID, you don't need to add VAT to your perk.

3) How to calculate order total?

column3: >- EU customers (e.g. Germany, France, UK, ...) without a VAT ID (e.g. private persons):

column1: ","Our campaign is over but click here for future updates.
What if you could bring the thrill and excitement of motorsport and motorcycle riding with you wherever you go, whenever you want?

With Braaper, you can do exactly that: our speaker system combines the freedom, fun and unadulterated adrenaline of motorsport with state-of-the-art speaker technology for a truly awesome, truly mobile music experience.
Braaper is a Portable, Bluetooth Speaker that connects to your phone or music player, allowing you to play music wirelessly.
Italian Design to resemble a competition motorbike exhaust system
Plays Everything - Music, Video, Games, Movies..
Use the Braaper as a Speakerphone
Twin Power - Connect two Braaper for twice the sound
Dirt, Snow, Water and Shock proof
and more....Financial, Technology, Lifestyle:             and more....

At Braaper, we have a passion for two things: music and moto. So we set out on a mission to create a speaker system that captures the motorsport lifestyle, while bringing the state-of-the-art audio technology that 21st-century music fanatics demand of their speaker systems at the same time. The result: Braaper, the Pipe That Plays Music and More!

Music and moto go together like harmony and melody. With Braaper, it’s never easier to crank the tunes that are the perfect soundtrack to the perfect ride. Do you braap iTunes? Or maybe Deezer, Spotify or iRadio is more your speed. Whatever your streaming service of choice, Braaper brings the music to life in big, beautiful, high fidelity sound.

Hit the RoadThe motorsport lifestyle is all about being on the go, so we wanted our speakers to be built for maximum mobility. Whether you’re at home, in the office, or off to the beach, Braaper goes wherever you go. Built to Last the Road and Off RoadBraaper is built for maximum durability, too. Mud, dust, water… bring it on! After all, if our speakers pipe concept can survive the intense ride of motocross, they can survive anything!As in the racing world Braaper speakers come in 2 feature-packed versions. The Stock version and the Factory edition: The Stock EditionStock Edition Braaper speakers are made from high quality ABS plastic casing with attention to detail and motorsport-level finishing. Their unique design yields the maximum music performance and with standard GoPro supports compatibility for maximum portability. The finishing is completed by a real fine metal front wrap band, fixed with aluminum rivets! Ruggedized and water resistant to be used in different conditions.

The Factory Racing Edition Racing Grade Carbon Fiber-AluminumThe Factory Racing Edition is the flagship of the Braaper line. Improving the Braaper Stock edition performances was no easy task. We teamed up with MotocrossLAB.com R&D and Sound Engineers to create a factory-edition Braaper with racing-grade mechanical features and state of the art sound performances. Braaper Factory speakers are made entirely of CNC aluminum and real carbon fiber material, completed by a real fine metal front wrap band, fixed with aluminum rivets! Products in this line feature racing grade material and finishing, providing better shock and dirt resistance. Ruggedized and water resistant  to be used in different conditions. Audio performance mods we made from Stock Edition:
Adoption of a High performance acustic driver with neodymium magnet to get the best performance in the small Braaper size. Neodymium is a rare Earth element magnet.
Integration of aptX® codec for high-quality Bluetooth stereo sound
Improved Sound pressure level (SPL-A) from 85-90 dB to 90-95dB @ 0,5m/2ft (1 or 2 paired speakers)

And coming soon from Braaper: the Braaper Juke Box app, designed specifically to work with Braaper speakers! When we say mobile, we mean mobile: wherever you go, you can take Braaper with you: At home At the office (this is our first prototype) With your TVIn your CarOn your BikeOn your MotorcycleAt the racetrack On the beach  And more... We created Braaper to celebrate the moto lifestyle, and that mission was at the front of our minds throughout the Braaper design process. Braaper is designed by a leading Italian art designer to capture the look of a competition motorbike exhaust system. And the resemblance goes way beyond the visual. When you start up your Braaper, you'll hear the sound of an engine revving up. Crank the volume to max, and you’ll be met with another roar. And when you power Braaper down, you will hear an engine rumbling to a stop.Engine Sound Effects  After all, that's where Braaper gets its name: from that unmistakable motorcycle engine sound that means freedom, fun and an unforgettable ride. We made it our mission to pack innovative technology into Braaper at every turn. Here are just a few of the incredible features that make Braaper unlike any other speaker out there:Play What You WantMusic, movies, TV, web videos, video games — if it’s got audio, Braaper's got it covered. On the GoBraaper works with GoPro action camera mounts, so you can mount Braaper in your car, on your bike, on a stroller — anywhere!No Strings AttachedBraaper connects wirelessly with your iPhone, iPad, tablets, smartphones and more! Your Gadget, Your Music Braaper is compatible with iOS, Mac OSX, Android, Windows, Blackberry and moreThat Sweet Stereo SoundSync two Braaper speakers together and just like that you’ll get true, dimensional stereo sound!Look, No Hands!  The Braaper speakerphone makes hands-free calling a breeze. Plus with built-in noise cancelling microphones, your call never sounded better! Recharge Your RideBraaper is powered by a rechargeable lithium battery for 8-10 hours of rich and vibrant sound, with standard micro-USB port for easy recharging.We have some amazing rewards lined up to thank you for being a part of the Braaper success story. We’re planning to have everything ready to ship before Christmas.Stock Edition Braaper BreakdownsSINGLE PACKAGESDUAL PACKAGESFactory Edition Braaper BreakdownsSINGLE PACKAGESDUAL PACKAGESDealer PackagesAccessories and GadgetsFREE COVER REWARDS We have prototypes of our Braaper speakers already complete, and distributors waiting in the wings to carry our products. But we have just a little more work to do before Braaper’s ready for the market, and that’s where your help comes in!We didn't take Braaper to Indiegogo just to raise funds. Just like other successful entrepreneurs here in Indiegogo, we value the power of feedback from early adopters. Your feedback will help us to best determine the direction that the speaker takes in the future. We will poll your ideas to shape the final version.With this fundraiser, our goal is to raise $15,000 to help us put the finishing touches on tooling and manufacturing, complete some patent and certification requirements.If we can stretch to $30,000 we'll be able to develop the Braaper Juke Box app. If we reach 50.000 we can expand our line with new styles! This will be the addition of a shiny chrome or Black-Aluminum detailed speakers to our existing black matte version. We have completed the industrial design - and spent months testing (and more importantly using) prototypes and refining the Braaper from great to delightful. We also patented the Braaper design all over the world!We are ready to complete the final production design and guide the Braaper through Bluetooth, CE, RoHS, FCC and REACH certifications, before tooling up at the factory and getting your pack of Braapers shipped as soon as possible.This is the timeline:Additionally, we will also contribute to the Riders for Riders Association, a non profit organization dedicated to helping injured riders, as we will devote a percentage  of our revenues to help riders who have permanent riding related injuries as well families who have lost a child during a race. For more information:  www.riders4riders.it  Maurizio Di Mauro, the founder of Braaper, has been responsible for numerous inventions, including a remote-controlled wireless goggle system designed to push mud away from goggle lenses with the touch of a handlebar placed button, a marketplace system for matching demand and offers for truck transport services, a Chat Bluetooth mobile application in partnership with NOKIA, game app, software tools for managing and tracking  motorcycles maintenance and racing setup, Infrared and GPS Lap Timer Racing Chrono, up and more. Di Mauro has also won the Italian eCommerce Industrial Ministry Award and served as an assistant professor at IULM University and served as director of the Master in Multimedia Communication program at the IED-ISC in Milan.  His company MotocrossLAB.com designs, develops and  distributes top PowerSport brands throughout Europe.  During the last 3 years Di Mauro drove as Country Manager PartsEurope.eu (THOR, Moose, Drag, ICON, etc..) start-up in Italy.Over the last 25 years, Braaper co-founder Paolo Di Mauro has consulted on art direction, brand development, advertising, brand extension/licensing, marketing and communication some of the world’s largest companies including several of the Top Fortune 100 companies such as: Adidas, AC Milan, AC Juventus, Ciga, De Agostini, Ferrero, Fiat Group, Hummer, Piaggio-Vespa, Ferrero, Gazzetta dello Sport, Chiquita, Plasmon, Findus, Panini, Gruppo Fiat, RCS, De Agostini, Radio Italia, Mondadori, Mondo TV, San Siro Stadium, Sony, Hummer, Route66, F2 Championship and Swatch.Designing the Braaper we set out on a mission to create a speaker system that captures the motorsport lifestyle, while bringing the state-of-the-art audio technology that 21st-century music fanatics demand of their speaker systems at the same time. The result: Braaper, the Pipe That Plays Music and More! Early sketches3D Design and EngeneeringRenders of the BraaperThe first prototypeBraaper Stock Edition SpecsBraaper Factory Edition Specs (in red tuning mods from Stock version1) Where the name Braaper come from?“Braap” is a term originally coined by dirt bike and motorcross riders, and it eventually made its way into the world of all motorcycles. Braap is the term used to refer to the sound produced by the engine. We thought that this term uniquely fit the spirit of our concept!2) Why do EU customers need to add VAT?Braaper is made by a company registered in the EU and is required by law to charge VAT on its sales.However, if you are ordering on behalf of a european company with a valid VAT ID, you don't need to add VAT to your perk.3) How to calculate order total?

- EU customers (e.g. Germany, France, UK, ...) without a VAT ID (e.g. private persons):  // Add 22% of the total for VAT (value added tax in Italy) // Add $15 for shipping// Set amount = Price + 22%VAT + Shipping
- All U.S.A and not EU customers: // Add $25 for shipping// Set amount to $ USD!// Set amount = Price + Shipping
3) I forgot to add shipping costs or VAT. What do I do?

Simply back us with the required additional amount. Make sure to use the same name and address. After the campaign ends, we'll check through the addresses and perks and get back to anyone who needs to match up the perk.
4) How do I supply my VAT ID and company name?
Don't worry, after the campaign ends, we'll send a survey to fill in the missing bits.
With Gogo-S, you’ll be able to move, free of wires and cords, while gaining a better understanding of your performance and abilities, through the latest and most intuitive technology

column2: >Why gogo-s is so unique?

column1: gogo-s is an in-ear music player, a dynamic heart rate sensor, an activity tracker with audio training guide and lightweight, 100% waterproof,

column4: '>By using Duet Play Technology, the gogo-s enables concurrent communication between two earbuds, without the connection of unwieldy wires. The gogo-s earbuds can also communicate with smart phones, so you can stream your favorite workout jams, completely wirelessly.

column1: In order to improve on the signal reliability for wireless equipment, we found the perfect shape of earbuds, best materials, and optimized positions for the vital components. Our engineers tested the antenna of the gogo-s in a professional “Dark Room,”putting over a million dollars into research and development—an amount of research usually only completed by mega corporations like Nokia and Sony.  We also analyzed the coefficients through testing on lifelike models by Vector Network Analyzer, getting the most accurate adjustments possible.

We have already implemented Duet Play Technology on the gogo sports music player, which is in pre-sale, and will be released in July 2015. The performance of Duet Play Technology will be enhanced and improved on the gogo-s.

Combining both a 9 axis and an optical sensor, we’ve managed to reduce any shaking that would affect your activity data. The inner earbuds of the gogo-s would sit deeper inside of the ear, which would vastly improve the accuracy of dynamic heart-rate detection.
After endless treadmill tests, we found gogo­-s to be more accurate than the Apple Watch in tracking heart rates during peak activity.

column4: '>The gogo-s doesn’t just track your speed, steps, and heart rate. It turns that data into actionable advice towards reaching your fitness goals. Our audio training guide will give you real-time feedback and suggestions based on your pace and heart rate during your workout, helping you avoid injury and exercise more effectively.

'>The training plans were created by sports experts and fitness trainers. To achieve a training goal, people need to follow a day-by-day plan, and complete daily training tasks. These plans can be tailored to the user’s specific requirements and goals, therefore and aim to significantly improve the specific user’s training effectiveness.

column1: The gogo-s brings you the highest quality of audio technology, free from pesky cords. Our Duet Play Technology allows both earbuds to seamlessly sync with your smartphone, so you can stream your favorite workout jams wirelessly.

If you don’t want to carry your smartphone, the gogo-s comes complete with 4GB of local storage space. You can store up to 1000 songs and create your most invigorating playlists on our “Go Sport” App.

column4: '>The gogo-s is 100% waterproof and sweat-proof. Our speakers can be fully submerged in up to 1 meter of water. Whether you’re running through the rain or swimming laps in a pool, your gogo-s won’t miss a beat.
'>We use the ip67 standard waterproof-mesh on the speakers of gogo-s.
'>The control button and its surrounding material is formed with Double-Colored Injection technology.
'>The connection of two Parting Surfaces utilizes Ultrasonic Welding Technology.
'>The circuits are placed on PCB board and together coated by Nano waterproof material.

'>To keep its simple and smooth product design, we only designed one button on each earbud of Gogo-s. However, all of the operations can be done by this single button—just follow the special operating instructions. This allows for easy access, even mid-workout.

column1: Designed for Speed and Staying in Place

When you’re moving quickly, you want your earbuds to stay put. The gogo-s is equipped with drop-proof inner earbuds that fit securely in your ear, keeping the sensor in place no matter what you’re doing. The gogo-­s is available in three sizes, for maximum comfort and security.
In order to give users a better experience, the battery life for gogo-s earbuds is around 3 to 5 hours, which ensures the accurate operation during your entire workout and exercise regimen.
The gogo-s is meant to outlast even your toughest workout. Each gogo-s comes with a portable charging case, fully charging both earbuds in just 40 minutes.

G-­Wearables was founded by well known semiconductor and LED expert Cheng Guo in 2013. As a sports and technology enthusiast, he found existing sports equipment to be more annoying than beneficial. Therefore, he came up with the idea of developing a pair of all-­in-one truly wireless sports earbuds, to combine together the functions which people care about most, and provide a comfortable wearing experience.

G-Wearables consists of a team of technology experts, product designers, and experienced engineers. In addition to their commitment to technical excellence,    G-Wearables believes that wearable devices should be stylish and on trend.

In 2014, G-Wearables released their first product, the Goccia Activity Tracker, and was honored with the prestigious Silver IDEA Design Award. In May 2015, G-Wearables attended CES Asia, and was honored to be a finalist of Best Wearable of CES 2015.

Since we changed Bluetooth to NFMI solution for the connection between each earbuds, we have to use new suppliers. We hope that the solution changing won't influent the schedule too much, however, according to our source that the earlist day we'll get the official NFMI chip from mass production would be next March. We are very sorry to tell you that we have to delay the delivery of gogo-s, but no matter how, we will not stop our work on it, the development and trail of the earbuds with the development board are still on the track.
New Timeline of manufacturing of gogo-s (NFMI Plan)
December 2015: Requirement Fixed with new NFMI Plan

column1: 1. I knew gogo-s is a true wireless earbuds. It's so cool. But I still worry about the stability of signal between each earbud.
We have the technology to ensure the stability of the communication between each earbuds and the signal connect with your smartphone during your exercise in  most of normal workout places.

After many test, we have applied this tech on gogo sport music player which will be launched on July. The performance will be enhanced on gogo­-s. However, even earbuds with wire would be interfered with very strong signal, signal jammer or router.
2. Will the earbuds drop off when I do sports? And what if one of earbuds fall off?
The specially designed inner earbuds are drop-proof. It enables the earbuds stay in place when you running or swimming. But, please do not use gogo-s when you play boxing : )

If your left earbud drop off,  your right earbud will remind you. On the other hand, if your right earbud fall off, the left one will become silent. But overall, since gogo-s is inner earbuds, if one of the earbud  drop off, yourself will apparently feel it.
3. Do I have to slow down or even stop the exercise to get accurate heart rate detecting?
No, you do not have. gogo-s is able to detect your dynamic heart-rate accurately when you are jogging, running or swimming.
4. Does the gogo-s works for people with big ears? Is it comfortable to wear?

The inner earbuds of gogo-s are changeable. There will be 3 pairs of inner earbuds in the box which fit small, medium and large. These three different sizes of drop-proof inner earbuds fit different types of ears, which could securely stay in your ears when doing sports.
The main body of the earbuds is plastic but the changeable inner earbuds are made by a kind of silicone so that they are comfortable to wear.
5. Is gogo-s just a wireless music player?

Gogo-s is not only a music player. It can stream music form phone (allow A2DP), it could be connected with your smartphone via BT on land, it have real-time broadcast of training plan, speed, distance and dynamic heart rate. It could also sync with its APP to get more details about your exercise .
More specifically, when you are swimming, gogo-s can work without your phone under the water. You have storage music in your gogo-s, and the activity data could be sync with its APP after swimming.
6. Could you provide more detail about the Bluetooth profile of gogo-s? Could you maintain the signal stability between each ear-bud under water ?

The wireless range is at least 33 feet (10m) for gogo-s. And it support Bluetooth Smart Ready and Enhanced Data Rate (EDR). The profiles supported by gogo-s include HFP 1.6 A2DP, 1.2 AVRCP, 1.4 HSP, 1.2 SPP.

As for gogo-s using when swimming, we use a specific technique to resolve the signal attenuation problem underwater. It enables the stable link between two earbuds at a distance of at least one meter. Please follow our updates for further information.
7. Could you share details about the on-board controls on the ear-buds?

The gogo-s has multi-function Control buttons which cover On/off devise, Music Play/Pause/Change/Sound Volume, Training starts/Training finished etc. We will update the chart of button control usage later, it will explain much clearer.
8. Does Perks price include shipping costs?
8.1. For people from the US and Mainland China: Shipping is free.
Shipping is also free, please choose one method from below:
(1). Choose “China” as shipping country, then enter your Hong Kong  address in details in the following place of ""address line "" and “city” .

(2).Choose “Hong Kong” for the selection of shipping country. There will  be $40 shipping fee. You have to pay it at first. When our campaign ends and before the shipping of the perk, you will receive a confirmation email  for your shipping address from us. Reply us the email and state ""your  shipping address is Hong Kong"". Then, we could refund this $40 to you.
(1) $40 USD for shipping is neccessory if the perk is going to ship to  countries other than Mainland China and the US.
(2) For people who bought more than one pair of gogo-s:

If you bought two pairs of gogo-s separately but with same shipping  address,we could refund you $40 but you have to pay two shipping fees with each purchase at first. After the end of our campaign and before the shipping of the perk, you will receive a confirmation email for your  shipping address from us. Reply us the email and state ""you have two  products with same shipping address "". Then, we could refund this $40  to you.
In addition, the $378 ""share with your beloved"" perk will only charge $40 shipping fee if you are outside Mainland China and USA. (not $80 as  described in perk details.)
8.5. The shipping fee for Training Club and Energetic team:
These two perks are shipping fee included.
8.6. The delivery of perks are subject to best efforts to different counties, but not guaranteed.
We will contact with you if your shipping address is out of our ability.
9. Does the Perk price include taxes?

The price includes taxes  for China and US. The price is excluding any local tax for contributors in other countries.  Contributors are responsible for any taxes and duties related to their shipping country.
With Gogo-S, you’ll be able to move, free of wires and cords, while gaining a better understanding of your performance and abilities, through the latest and most intuitive technology
gogo-s is an in-ear music player, a dynamic heart rate sensor, an activity tracker with audio training guide and lightweight, 100% waterproof, totally wireless.

By using Duet Play Technology, the gogo-s enables concurrent communication between two earbuds, without the connection of unwieldy wires. The gogo-s earbuds can also communicate with smart phones, so you can stream your favorite workout jams, completely wirelessly.

In order to improve on the signal reliability for wireless equipment, we found the perfect shape of earbuds, best materials, and optimized positions for the vital components. Our engineers tested the antenna of the gogo-s in a professional “Dark Room,”putting over a million dollars into research and development—an amount of research usually only completed by mega corporations like Nokia and Sony.  We also analyzed the coefficients through testing on lifelike models by Vector Network Analyzer, getting the most accurate adjustments possible.

We have already implemented Duet Play Technology on the gogo sports music player, which is in pre-sale, and will be released in July 2015. The performance of Duet Play Technology will be enhanced and improved on the gogo-s.

Combining both a 9 axis and an optical sensor, we’ve managed to reduce any shaking that would affect your activity data. The inner earbuds of the gogo-s would sit deeper inside of the ear, which would vastly improve the accuracy of dynamic heart-rate detection.
After endless treadmill tests, we found gogo­-s to be more accurate than the Apple Watch in tracking heart rates during peak activity.

The gogo-s doesn’t just track your speed, steps, and heart rate. It turns that data into actionable advice towards reaching your fitness goals. Our audio training guide will give you real-time feedback and suggestions based on your pace and heart rate during your workout, helping you avoid injury and exercise more effectively.

The training plans were created by sports experts and fitness trainers. To achieve a training goal, people need to follow a day-by-day plan, and complete daily training tasks. These plans can be tailored to the user’s specific requirements and goals, therefore and aim to significantly improve the specific user’s training effectiveness.

The gogo-s brings you the highest quality of audio technology, free from pesky cords. Our Duet Play Technology allows both earbuds to seamlessly sync with your smartphone, so you can stream your favorite workout jams wirelessly.

If you don’t want to carry your smartphone, the gogo-s comes complete with 4GB of local storage space. You can store up to 1000 songs and create your most invigorating playlists on our “Go Sport” App.

The gogo-s is 100% waterproof and sweat-proof. Our speakers can be fully submerged in up to 1 meter of water. Whether you’re running through the rain or swimming laps in a pool, your gogo-s won’t miss a beat.
We use the ip67 standard waterproof-mesh on the speakers of gogo-s.
The control button and its surrounding material is formed with Double-Colored Injection technology.
The connection of two Parting Surfaces utilizes Ultrasonic Welding Technology.
The circuits are placed on PCB board and together coated by Nano waterproof material.

To keep its simple and smooth product design, we only designed one button on each earbud of Gogo-s. However, all of the operations can be done by this single button—just follow the special operating instructions. This allows for easy access, even mid-workout.
Designed for Speed and Staying in Place

When you’re moving quickly, you want your earbuds to stay put. The gogo-s is equipped with drop-proof inner earbuds that fit securely in your ear, keeping the sensor in place no matter what you’re doing. The gogo-­s is available in three sizes, for maximum comfort and security.
In order to give users a better experience, the battery life for gogo-s earbuds is around 3 to 5 hours, which ensures the accurate operation during your entire workout and exercise regimen.
The gogo-s is meant to outlast even your toughest workout. Each gogo-s comes with a portable charging case, fully charging both earbuds in just 40 minutes.

G-­Wearables was founded by well known semiconductor and LED expert Cheng Guo in 2013. As a sports and technology enthusiast, he found existing sports equipment to be more annoying than beneficial. Therefore, he came up with the idea of developing a pair of all-­in-one truly wireless sports earbuds, to combine together the functions which people care about most, and provide a comfortable wearing experience.

G-Wearables consists of a team of technology experts, product designers, and experienced engineers. In addition to their commitment to technical excellence,    G-Wearables believes that wearable devices should be stylish and on trend.

In 2014, G-Wearables released their first product, the Goccia Activity Tracker, and was honored with the prestigious Silver IDEA Design Award. In May 2015, G-Wearables attended CES Asia, and was honored to be a finalist of Best Wearable of CES 2015.

Since we changed Bluetooth to NFMI solution for the connection between each earbuds, we have to use new suppliers. We hope that the solution changing won't influent the schedule too much, however, according to our source that the earlist day we'll get the official NFMI chip from mass production would be next March. We are very sorry to tell you that we have to delay the delivery of gogo-s, but no matter how, we will not stop our work on it, the development and trail of the earbuds with the development board are still on the track.
New Timeline of manufacturing of gogo-s (NFMI Plan)
December 2015: Requirement Fixed with new NFMI Plan
February 2016: Hardware prototype with function complete
End of April 2016: Ship the perk

Any innovation will face many risks and challenges, and Gogo-s is no exception. To ensure the small and compact design of Gogo-s, we have to choose very small components for it and some of the components are difficult to acquire. The risk of delays in the supply of these components may cause delays in manufacturing and shipping.We’ve applied a lot of new technology in the gogo-s. There are no similar products that can be referenced to or compared to. Therefore, inconsistencies of performance may occur in actual use and in the testing environment.

However, we have already made the gogo sports music player, which shares key technologies with the gogo-s, and will be released soon for testing in the real market. The gogo music player is going to be released in July 2015. The performance of key features, such as Duet Play Technology, will be enhanced and improved on the gogo-s.

Although there are many obstacles to hurdle in the process of developing  gogo-s, we are well-prepared, and will try our best to reduce the risk to a minimum. With your support, we think we will be able to present the gogo-s to you as soon as possible.

5. Is gogo-s just a wireless music player?

Gogo-s is not only a music player. It can stream music form phone (allow A2DP), it could be connected with your smartphone via BT on land, it have real-time broadcast of training plan, speed, distance and dynamic heart rate. It could also sync with its APP to get more details about your exercise .
More specifically, when you are swimming, gogo-s can work without your phone under the water. You have storage music in your gogo-s, and the activity data could be sync with its APP after swimming.
6. Could you provide more detail about the Bluetooth profile of gogo-s? Could you maintain the signal stability between each ear-bud under water ?

The wireless range is at least 33 feet (10m) for gogo-s. And it support Bluetooth Smart Ready and Enhanced Data Rate (EDR). The profiles supported by gogo-s include HFP 1.6 A2DP, 1.2 AVRCP, 1.4 HSP, 1.2 SPP.

As for gogo-s using when swimming, we use a specific technique to resolve the signal attenuation problem underwater. It enables the stable link between two earbuds at a distance of at least one meter. Please follow our updates for further information.
7. Could you share details about the on-board controls on the ear-buds?

The gogo-s has multi-function Control buttons which cover On/off devise, Music Play/Pause/Change/Sound Volume, Training starts/Training finished etc. We will update the chart of button control usage later, it will explain much clearer.
8. Does Perks price include shipping costs?
8.1. For people from the US and Mainland China: Shipping is free.
Shipping is also free, please choose one method from below:
(1). Choose “China” as shipping country, then enter your Hong Kong  address in details in the following place of ""address line "" and “city” .

(2).Choose “Hong Kong” for the selection of shipping country. There will  be $40 shipping fee. You have to pay it at first. When our campaign ends and before the shipping of the perk, you will receive a confirmation email  for your shipping address from us. Reply us the email and state ""your  shipping address is Hong Kong"". Then, we could refund this $40 to you.
(1) $40 USD for shipping is neccessory if the perk is going to ship to  countries other than Mainland China and the US.
(2) For people who bought more than one pair of gogo-s:

If you bought two pairs of gogo-s separately but with same shipping  address,we could refund you $40 but you have to pay two shipping fees with each purchase at first. After the end of our campaign and before the shipping of the perk, you will receive a confirmation email for your  shipping address from us. Reply us the email and state ""you have two  products with same shipping address "". Then, we could refund this $40  to you.
In addition, the $378 ""share with your beloved"" perk will only charge $40 shipping fee if you are outside Mainland China and USA. (not $80 as  described in perk details.)
8.5. The shipping fee for Training Club and Energetic team:
These two perks are shipping fee included.
8.6. The delivery of perks are subject to best efforts to different counties, but not guaranteed.
We will contact with you if your shipping address is out of our ability.
9. Does the Perk price include taxes?

The price includes taxes  for China and US. The price is excluding any local tax for contributors in other countries.  Contributors are responsible for any taxes and duties related to their shipping country.",40.0,0,"1 Campaign

Launching iLepo ANC earphone providing extremely good Active Noise Cancelling starting at $19 (+shipping).

iLepo ANC features:

iLepo ANC (Active Noise Cancelling) embeds microphones and powered electronics in the earphone to remove background noise. The iLepo ANC earphone captures ambient noise and re-creates an inverse sound wave in real-time to feed it back in the earphones to cancel out most of the sound around the user. Especially good at blocking out low frequencies in surrounding noise for public transportation such as for bus, train, subway or airplane engines and at other noisy places with constant noise. This also allows the user to experience better audio clarity at lower volume, effectively healthier to hearing.

iLepo ANC audio sound curve to show the noise reduce 25-30Db:

iLepo ANC provides the market's best value high quality noise-cancelling earphones!

 

Only 30 grams and easy to carry. 10 hours battery life in fully ANC mode.

Professional acoustics design 

With more than 5 years experience about OEM/ODM earphone designing.

2 years experience about ANC earphone researching and designing.

iLepo ANC will use standard MicroUSB port for charging if this Indiegogo campaign reaches at least 2000 backers for the iLepo ANC earphones, otherwise they will use the current special NanoUSB connector to be charged using the special NanoUSB cable provided.

iLepo ANC ON/OFF buttons can easily switch on/off ANC mode with up to 10-hour battery life, the earphones also work fine without battery power left but without the noise cancelling function active.

iLepo ANC earphone available in 2 colors, Black, Grey:

Choose the color you want! 

Can only ship Black version if at least 1000 orders for the black ANC earphone, otherwise iLepo will ship you the default silver colored ANC earphone perk.

iLepo ANC earphone Technical specs:

In the box for iLepo ANC:

1*iLepo ANC earphone

1* USB charging cable

1* carry bag

4*pairs earpieces (XS, S, M, L):

Where to use iLepo ANC earphone?

Airplane/Metro/Bus/Street, You can just enjoy pure music in any public place with big noise.

More about iLepo earphone

1st Class Components 

iLepo ANC earphone is designed with durable best class components, qualified Li-thium battery and qualified quality control system at manufacturing.

Solid manufacturing system

Professional production line with assembly, testing and packaging to make sure every function work 100% perfect before ex-factory.

8 times QC(quality control process) during the whole production process.

At least 6-8 hours aging testing for every earphone.

iLepo(Shenzhen Gaoxin Electronics Digital Co.,Limited) is a leading design house and manufacture of ANC earphone/headphone/speaker located in Shenzhen, China.

 iLepo aims to provide best quality earphones powered with leading technology to consumers all over the world at affordable prices.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

1,Why flexible target?

iLepo is a professional digital  ANC earphone manufacturer. iLepo already start working on the mold in April 2016, T1 finished around middle of May 2016, No matter the fund raising amount, iLepo will complete iLepo ANC earphone and ship to all of our backers!

2, Why we only use a simple but real video for Kickstarter campaign?

We do not want to waste money on useless bullshit advertisement video, we even hope we can save this cost and to offer the best price to our backers. iLepo aim to provide qualified products with affordable price, not like some A brand earphone with very high list price, we only pursue reasonable profit and keep make our users happy.

3, Why we need your support?

iLepo ANC earphone has already been under development for 2 years, tooling has already started, and it is under trial production now. We have our own factory in China, with 5 years experience in Chinese factory business, we try to use this campaign to let more users know our new brand iLepo, and hope to make iLepo brand famous in the long term and appreciated by distributors of earphones worldwide.

4, Can I use the iLepo ANC earphone even if the battery is over?

Yes, the iLepo ANC earphone still can play the audio just fine as any other passive headphones even the battery is over, just the ANC function will not be enabled, You can use iLepo ANC earphone like a traditional earphone. 

5, What device can work with iLepo ANC earphone?

iLepo ANC earphone is compatible with all Android smart phones, apple devices (iphone, ipad, ipad mini, Macbook), Windows smart phones, notebooks, MP3 player, CD player, walkman etc. every devices with 3.5mm stereo audio jack.

6, Is iLepo ANC earphone waterproof?

No

7, ANC earphone  battery life?

ANC earphone: 9-10hours

Galerdo Beker Pro is the world's first headset free audio swimming tracker with real time AI voice assistance. It behaves like a friendly personal coach communicating to you under water. Talking to you with instant voice feedback based on artificial intelligence and bone conduction technologies. Information on swimming time and distance can be communicated to you in real time so you can improve your swimming skills quickly.

Galerdo Beker Pro was created by Jordan Huang and his team at Galerdo Inc., a professional audio company that specializes in developing the headset-free trackers for swimmers and runners based on artificial intelligence and bone conduction technology.

The Galerdo Beker Pro won the prestigious CES 2020 Innovation award for its innovation incorporating AI technology and bone-induction together.

 

As a laps swimmer, you enjoy swimming for strength, competition, and ultimately health.

Swimming, however can often easily become routine and boring because of the monotony, not to mention the silence.   

That's why we created the Galerdo™ Beker Pro. We love swimming ourselves and want more participants to enjoy the wonders of this exercise style.

Galerdo™ is our second product based on our bone conduction technology. Since our first product, the Beker Waterproof MP3 Player was successfully launched in 2016, many of our users kept asking us to bring headset-free design and Bone Conduction technology together not only for the swimming music player, but also for the swimming tracker.

Our customers were looking for a cutting edge alternative device that could be placed on the head to replace the traditional watches, trackers, and wristbands that are readily available in the market.

After 3 Years of intensive research &
column2:
development, a revolutionary milestone is here: AI-enabled audio swimming tracker Galerdo™. Join us and swim differently!

 

Galerdo™ is designed as the world's first headset-free and true wireless swimming audio tracker with Instant AI Voice Assistant.
column3:
>Galerdo -- AI Audio Swimming Tracker

 

Unlike other devices with only silent tracking or only music playing, Galerdo™ creatively combines AI-enabled swim tracker and waterproof MP3 player together, playing voice feedback and musical sound in turns or at the same time, and has headset-free and true wireless features.

●Built-in real-time tracker for swimming workouts.

●Built-in real-time voice assistant based on Artificial Intelligence and Bone Conduction           technology.

●Built-in waterproof MP3 music player.

With the real-time motivation of voice feedback and music in the pool, you’ll be swimming more freely and motivated and, ultimately, train longer.

 

We’re looking forward to providing a bonus to every Galerdo™ supporter if we can reach our stretch goal of $50,000. This bonus will give you the option to choose from three colors: yellow, pink and grey. After we reach our goal we will contact you to select your preferred color option before shipment.

Another exciting bonus will be available if we can reach our stretch goal of $150,000. Currently the built-in voices speak only English and Chinese. When we reach this next goal, the audio will be available in an extra 4 languages. All of these extra language choices can be easily installed via Bluetooth function.

 

More than just a tracker, Galerdo™ works perfectly as a friendly and personal audio coach on your head under water. This increases motivation for your training and ultimately your swimming skills &
column4:
endurance!

 

Train with Real-Time Progress Updates

Galerdo™ comes with real-time AI Voice Assistant based on Artificial Intelligence and Bone Conduction technology.

The device tracks your swim progress and analyzes it based on our AI technology It also provides voice feedback on distance and time you swam in real time. Tracking swimming activities has never been so easy. Forget counting sheep or other distractions that are hampering your work out!

 

Built-in Artificial Intelligence
column5:
>Built-in AI Voice Assistant for swimming

No need to connect to Internet, WAN or Bluetooth while swimming！

With the built-in swim-specific intelligent algorithm we've created, your real-time lap performance is seamlessly recorded, tracked and analyzed in the Galerdo™ device without delay.

 

Hear Your Favorite Songs   

More than just a tracker, Galerdo™ can also play your favorite songs under water.

With this tracking, speaking and music-playing device, you’ll stay motivated and self-confident to swim longer, faster and better. You'll never feel bored or lonely in the pool again.
column7:
showinfo=0"">
Galerdo™  Beker Pro was designed to have a natural shape like a cowry shell. It is also ultra lightweight enough that you can not only work out with it easily, but will also probably forget you are wearing it! The device will not influence your stroke or speed in water.

column1: The device itself does not contain any straps, cords, wires, headsets, earphones or earbuds to bother your head and ears while swimming. Just put Galerdo™ under your swimming cap and swim. Enoy the tracker in the most comfortable, friendly and easy-to-use way！
The photos below show swimmers putting Galerdo™ under their swim caps instead of clipping it with a goggle strap.

Everyone’s ears are different, right? When you buy wired earbud-based trackers, you may worry whether your earbuds or earphones fit your ears. That's why sometimes you have to buy other earbuds to fit your ears but still feel ear pain or discomfort.   

 

Now, thanks to the cutting-edge bone conduction technology with earbuds-free and earphone-free features, Galerdo™ provides you with a super comfort guarantee for ears and inserts nothing into the ear canal.

●Keeps your ear canal free

●Fits all ear sizes

●No need for extra accessories

 

 

Unlike swimming wristbands that detect your swimming strokes based on the wrist movement, Galerdo™ recognizes your swimming stroke based on the movement of the head, which guarantees a more accurate recognition of swimming strokes.   

No matter if you are swimming Freestyle, Breaststroke, Butterfly or Backstroke, Galerdo™ can perfectly record your data. You can review the history of your swimming data stroke by stroke!

 

We have created the built-in AI algorithms instead of the clunky GPS hardware to measure the distance, because we aim to provide a lightweight autonomous device rather than a heavy and complex one on the head.

Thus Galerdo™ tracking function works perfectly in regular-shaped swimming pools (rectangle or square) and pool length of 17m~50m, but does not work in irregular swimming pools (such as round, heart-shaped, curved, triangle, polygonal, kidney-shaped, free-form, etc.) and open water swimming (rivers, lakes, ocean).

 

The Galerdo™ music function works perfectly in either pool or open water.

 

The Galerdo™ App is free to download and use. It’s compatible with both iOS and Android phones. You will see your detailed data analysis and customize voice notification settings using our dedicated app.

Synchronizing Data to App
Just turn on Bluetooth to seamlessly connect to the Galerdo™ app:
Transfer the data of your swimming workouts from Galerdo™ device to Galerdo™ app.
During your workouts under water, the Voice Assistant notifies you instantly about the distance and time you’ve swum.
After you finish swimming, proceed to synchronization with the App.  You can review a full and comprehensive summary of your swimming workouts by date, month and week.
After each swimming, just check your burned calories in the App and motivate yourself to keep swimming.
It’s awesome for those swimmers who like workouts interrupted by breaks in the pool. The Galerdo™ can automatically detect whether you’re really swimming or just resting in the pool.
You don’t need to turn off Galerdo™ while you are resting, standing or leaning in the pool. The device automatically restarts when you resume swimming.

The built-in Bluetooth V4.2 is designed to synchronize workout data and update the firmware only. You can’t wirelessly download or transmit music files from device to Galerdo™ . All music download to Galerdo™ must be connected with your computer or laptop using a USB cable.

Unit of measurement: meters

Regarding the yard unit system, we are pleased to announce that we are developing the application for it and will upload it in future free of charge.

You can customize your pool length and language in the App:

Length of pool: 17m ~ 50m

Languages of the App interface: English, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese.

Languages of the Voice Assistant: English and Chinese.

And remember, if we reach out goal of $150,000, we’ll be adding 4 more languages to the app free of charge!     

 

 

Hurry! Perks are available only on INDIEGOGO with our discount up to 55% off.

Take advantage of the exclusive Early Bird pricing and be the first to experience the wireless instant audio feedback underwater! 

Free Shipping

We're proud to offer Free Shipping Worldwide to all  all of our backers !

Warranty

We believe in the quality of our products. Galerdo™ gives you a one-year warranty.

Galerdo™ gives you a one-year warranty.",38.0,2,"1 Campaign

Erato Audio strives to engineer the best sounding true wireless audio products on the market without the unnecessary bells and whistles. We're committed to deliver a product you'll love and believe it will become an integral part of your everyday life.

A few months ago, we crowdfunded the Apollo 7 and recently shipped over 20,000 units globally to backers and distributors.  The Apollo 7 received numerous awards including the Honorable Mention Red Dot Award for Design, Mashable's Choice Award, and even earned the Digital Trends' Recommended Product badge of approval.

From the feedback we gathered, our team listened to what's most important and implemented many new features in our latest products. Erato Audio is excited to announce our next generation of true wireless earphones for the first time here on Indiegogo.

column2: >Introducing the Muse 5 and Rio 3

column1: Both the Muse and Rio are designed to be completely wireless.  Enjoy high performance audio without a wire in site - using Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) and aptX™ to bring out quality sound from your digital sources.

The Muse 5 was modeled after the award winning Apollo 7 platform and embodies similar internal characteristics. A common issue with in-ear audio devices in the market today is the seal around the ear canal, which effects sound quality and bass response.

The patented FitSeal™ silicone sleeve creates a truly customized fit for most ear shapes and sizes while optimizing sound quality. Unlike traditional earphones offering only three sizes (S M L), the Muse 5 can be customized into nine different combinations

FitSeal™ offers two key features: Comfortable fit and superior seal. Having a quality seal decreases outside noise and increases bass response. By offering a variety of size combinations with FitSeal™ sleeve technology, we address fit issues seen with other earbuds.

Whether you have a small ear canal and large conch area or a large canal and smaller conch area, we have a solution for you. FitSeal™ sleeves allow the user to use a comfortable tip while securing the ear conch area with the right sleeve creating a quality seal to experience the harmonic music and bass we've designed for you.
With the FitSeal™ sleeves in place, the sleeve only needs to grab on to 2-3 corners of the ear and the silicon will hold the earbud in place without falling out, even in extreme conditions.
Check out the FitSeal™ in action (Shown on three different individuals you can see the tension on the ears being pulled) :

With FitSeal™, it eliminates the discomfort traditional earphones cause over a long period of use. Instead, the sleeve creates a natural seal on the outer ear (conch area)  while holding the earphones in place at the same time.

Traditional stereo earphones create surround sound enabling you to hear individual sounds come from every direction (left, right, front, back) Unfortunately, it does not allow you to evaluate the distance of each sound being emitted and whether a specific sound is close or far.

By using digital sound processing technology in our true wireless earphones, we can restore the spatial distance missing in traditional earphones. Calibrated with our micro-driver and its acoustic chamber, ERATOSURROUND™ can reduce sound image distortion to create a more accurate sound stage.
With our advanced audio technology, we're able to deliver the same experience as heard in expensive over the ear headphones for a fraction of the price.

The Muse 5 has an audio playback of up to 4 hours, however comes with a carrying case with a battery built in to recharge the Muse 5  up to 3 times on the go. The innovative case can be recharged via micro USB cable, included in each Muse 5 package.

One of the most critical factors in true wireless earphones is battery life. We've engineered the Rio 3 to address this common issue in the marketplace. The Rio 3 packs a large lithium battery providing up to 6 hours of audio playback and weighs only 14 grams. Our advanced wireless antenna system is compatible with all Bluetooth 4.0 or higher devices and includes a 14.2 mm Comply Diaphragm Driver for the richest base and harmonic highs.

Best of all, the Rio 3 is designed for the active individual. The earbuds are built for comfort and come with a stabilizing ear hook. Whether you are rock climbing, running a marathon or sparring in the ring, the Rio 3 will never hit the ground while in motion.
Huge, 14.2mm ""Extra Bass"" driver - provides clean and dynamic bass slam.

Our proprietary magnesium/titanium sputtered diaphragm is light and stiff - extending the high frequency beyond 20kHz, yet the proprietary alloy provides excellent self-damping to provide crystal clear clarity.

A diaphragm with soft material can provide clean and dynamic bass response in lower frequency but it acts poor in higher frequency. It needs the rigid material to make the diaphragm to provide crystal clear clarity in higher frequency. So our proprietary comply diaphragm used in Rio 3 is a special alloy of Magnesium/Titanium combo sputtered diaphragm, it shows the rigid characteristics and maintain the diaphragm overall softness to provide the best of both characteristics.
The 14.2mm driver used in Rio 3 provides “Extra Bass” compared to the regular 8mm and/or 10mm drivers.

ERATOSURROUND™ can help recreate audio recordings in its most natural state.  For example, when a pianist is performing, we hear sounds differently as the music enters our ears at different times. Even if it takes a few microseconds for the sound to reach either ear, one ear should hear the tune slightly louder than the other as your ears are positioned closer and further away from the piano.

Recordings can be done in a variety of ways. Some record in stereo with two microphones and others use a binaural recording, where additional microphones are placed to process sound as if was heard live, preserving the audio to create the most realistic experience. While possible with large speakers by splitting it into 5, 7, or even 10 channel surround sound setups, it's difficult in earphones this size. Others have designed headphones with spatial 3D audio by integrating multiple drivers in the headphones but can cost up to hundreds of dollars.

From the beginning it was our intention to create a true wireless audio experience. In bringing this idea to reality we were compelled to address a variety of needs, create multiple designs, and implement a strategy to cultivate a true wireless audio portfolio.

During this process we wanted to create a spectrum of earphones to meet the needs of a variety of customers. By offering an affordable product, an everyday lifestyle product, and a premium luxury product, we will be able to share our technology will millions of people around the world. Since releasing the Apollo 7, we are focusing on the user experience and listening to customer feedback while fine tuning the development of the Rio 3 and Muse 5.

Muse 5 Prototypes During our Design Process

column1: Over the past few months, we've worked hard to create a luxury earphone. We've gathered inputs from hundreds of individuals regarding fit and sound quality to create the most comfortable and optimal audio experience for in-ear earphones.

Michael Chiu (CEO) - 30+ years experience in manufacturing and business mangement for the consumer electronics industry.  Michael has held senior positions at Viewsonic, WYSE, and Adata Technology Co. and have been developing audio solutions for mobile devices since 2012 with Foxconn Technology Group

Randall Lan (Co-Founder) - Co-founded Monolithic Microwave Integrated Circuit (MMIC) in 2003, specializing in Pseudomorphic High Electron Mobility Transistor technology and Multi-Chip Module applications in wireless RF circuit design - crucial to wireless audio technology used today.
Casey Ng (CTO) - Co-founded NuForce, an award winning audiophile grade audio system manufacture, which have sold tens of thousands of performance grade amplifiers, speakers, and earphones.
Bob Smith (Engineering) – Senior audio engineer behind lots of award winning products he designed during his tenure at Nuforce with Casey Ng.
Tom Tsai (Design) – Graduated USC and has designed multiple award winning products since. Tom is the ID Design Leader for Erato Audio and continues to lead a talented team in creating our products.
Taiwan Microelectronics - Erato Wireless Audio Technology owned IC design house specializing in RF and proprietary wireless technology.
We've been working on the finalizing the  Muse 5 and the Rio 3 for last few months.  We recently debuted our prototypes at IFA Berlin early September and received raving feedback.

Unlike many companies in the marketplace running crowdfunding campaigns, we have a proven record and already vetted our manufacturing, design, and development through our distribution of the first generation wireless earphone. Rest assured you will receive  your earphones!
We're set to deliver your Rio 3 and Muse 5 earphones before year end, making these one of the most sought after gifts of the year.

Does it work for iOS or Android products? 
The Muse 5 and Rio 3 works with both Apple and Android as well as other devices that have Bluetooth 4.0 connection or higher.

Can I make phone calls with the Muse 5 or Rio 3? 
Yes. Muse and Rio both have an MEMS omni directional microphone built in and can make hands free calling with both earphones. Only one side will be active for safety regulations in some countries.

Does it have any buttons?
Yes. The Rio has 3 buttons, while the Muse 5 has a single button. Buttons can control volume, tracks, play/stop music, and even activate voice command software such as Siri or Google Now.

Can I swim with these earphones? 
Although water and sweat resistant, it's not recommended for underwater sports.  Bluetooth wireless does not travel underwater - therefore swimming is not recommended.

Do you ship globally? 
We do ship globally - except Brazil and Russia. We have had problems shipping to Russia and Brazil for True Wireless Products.

Do I have to pay tax? 
Yes. We cover global shipping to your location with a signature required shipment, however, due to different VAT and import tax laws you may have to pay import taxes in your country. However due Indiegogo being a pledge, in order to help save your import taxes, the price under shipping invoice will be less when we would ship earbuds to you.  You will be responsible for any VAT taxes that shall arise. We ship with FedEx, UPS, and DHL.
All package or combo packages will have to pay duty taxes as needed.

Is there a warranty? 
We cover a limited 1-year warranty for manufacture defects.

You mentioned 9 combinations of FitSeal, how come there're only 6 pairs shown? 
There are 3 FitSeal sleeves (S M L) and 3 ear tips (S M L) each size ear tip can pair with each size of FitSeal sleeves. 3 x 3 = 9 combinations.
What is the range of the earphones?
The earphones are built with advanced Bluetooth technology. The Rio 3 is built with a 4.2 BT and the Muse 5 a 4.1 BT. The range for the Bluetooth is 33 feet depending on your surroundings.
Can I use only one of the earphones at a time?
Yes, the Rio 3 and Muse 5 each have a master side and can be used on their own.
The Rio 3 has up to 8 hours of talk time and 6 hours of play time. The Muse 5 has up to 7 hours of talk time and 4 hours of play time.
What material are the FitSeal sleeves made of?
Both the sleeves and ear tips are made out of silicone.
What is the MSRP for the Rio 3 and Muse 5?
The MSRP for the Rio 3 is $129.99 and Muse 5 $179.99

The Muse 5’s  can be charged by simply dropping them into its charging case. You will be able to charge them up to 3x while on the go. Make sure your charging case has a battery. Recharge the case by plugging the case into a 5V micro USB charging port. The case can accept up to 2.1A of current.
The Rio 3 has a micro USB split charging-cable making it easy to plug and charge into any USB port.
Will my earphones pair with my Smart Watch?
Yes, our earphones will pair with all smart watches which support Bluetooth 4.1 and above.
When can I pick the colors for my earphones?
At the end of the campaign you will be sent an email with a link that will allow you to select your colors.

","Erato Audio strives to engineer the best sounding true wireless audio products on the market without the unnecessary bells and whistles. We're committed to deliver a product you'll love and believe it will become an integral part of your everyday life.

A few months ago, we crowdfunded the Apollo 7 and recently shipped over 20,000 units globally to backers and distributors.  The Apollo 7 received numerous awards including the Honorable Mention Red Dot Award for Design, Mashable's Choice Award, and even earned the Digital Trends' Recommended Product badge of approval.

From the feedback we gathered, our team listened to what's most important and implemented many new features in our latest products. Erato Audio is excited to announce our next generation of true wireless earphones for the first time here on Indiegogo.

Both the Muse and Rio are designed to be completely wireless.  Enjoy high performance audio without a wire in site - using Advanced Audio Coding (AAC) and aptX™ to bring out quality sound from your digital sources.

The Muse 5 was modeled after the award winning Apollo 7 platform and embodies similar internal characteristics. A common issue with in-ear audio devices in the market today is the seal around the ear canal, which effects sound quality and bass response.

The patented FitSeal™ silicone sleeve creates a truly customized fit for most ear shapes and sizes while optimizing sound quality. Unlike traditional earphones offering only three sizes (S M L), the Muse 5 can be customized into nine different combinations

FitSeal™ offers two key features: Comfortable fit and superior seal. Having a quality seal decreases outside noise and increases bass response. By offering a variety of size combinations with FitSeal™ sleeve technology, we address fit issues seen with other earbuds.Whether you have a small ear canal and large conch area or a large canal and smaller conch area, we have a solution for you. FitSeal™ sleeves allow the user to use a comfortable tip while securing the ear conch area with the right sleeve creating a quality seal to experience the harmonic music and bass we've designed for you.
With the FitSeal™ sleeves in place, the sleeve only needs to grab on to 2-3 corners of the ear and the silicon will hold the earbud in place without falling out, even in extreme conditions.
