When can I pick the colors for my earphones?
At the end of the campaign you will be sent an email with a link that will allow you to select your colors.",37.0,0,"1 Campaign
Earth orphans is a cartoon written by myself Josh, and my writing partner Alex in Norway.
We have been working on the scripts, pitches and character designs for over two years along with my best friend Gareth who is an Artist on Candy Crush and other amazing games.
We are obsessed with cartoons and have been tasked to create a pilot radio play of the cartoon with our cast (Nancy from the Play That Goes Wrong and Em who is a multiple award-winning actor).
Having the entire season outlined, 4 pilot scripts written and all the main characters designed, the only thing stopping us is funding.

By funding a radio play of the pilot we can finally pitch our cartoon to my contacts at Cartoon Network and Nickelodeon with the idea of developing the full pilot then eventually the entire first season!
If we reach our goal we can make that large creative step into realizing our world, characters and actually get the chance to make this cartoon.

• The funds will go to booking the sound studio and the sound designer to create the actual radio play to be sent out with the season outline, artistic treatment and scripts straight to agents and producers to major cartoon studios.
• You will get a choice of original printed character concept art, radio play downloads, scripts prints and credits for the entire cartoon series.
• If we do not reach our goal, I will personally fill the financial gaps to ensure the creation of the radio play.
• If we achieve funding for the series, we plan on opening a studio that focuses on creating more animated passion projects and even games.

• We are a team of award-winning writers, directors, animators, and artists with 40 years of collective experience. Director Josh Trigg has won multiple film awards namely for his charity film for the National Autistic Society which gathered 70 million views on Facebook.
• Please feel free to message me on Instagram @joshfilmdirector and ask me questions about Earth Orphans. I am also happy to pick up the phone or meet for a coffee.
• The project will be supported by our film production company based in London and Singapore, Geronimo Boy Film.

The risk is that we don't get traction after we create a pilot episode. But we are ready to take feedback from producers at CN and Nick and make those changes that need to be made with the idea of improving (if need be) and are willing to keep pushing. This is a project we have invested years into already and will not stop until it is made
We are aware not everyone has the funds to help. However there are other ways you can help! If you are able to share this project and generate any interest for us it would be massively appreciated!
Earth orphans is a cartoon written by myself Josh, and my writing partner Alex in Norway.
We have been working on the scripts, pitches and character designs for over two years along with my best friend Gareth who is an Artist on Candy Crush and other amazing games.
We are obsessed with cartoons and have been tasked to create a pilot radio play of the cartoon with our cast (Nancy from the Play That Goes Wrong and Em who is a multiple award-winning actor).
Having the entire season outlined, 4 pilot scripts written and all the main characters designed, the only thing stopping us is funding.

By funding a radio play of the pilot we can finally pitch our cartoon to my contacts at Cartoon Network and Nickelodeon with the idea of developing the full pilot then eventually the entire first season!
If we reach our goal we can make that large creative step into realizing our world, characters and actually get the chance to make this cartoon.
What We Need & What You Get

The funds will go to booking the sound studio and the sound designer to create the actual radio play to be sent out with the season outline, artistic treatment and scripts straight to agents and producers to major cartoon studios.
You will get a choice of original printed character concept art, radio play downloads, scripts prints and credits for the entire cartoon series.
If we do not reach our goal, I will personally fill the financial gaps to ensure the creation of the radio play.
If we achieve funding for the series, we plan on opening a studio that focuses on creating more animated passion projects and even games.

We are a team of award-winning writers, directors, animators, and artists with 40 years of collective experience. Director Josh Trigg has won multiple film awards namely for his charity film for the National Autistic Society which gathered 70 million views on Facebook.
Please feel free to message me on Instagram @joshfilmdirector and ask me questions about Earth Orphans. I am also happy to pick up the phone or meet for a coffee.
The project will be supported by our film production company based in London and Singapore, Geronimo Boy Film.

The risk is that we don't get traction after we create a pilot episode. But we are ready to take feedback from producers at CN and Nick and make those changes that need to be made with the idea of improving (if need be) and are willing to keep pushing. This is a project we have invested years into already and will not stop until it is made

We are aware not everyone has the funds to help. However there are other ways you can help! If you are able to share this project and generate any interest for us it would be massively appreciated!",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Enter the mind of John Keogh, a young boy who just wants to smooch girls. John has been living a life of not smooching girls which is a total bummer. But now John has found a girl, problem is she lives like rly far away. John just wants to smooch this girl and it is not fun for him.

Now imagine being Autumn Sky, a girl with a dream. A dream to smooch. A dream to smooch this boy, but the world divides them. Their hearts belong together but she is stuck motionless. A soul fractured in two, a heart lost but was never found, a love held back by time. But that all can be changed.

Now we have created this campaign to fly this girl out and have john be able to live his dreams. This boy wants to feel human emotions, how can we deny him of this? How can we stand idle while john withers away? John lives in all of us, imagine being a teen again, the stress, the pressure, all of that. Now imagine a community came together and made an effort to improve your life. You can make that happen, you can help this boy live his life with a smile on his face. This is about more than one boy, it's about proving that we as a people can come together and bring joy to this cruel world, now please I urge you to donate whatever you can so the plane ticket can be bought and the girl can come ovr.

One Bluetooth-enabled device, such as your smartphone, can connect with one or two Cannons at the same time via Bluetooth, and the two speakers will automatically match to left and right channel to create a clear stereo sound. It sits snugly within the palm of your hand, making it very convenient to carry around. The Cannon portable TWS Bluetooth 5.0 speaker will excite you with enhanced audio performance, six hours playtime powered by a rechargeable battery, and noise-reduction built-in mic which supports hands-free phone calls, all in a compact body. Cannon is just perfect for backyard movie nights, parties, travels and a variety of indoor and outdoor activities.

 

 ENJOY TRUE WIRELESS STEREO SOUNDS

 

If you have two Cannon speakers, you can use the TWS function to pair them together to have one play the left channel and the other as the right channel for full stereo sound. The two speakers can be easily and quickly connected via Bluetooth by pressing the button on the side. What’s more great about this stereo mode is that you can mount either speaker to any location you like, to fill the room much better with a more airy and open sound than any other comparable speaker.   

 

Cannon is small in size, but powerful in sound. Cannon features a full metal body, which can deliver a much louder and clearer sound. The sleek design makes it not just a powerful speaker, but also a decoration that can be brought anywhere.

 

 

It doesn’t really matter what you’re doing—partying, hiking, camping, having dinner or hanging out. When a speaker this small sounds this amazing, you’ll never want to leave it behind. You can easily take it along in your hand, pocket, or bag. Wherever you need music, Cannon is ready to keep pace with all of your adventures and delivers unparalleled sound for its lightweight.  

 

 

Cannon features Bluetooth 5.0 for a stable and consistent connection up to 33 feet away and high quality music streaming. You will not experience any connection losses, interference or dips in sound quality within the Bluetooth range. 

 

You will be truly impressed with the sound of Cannon, for it pumps out high quality, crystal clear, full-range sound with crisp highs, detailed midrange and punchy bass without even the slightest distortion when cranking up to maximum volume. The enhanced bass response stays where it should be without muddying into the midrange frequencies or overwhelming the other frequency ranges, and you can see the radiator vibrating like mini-subwoofer.  

 

 

Cannon comes with a 500mAh rechargeable lithium battery that provides 6 hours of continuous music playtime on a single charge which is pretty incredible considering the small size of this speaker. You can play up to 120 songs before needing to recharge and the speaker recharges relatively quickly. Cannon has battery life long enough for you to take around outdoors, for travel, or to keep the party going throughout the night.  

 

 

The outer body of Cannon is made of a whole piece of premium steel that forms an enclosure to produce a more genuine sound and deliver it to 360-degree range than the ones made of plastic or wood. The phenomenal audio performance makes Cannon suitable for setting up home theatre to provide cinematic sound. It is your go-to accessory for conjuring the magic out of music. 

 

Cannon comes with a high-definition built-in microphone which allows you to conveniently take hands-free calls on your mobile device from virtually anywhere without delay. By pressing the button on the side, you can easily pick up/hang up the incoming calls.  

 

The LED lights that surround the outer rim of the speaker at the bottom are nice to look at and they flash in different ways depending on whether the speaker is charging, paired or playing music. Cannon is designed to literally rock a party especially at night with its beautiful lighting.

 

The exterior metallic finish looks and sharp LED lights of Cannon are incredibly eye-catchy. The minimalist and rugged design is not only cool to look at, but also improves the durability of the speaker. 

 

Cannon is compatible with virtually any Bluetooth enabled device including iPhone, Android smartphones, iPads, tablets and laptops. The speaker pairs with your music sources in a matter of seconds and automatically pairs with the last device when turned on.

>

","One Bluetooth-enabled device, such as your smartphone, can connect with one or two Cannons at the same time via Bluetooth, and the two speakers will automatically match to left and right channel to create a clear stereo sound. It sits snugly within the palm of your hand, making it very convenient to carry around. The Cannon portable TWS Bluetooth 5.0 speaker will excite you with enhanced audio performance, six hours playtime powered by a rechargeable battery, and noise-reduction built-in mic which supports hands-free phone calls, all in a compact body. Cannon is just perfect for backyard movie nights, parties, travels and a variety of indoor and outdoor activities.  ENJOY TRUE WIRELESS STEREO SOUNDS If you have two Cannon speakers, you can use the TWS function to pair them together to have one play the left channel and the other as the right channel for full stereo sound. The two speakers can be easily and quickly connected via Bluetooth by pressing the button on the side. What’s more great about this stereo mode is that you can mount either speaker to any location you like, to fill the room much better with a more airy and open sound than any other comparable speaker.    Cannon is small in size, but powerful in sound. Cannon features a full metal body, which can deliver a much louder and clearer sound. The sleek design makes it not just a powerful speaker, but also a decoration that can be brought anywhere.  It doesn’t really matter what you’re doing—partying, hiking, camping, having dinner or hanging out. When a speaker this small sounds this amazing, you’ll never want to leave it behind. You can easily take it along in your hand, pocket, or bag. Wherever you need music, Cannon is ready to keep pace with all of your adventures and delivers unparalleled sound for its lightweight.    Cannon features Bluetooth 5.0 for a stable and consistent connection up to 33 feet away and high quality music streaming. You will not experience any connection losses, interference or dips in sound quality within the Bluetooth range.  You will be truly impressed with the sound of Cannon, for it pumps out high quality, crystal clear, full-range sound with crisp highs, detailed midrange and punchy bass without even the slightest distortion when cranking up to maximum volume. The enhanced bass response stays where it should be without muddying into the midrange frequencies or overwhelming the other frequency ranges, and you can see the radiator vibrating like mini-subwoofer.    Cannon comes with a 500mAh rechargeable lithium battery that provides 6 hours of continuous music playtime on a single charge which is pretty incredible considering the small size of this speaker. You can play up to 120 songs before needing to recharge and the speaker recharges relatively quickly. Cannon has battery life long enough for you to take around outdoors, for travel, or to keep the party going throughout the night.    The outer body of Cannon is made of a whole piece of premium steel that forms an enclosure to produce a more genuine sound and deliver it to 360-degree range than the ones made of plastic or wood. The phenomenal audio performance makes Cannon suitable for setting up home theatre to provide cinematic sound. It is your go-to accessory for conjuring the magic out of music.  Cannon comes with a high-definition built-in microphone which allows you to conveniently take hands-free calls on your mobile device from virtually anywhere without delay. By pressing the button on the side, you can easily pick up/hang up the incoming calls.   The LED lights that surround the outer rim of the speaker at the bottom are nice to look at and they flash in different ways depending on whether the speaker is charging, paired or playing music. Cannon is designed to literally rock a party especially at night with its beautiful lighting. The exterior metallic finish looks and sharp LED lights of Cannon are incredibly eye-catchy. The minimalist and rugged design is not only cool to look at, but also improves the durability of the speaker.  Cannon is compatible with virtually any Bluetooth enabled device including iPhone, Android smartphones, iPads, tablets and laptops. The speaker pairs with your music sources in a matter of seconds and automatically pairs with the last device when turned on.  TEST VIDEO  DESIGNERS' DRAFT    White    Red     Black​  PERKS",32.0,1,"1 Campaign

column1: What do you do when friends fall asleep to the sound of your voice?

After many years of being left hanging on the phone...""Hello? Hello? Are you still there? Are you SLEEP?""...I've decided to use over a dozen years of experience as a professional writer and audiobook narrator to create a product centered on this unusual skill--putting folks to sleep with the sound of my voice. THE GROWN-UP WIND DOWN is a unique mp3 download series that is designed to chill out, calm down, and relax your nerves.

Inspired by nature, the collection contains five (5) short stories, written in poetic free verse, all approximately 15 minutes in length. So it's a little over an hour of soothing storytelling whose sole purpose is to promote rest, relaxation and a sound sleep.

It's a niche market that is virtually untapped. There are thousands of meditative downloads that include music, nature sounds, raindrops and waterfalls, but nothing quite like THE GROWN-UP WIND DOWN. By donating, you'll be the first to take part in the development of an innovative breakthrough in the audiobook industry. THE GROWN-UP WIND DOWN gives adult listeners an alternative to similar meditative products. This mp3 audio download is a nostalgic trip back to your childhood when storytelling and sleeptime went hand in hand.
Think of it as bedtime stories for adults. And these aren't stories you've heard before. It's all original. All new. All specifically designed with relaxation in mind.

As a writer, I've written everything from poetry to essays to books and stage plays. Most recently, I've published several works of literary nonfiction centered on jazz. I am the author of the critically-acclaimed biography HAZEL SCOTT: The Pioneering Journey of a Jazz Pianist from Café Society to Hollywood to HUAC (University of Michigan Press). JAZZ TIMES wrote: ""Perhaps the highest compliment one can pay to this fine biography is that during the first 150 pages the reader is wondering why Scott isn’t better known, at least in the jazz world. But by the story’s end…the same reader knows exactly why, but is still likely to be singing her praises as a true trailblazer in African-American culture.""

I also co-authored I WISH YOU LOVE, the jazz memoir of legendary vocalist, Gloria Lynne (St. Martin’s Press). The autobiography was a critical success, receiving an outstanding review from the industry journal, Publishers Weekly, which stated:  “Full of gossip, exclamation and vernacular, it’s a book that demands to be read out loud.  This is a moving tribute to the crucible of Harlem jazz.” As a contributor to the recent publication AIN’T NOTHING LIKE THE REAL THING: How the Apollo Theater Shaped American Entertainment (Smithsonian Books), my essay on blues legend Bessie Smith is featured.

My work as an actor runs the gamut--from film to tv to theater. I often joke that I write to support my acting habit. But really, it's the other way around. My voice has been my 'ace in the hole,' my bread-and-butter, my steady source for over a decade when tv/film &
column2: theater work wasn't exactly 'on and poppin'.  I've been fortunate enough to work as a voiceover actor and narrator for over 13 years. My voice can be heard on numerous national network television, radio and internet advertising campaigns. (Check out V/O samples on my professional website www.karen-chilton.com) I've narrated dozens and dozens of audiobooks (I've actually lost count)
column3: some recent notable books include THE NEW JIM CROW by Michelle Alexander, HARLEM IS NOWHERE by Sharifa Rhodes-Pitts, STANDING TALL by C. Vivian Stringer, listed as one of Publishers Weekly’s Best Audiobooks of 2008, and I’VE GOT A HOME IN GLORY LAND for which I received the Audiofile Golden Earphones Award.

• Development of THE GROWN-UP WIND DOWN app for smartphones

The creative process has already begun. After all, putting pen to paper is free. The stories are already taking shape, and once complete, it's off to the studio I go...with your help. Donations at all levels are welcome, necessary and much appreciated!
Perks include a free mp3 download, tea cups, silkscreens...well, you'll see. Check it out below and find the level that suits you.
Please feel free to share this campaign with family, friends, colleagues, in-laws, co-workers, or whoever you think you could use a little rest &
column2: relaxation and finds this idea a groovy enterprise. It's about the buzz--send an email, a text, your word-of-mouth will do wonders for this work. And STAY TUNED! THE GROWN-UP WIND DOWN is coming soon to some headphones near you.

column2: >＃Update: 100K Stretch Goal Reached, Unlock Charging Case, Thank you all!
column3: >#Update: Over 50 % funded in 24 hours with Guideline for choosing frames and lenses.
column5:
>

Meet LET Glass, the innovative spectacles that combine headphones and glasses to offer you the most convenient solution for audio entertainment and visual protection. More than just a pair of glasses, LET Glass allows you to use your cellphone without touching it and control your smart home devices like Amazon's Echo. Additionally, LET Glass is available in different lens and frame options to meet everyone's needs.
column6:
>—  At a Glance  —

By integrating Alexa and activating Siri or Google Now, LET Glass lets you control smart home devices, search online information and make phone calls, simply by talking to or tapping on your glasses.
column7: >In The Press
column8:
>Dismiss Your Headphone

 

Always worrying about dropping your headphone during sports or being bothered by the tangled cords? LET Glass is embedded with bone conduction earphone to offer you a wireless listening experience tailored for outdoor activities. 

Meanwhile, it will track your steps, distance, and calories burned, and keep a record of your activity results.

Moreover, it can provide GPS directions, weather reports, and accurate time, so that your attention is focused on the road and avoid unnecessary distractions.
column9:
>—  Protect Your Eardrums  —

Human eardrums are extremely sensitive. Listening with bone conduction earphones minimizes the potential damages a pair of traditional earphones could cause to your hearing ability.
column10:
>—  Unblock Your Ears   —

Bone conduction earphones allow you to listen to stereo sound without blocking your ears. You are able to stay aware of your surroundings. Enjoy a safer audio experience.
column11:
>—  About Bone Conduction  —

Most of the sound we hear is actually sound waves transmitted through the air eventually reaching our eardrums. The sound waves make eardrums vibrate and then transmit the signals into our inner ears. Bone conduction is another way for us to hear the sound. Sound waves are transmitted to the inner ear through the bone vibration of the skull, without reaching to eardrums first. It’s like a shortcut to the brain.
column14:
>Listen to Audio Without Anyone Knowing It

LET Labs contains experts with valuable experience in bone conduction technology and artificial intelligence. Bone conduction technology developed by LET Labs has been granted a Utility Models Patent in 2015 because of its incredibly small size and multi-functionality, so that you can use the almost invisible bone conduction module on your LET Glass to listen to audio without anyone knowing it.
column15: >What They Are Saying About LET Glass
column20: >""Adjusting the volume and searching the song is as easy as tapping it once!""

column2: >""The quality of the sound is really good! And it's really easy to change music!""
>""Wow! I can't believe I'm actually listening to music! This is really advanced technology!""

column1: After connecting your compatible smart home devices to the App, you can easily control them with a voice request. Simply speak into LET VisionAI Glasses' built-in mic, and your voice command will be carried out lightning fast.
On your way home, you can ask LET Glass to turn on the heating to warm your house or open the garage door to park your car.
Control of your home is no longer limited by your location. LET Glass provides a more flexible means of interacting with compatible smart devices.

column2: >Demo Video—Do Whatever You'd Like with LET VisionAI Glasses!

column1: Voice AI is the Artificial Intelligence Technology that recognizes voices and translates them into text instructions based on deep learning and neural networks. The text instructions will conduct a search through a cloud program and big data network and then present the result in the form of voices.
The more frequent you communicate with LET VisionAI Glasses, the more familiar the glasses become with your speech patterns and preferences.

What's more. LET VisionAI Glasses can learn to understand your habits and behaviors via the deep learning system. For example, if you ask LET VisionAI Glasses report weather for you every day then after a while LET VisionAI Glasses will automatically provide weather information to you at the time you usually check for weather. And it can also provide you traffic information of the road you often drive on as well as updating you with a restaurant's discount option when you walk by the restaurant.

column2: >AUTO Switch via Detection Sensor

column1:
LET VisionAI Glasses detects your motion. They automatically turn on when you put them on your head and power off when you take them down.

Infrequent charging is what we aim for. LET VisionAI Glasses features long-lasting batteries. Standby time is up to 10 days.
column2:
>  = ZERO Waste VR-Ready Package = 

LET VisionAI Glasses were cleverly designed to transform the box into a pair of VR glasses like the Google Cardboard. We made ZERO waste one of our design initiatives, so we designed the packaging to minimize waste and enhance the user experience.
column3:
>= Magnetic Charging =

Different from traditional charging cable, a magnetic connector enables fast charging with effortless one-hand charging connection. When you place the connector near the glasses leg, it automatically sticks to the port on it. This small and slim magnetic charger makes interaction with LET Glass even simpler and easier. 

LET VisionAI Glasses have a built-in Lithium-Ion battery battery. As usual, the typical estimated life of a Lithium-Ion battery is about two to three years or 300 to 500 charge cycles, whichever occurs first. One charge cycle is a period of use from fully charged, to fully discharged, and fully recharged again.
column4: >= Sleek Design =
column6: >= Valued beyond its Price =

column1:
Choose Your Glasses

We’re partnering with an FDA-certified lens manufacturer to provide you with the lenses you need.
column2:
>—  Frame Options  —

LET Glass comes in 3 choices of frames: Basic, Modern and Vintage. Each frame reflects a unique lifestyle and personality. You can select the frame that best mirrors your characters, and wear them as a functional accessory.

Note: the BASIC comes with half frame, the MODERN is round, and the VINTAGE is somewhat square. You can choose the style according to your preference.
column3:
> — Lens Option  —

We designed different types of lens for LET VisionAI Glasses. If you have been bothered by blue light emitting from the computer screen, a pair of blue light filtering lenses could shield your eyes from the harmful effects. 

If you want to get rid of glare reflected from natural light, polarized lenses could be the solution.

If you are a fan of photochromic transition lens, they are offered as a premium option. You could add a single prescription to photochromic transition lens or just keep it as plain glasses.

 After our campaign closes, we’ll send out a survey for you to customize your prescription lenses.
column6: >What's In The Box
column7: >Perks
column10:
>—  Aim for Key Values and Utility  —

Remember the last time you went jogging? Your phone was well fastened to your arm with the wired earbuds placed in your ears. As you ran forward, the wire from the earphones likley kept getting in the way of the natural swing of your arms. On the flip side, a small pair of bluetooth earbuds could fall out of your ears and get lost while exercising. And if the sun was out, you likely wore a pair of sunglasses to deflect some of the glare coming from the sun’s light. Now there is a new product that combines earsbuds and glasses into one revolutionary device: LET VisionAI Glasses.

column2:
>Testing and debugging

LET Lab designed a pair of glasses that integrates voice interaction, calls and music to meet the challenges of an active lifestyle.

With LET VisionAI Glasses, you no longer have to worry about getting distracted while driving when you want to activate the GPS navigation system. And you can quickly answer an incoming call without scrambling to find your phone. By simply tapping it, LET VisionAI Glasses make multitasking a simpler and more efficient process.
column3:
>About the Team

We're a startup company focusing on smart hardware development, aiming to build the highest-quality and most cost-effective audio-visual products for consumers. Our team gathered a group of innovative engineers who have years of experience in the manufacturing and development areas.

Inspired by the AI technology, we designed LET VisionAI Glasses to re-define what a pair of glasses can do. As our research keeps moving forward, more cutting-edge consumer products from LET Lab will improve your life!

Campaign by
column4: >
column9:
>FAQ

Q: Will Bone Conduction Harm My Brain?

A: Bone conduction is a very common phenomenon. For one, when you covered your ears, you can hear the sound of your voice through bone conduction. For another, some bone conduction hearing aid has been approved by FDA, suggesting that it will not do any harm to human body. 

Q: Are the glasses waterproof?

A: LET Glasses come with an IP65 waterproof rate, which means they can be used in an outside setting and are water-resistant but they are not waterproof and are not suitable to be submerged. 

Q: How long is the battery?

A: The standby is 10 days. For normal use like taking phone calls and listening to music for 1 hour per day. It can last 2-3 days.

Q: When the prescription details and survey will be required?

A: We will send a survey as soon as our campaign ends to confirm shipping address and prescription details, but you will still be able to edit your information before we ship in May 2018.

Q: What's the differences between the different frames? How can I choose between them?

You may find the size details of the 3 frames under the section ""Choose Your Glasses"" of our campaign page. To specify, the BASIC comes with half frame, the MODERN is round, and the VINTAGE is somewhat square. You can choose it according to your preference.

Q: I have myopia. I need to wear glasses with prescription lenses. How can I get them?
A: After the event, we will send out a questionnaire asking for each backer’s prescription information and our lens manufacturer will produce the lenses according to your requests.

Q: Which type of lenses should I choose?
A: If you have myopia, then choose the photochromic transition lens with a prescription, if you do not need to correct vision and prefer to wear them as sunglasses, you can choose non-corrective photochromic transition lens. If you like outdoor activities, you can choose the polarized lens.

Q: Can I replace the original lenses with my own lenses?
A: It depends on which frame style you choose. BASIC is half-framed, so basically you cannot change it on your own. You need to find a professional for the exchange. The other two styles (MODERN and VINTAGE) are full-framed, and you can change them by yourself with our interchangeable lenses. For example, if you need to change the blue-light-filtering lenses to the polarized lenses, you can change it by yourself. 

Q: How can I choose the style and color of the glasses? When can I choose them?
A: After the campaign, we will send a questionnaire to each backer to collect your preference request and other related information.

Q: What is the range available for prescription lenses?
A:   SPH: 0/-8.00 CYL: 0/-2.00

Q: Are there more lens options in addition to the polarized lens and the regular/corrective photochromic transition lens?
A: Currently we only offer these three types of lens, since they are the most commonly used lens type.

Q: Can I use it as my headset?
A: Yes in most cases. The bone conduction technology transfers sound through the bone of our skull, so it does not block our ears. You can still hear the surroundings while listening to the sound from LET Glass, assuring you a safe experience.

Q: Are there lens for correcting astigmatism?
A: Yes. You can choose the Photochromic transition lens and specify the degree of astigmatism (0~-2.00) you need in the questionnaire we will send you.

Q: Is there a warranty?
A: We provide a one-year warranty for product defects

Q: What types of phones are LET Glass compatible with?
A: LET glasses are compatible with phones with an Andriod or iOS system.

Q: Does it come with a charger?
A: No. but it comes with a magnetic power cord with a standard Type A USB interface.
column10:
>Risks and Challenges

1. Glasses Prescription

We provide prescription lenses for photochromic transition lens. It is a big challenge for us because everyone has a different degree of myopia, different IPD, so every pair of glasses is customized. To solve this problem, we need every backer to provide us the correct prescription, including the degree of myopia, the degree of astigmatism, IPD and other related information.

2. Shipping Risk

Since our AI glasses are electronic products that contain lithium batteries inside, shipping by Air is not an option for LET glasses going to certain countries. Backers from these countries have to expect a longer delivery time, since their packages can only be mailed by Sea.

3. Regulatory compliance

In the United States, myopia glasses are considered medical devices that require FDA certification. Our lens has FDA certification, but we need to apply for FDA certification for the frame. We will work with our manufacturers to obtain the FDA certificate.

4. FCC/CE

Up to now, we have completed production and functional verification of the prototype. We will then go through FCC / CE testing and certification. In this phase, it is possible that we identify some unexpected design flaws. If it happens, we have to optimize our design based on the testing result.

Promoted By

One charge cycle is a period of use from fully charged, to fully discharged, and fully recharged again. = Sleek Design = = Valued beyond its Price =

Choose Your GlassesWe’re partnering with an FDA-certified lens manufacturer to provide you with the lenses you need.—  Frame Options  —LET Glass comes in 3 choices of frames: Basic, Modern and Vintage. Each frame reflects a unique lifestyle and personality. You can select the frame that best mirrors your characters, and wear them as a functional accessory.Note: the BASIC comes with half frame, the MODERN is round, and the VINTAGE is somewhat square. You can choose the style according to your preference.  — Lens Option  —We designed different types of lens for LET VisionAI Glasses. If you have been bothered by blue light emitting from the computer screen, a pair of blue light filtering lenses could shield your eyes from the harmful effects. If you want to get rid of glare reflected from natural light, polarized lenses could be the solution.If you are a fan of photochromic transition lens, they are offered as a premium option. You could add a single prescription to photochromic transition lens or just keep it as plain glasses. After our campaign closes, we’ll send out a survey for you to customize your prescription lenses.Specifications  What's In The BoxPerks Timeline Product Story—  Aim for Key Values and Utility  —Remember the last time you went jogging? Your phone was well fastened to your arm with the wired earbuds placed in your ears. As you ran forward, the wire from the earphones likley kept getting in the way of the natural swing of your arms. On the flip side, a small pair of bluetooth earbuds could fall out of your ears and get lost while exercising. And if the sun was out, you likely wore a pair of sunglasses to deflect some of the glare coming from the sun’s light. Now there is a new product that combines earsbuds and glasses into one revolutionary device: LET VisionAI Glasses.

Testing and debuggingLET Lab designed a pair of glasses that integrates voice interaction, calls and music to meet the challenges of an active lifestyle.With LET VisionAI Glasses, you no longer have to worry about getting distracted while driving when you want to activate the GPS navigation system. And you can quickly answer an incoming call without scrambling to find your phone. By simply tapping it, LET VisionAI Glasses make multitasking a simpler and more efficient process. About the TeamWe're a startup company focusing on smart hardware development, aiming to build the highest-quality and most cost-effective audio-visual products for consumers. Our team gathered a group of innovative engineers who have years of experience in the manufacturing and development areas.Inspired by the AI technology, we designed LET VisionAI Glasses to re-define what a pair of glasses can do. As our research keeps moving forward, more cutting-edge consumer products from LET Lab will improve your life!Campaign by   FAQQ: Will Bone Conduction Harm My Brain?A: Bone conduction is a very common phenomenon. For one, when you covered your ears, you can hear the sound of your voice through bone conduction. For another, some bone conduction hearing aid has been approved by FDA, suggesting that it will not do any harm to human body. Q: Are the glasses waterproof?A: LET Glasses come with an IP65 waterproof rate, which means they can be used in an outside setting and are water-resistant but they are not waterproof and are not suitable to be submerged. Q: How long is the battery?A: The standby is 10 days. For normal use like taking phone calls and listening to music for 1 hour per day. It can last 2-3 days.Q: When the prescription details and survey will be required?A: We will send a survey as soon as our campaign ends to confirm shipping address and prescription details, but you will still be able to edit your information before we ship in May 2018.Q: What's the differences between the different frames? How can I choose between them?You may find the size details of the 3 frames under the section ""Choose Your Glasses"" of our campaign page. To specify, the BASIC comes with half frame, the MODERN is round, and the VINTAGE is somewhat square. You can choose it according to your preference.Q: I have myopia. I need to wear glasses with prescription lenses. How can I get them?A: After the event, we will send out a questionnaire asking for each backer’s prescription information and our lens manufacturer will produce the lenses according to your requests.Q: Which type of lenses should I choose?A: If you have myopia, then choose the photochromic transition lens with a prescription, if you do not need to correct vision and prefer to wear them as sunglasses, you can choose non-corrective photochromic transition lens. If you like outdoor activities, you can choose the polarized lens.Q: Can I replace the original lenses with my own lenses?A: It depends on which frame style you choose. BASIC is half-framed, so basically you cannot change it on your own. You need to find a professional for the exchange. The other two styles (MODERN and VINTAGE) are full-framed, and you can change them by yourself with our interchangeable lenses. For example, if you need to change the blue-light-filtering lenses to the polarized lenses, you can change it by yourself. Q: How can I choose the style and color of the glasses? When can I choose them?A: After the campaign, we will send a questionnaire to each backer to collect your preference request and other related information.Q: What is the range available for prescription lenses?A:   SPH: 0/-8.00 CYL: 0/-2.00Q: Are there more lens options in addition to the polarized lens and the regular/corrective photochromic transition lens?A: Currently we only offer these three types of lens, since they are the most commonly used lens type.Q: Can I use it as my headset?A: Yes in most cases. The bone conduction technology transfers sound through the bone of our skull, so it does not block our ears. You can still hear the surroundings while listening to the sound from LET Glass, assuring you a safe experience.Q: Are there lens for correcting astigmatism?A: Yes. You can choose the Photochromic transition lens and specify the degree of astigmatism (0~-2.00) you need in the questionnaire we will send you.Q: Is there a warranty?A: We provide a one-year warranty for product defectsQ: What types of phones are LET Glass compatible with?A: LET glasses are compatible with phones with an Andriod or iOS system.Q: Does it come with a charger?A: No. but it comes with a magnetic power cord with a standard Type A USB interface. Risks and Challenges1. Glasses PrescriptionWe provide prescription lenses for photochromic transition lens. It is a big challenge for us because everyone has a different degree of myopia, different IPD, so every pair of glasses is customized. To solve this problem, we need every backer to provide us the correct prescription, including the degree of myopia, the degree of astigmatism, IPD and other related information.2. Shipping RiskSince our AI glasses are electronic products that contain lithium batteries inside, shipping by Air is not an option for LET glasses going to certain countries. Backers from these countries have to expect a longer delivery time, since their packages can only be mailed by Sea.3. Regulatory complianceIn the United States, myopia glasses are considered medical devices that require FDA certification. Our lens has FDA certification, but we need to apply for FDA certification for the frame. We will work with our manufacturers to obtain the FDA certificate.4. FCC/CEUp to now, we have completed production and functional verification of the prototype. We will then go through FCC / CE testing and certification. In this phase, it is possible that we identify some unexpected design flaws. If it happens, we have to optimize our design based on the testing result.Promoted By",40.0,7,"1 Campaign

column3:
>

Be in two worlds at once. Get lost in your favorite songs and have full awareness of your outside surrounding when you want it. Firefly offers a premium Graphene sound, an ambient sound feature that filters in external noise for extra safety during sports, and especially designed ear fit for longterm comfort.

With it’s 16 hours play time, fast charging capabilities, and an unbreakable Bluetooth 5.0 connection, you will never miss a beat again.

column1: Studies found 8% of pedestrians accidents in urban cities are caused by the usage of electronics. We want to decrease this number and especially engineered a situational awareness feature to do so. The feature enables external sounds to filter in to let runners, cyclists, and daily commuters stay alert while still listening to their favorite music.

column2: >
column3: >Enable ambient sound: Double tap the right MF button

column2: >
column3: >Increase volume: Keep pressing the right button. Decrease volume: Keep pressing the left button. Next track: Press the left MF button for 2 secs

column2: >
column3: >Pick up a call: Press the right MF button once

column2: >
column3: >Auto-reconnect: Take the Firefly out from charging case, it will reconnect in few seconds.

column1: Along with an intuitive control system, Firefly lets you stay powered for up to 16 hours. Unlike other wireless earphones, we worked closely with our suppliers to engineer the best performing battery technology on the market.
With just a 10 minute charge, enjoy up to 2 hours of playtime or 4 hours of premium music with only a 30-minute charge. And the Firefly also comes with USB Type-C charging case and cable.
Compatible with Siri and Google Assistant, access your personal assistants with its quick and easy access button function.

Get all the information delivered straight to your ears. Plan a beach trip with friends hands-free. Access Siri or Google Assistant with a single tap to see what the weather is like and who’s free this weekend.

Bike, climb, lift, or hike without the fear of losing your earphones. With more than 14 years of experience, we have designed the best ear tips to perfectly fit your ears without falling even during the most rigorous activities. Tested with 100+ human ears, the Firefly has the best fit for all-day comfort.
Note: If you lose one Firefly earphone, we sell individual earphones as well.

To accompany the best fitting earphones, we had to incorporate the finest sound quality. Firefly utilized Graphene to construct a rigid nanomembrane that’s 100 times harder than steel with only a fraction of the weight. By doing so, it improves the sound quality, treble enhancements, noise isolation, and overall sound quality.

column2: >

column1: Don’t you hate it when the sound doesn’t sync up with the video? Sound latency and unstable connections are always major problems for Bluetooth devices. However, with Firefly’s ultra-stable Bluetooth connectivity, that’s a thing of the past.

It’s engineered with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 connection and has a functioning range of up to 33 ft, 2 times faster connection and data transmission speed compared to Bluetooth 4.2, so you’ll never have to miss a sound again.
And with its automatic pairing software, just take your Firefly out of its case and they will automatically connect to the previously paired device in less than a second.

column2: >
column3: >The Firefly is equipped with IPX5 water-proof.

column1: Keep your earphones dry while you’re not. Firefly is IPX5 waterproof. This means Firefly can withstand the pressure of a gushing nozzle for at least 3 mins. You might not encounter gushing nozzles anytime soon, but can now feel at ease when it rains.

Unlike other earphones that break due to water, sweat corrosion or air moisture, Firefly also adopted a patented water safe nano coating by LIQUIPEL to protect against all the elements. Now, you can get wet, but your earphones doesn’t have to.
Combined with the ambient sound technology, Firefly is here to keep your pump and safe while you’re hiking, climbing, running, biking, or anything else you’re into.
Give people your full attention. At Firefly, we have engineered the latest telecommunication technology to free you from any restrictions. Make calls and talk conveniently through both the earphones.
Making it as easy as possible, we’ve included everything you need to connect and activate the Firefly earphones immediately.

column2: >
>
column3: >Temperature and salt spray test of Firefly

column2: >

column1: Our footprints can be found in exhibitions across the world in the past decade including CES, Hong Kong Electronics Fair, CeBit (Germany), Computex (Taiwan). We’ve received overwhelming responses from our supporters while going above and beyond customer expectations.

As technology geeks who love music, we created the Jabees Firefly with the mission of providing the best electronic products that people love and can identify with. As said in our name, we are inspired by bees because they symbolize community, prosperity, diligence and work ethic.

We are a team of more than 60 engineers, industrial product designers, production experts with 14+ years of experience in consumer electronics products. We started as an OEM Bluetooth headsets and speakers manufacturer. Nowadays, we have our own brand with more than 10 million pieces sold to 70+ countries across the world.

Audiophiles and music lovers are facing several issues since the internet has digitalized music and the ways to listen to it:
• Your music library is stored into different devices: desktop, laptop, Ipod, mobile, NAS and in the cloud!
• It is a hard to find the right song when you want it
• You are never in the right room to listen to it.
So clearly, for music lovers, listening music is starting to be a pain and you need to be an engineer to make it happen. STOP!

iEast SoundSystem is an innovative wireless audio adapter which centralizes all your music librairies  and turns your current  speakers, soundbar, or home theater into a Wireless Multi-Room Sound System connected via your home Wi-Fi network. 

iEast SoundSystem is a solution that combines digital and physical components for the satisfaction of music lovers. iEast SoundSystem works with 2 core elements

Its lovely retro design is made of aluminium box to improve also WIFI transmission. iEast Box includes also nice features like Auto On/Off based on streaming signal or WIFI transmitter  to extend your wifi signal.

From: Adam Blair
Founder, PUMP Audio

PUMP Audio was inspired by our shared love of Dance Music.
We realised that there was a large segment of the headphone market that wasn't being catered for - namely people who love Electronic Dance Music (EDM).

Most of the World's leading headphone manufacturers make headphones with a “flat frequency response”, meaning that they reproduce slavishly the sound that’s fed in to them, giving every frequency exactly the same priority.
That can be great for certain genres of music, such as Classical and Rock.
But for other genres such as Dance Music, the music sounds much better when the sub-bass is given more priority, giving a 'richer' or 'warmer' sound signature.
Headphones that have a flat frequency response can sound just that: flat.
So we developed PUMP Zeus specifically for Dance Music, with amazing bass, crisp (but not severe) highs, and slightly suppressed mids to give an incredibly rich and immersive ""club sound"".

column5: >The areas we decided were the most important early on in development --

column1:
1) Sound 
2) Wireless functionality (*without perceptible loss* of sound quality) 
3) Comfort 
4) Functionality 
5) Look

Sound is the most important element in any set of PUMP headphones.

Zeus reproduces sub-bass like no other headphones we have ever encountered, without neglecting the rest of the frequency range.

We don't do gimmicks or crazy new technologies. We just make the best sounding headphones in the World (in our - not so humble - opinion!) for people who love EDM genres like Drum &
column2:
Bass, Jungle, Trance, House, Techno, Hardcore, Trap, Electro, and so on...

If you've already got a set of PUMP In-Ear then I suspect you’ll need no convincing about how they sound compared to the competition.

PUMP Zeus sound incredible too with the warm, rich, and well defined PUMP Sound Signature.
>Here's a review from one PUMP Zeus pre-production prototype beta tester:

column1:
Having heard a lot of headphones, ranging from Audio-Technica, Bose, Beats, Sennheiser and a couple of planar headphones, I can definitely say that these head phones are one of the best.

Zeus V2 win hands down against Beats and Bose.

If you want to own Sennheiser HD800 but can't afford it, go for these headphones.

After serious comparison with HD800 and Zeus V2, I can clearly say that Sennheiser's are costly just because they are a brand. Make no mistake, Zeus V2s are some serious headphones which can take on any genre of music and sound perfect in all of them.

There is only one thing which I was expecting in these headphones and that was Active Noise Cancelling. As these have omnidirectional microphones, I don't think it should be a problem to add this feature. Hopefully, this feature would be available with the next firmware/software update.

Overall, if you are trying to find some genuine and unbiased advice in reviews columns, I would say go for it mate, because seriously THESE ARE ONE OF THE BEST SOUNDING HEADPHONES YOUR MONEY COULD BUY.

At last, I just have one request to Adam and whole pump team that, if you could add ANC in your next firmware update that would be awesome. Cheers guys, 9 out of 5 stars !! :) - ""God Of Thunder""
*  all beta testers paid for their PUMP Zeus, albeit at a discounted rate
column2:
>

I’ll be clear: In our opinion, these are some of the best sounding headphones in the World, at any price.

column3:
>WIRELESS FUNCTIONALITY:This is what took us an estimated 520 man hours to perfect, even after we thought we were there a whole year ago!

It’s easy to make a set of headphones wireless, if you’re not obsessive about recreating the sound signature and quality perfectly.

The initial version of PUMP Zeus from a year back had an issue where sub-bass (frequencies under 60Hz) was distorting slightly.

A lot of music doesn’t even have sub-bass in it, and a lot of people who tried the first batch of pre-production prototypes tried to persuade us that the sound quality was amazing and that there wasn’t actually a problem.

column1: However, we couldn’t bring ourselves to accept anything less than perfection, and so we set about in pursuit of it.
We're now confident to challenge anyone to tell the difference between when their PUMP Zeus is plugged in with an audio cable, and when they are listening via Bluetooth.

column3: >COMFORT:We made PUMP Zeus really comfortable – both when worn on your head, or around your neck.
>
column9: >Notice how the ear cups are not touching Nicole's chin — as happens with many over ear headphones when worn around the neck — even though she is looking down slightly. That’s the level of attention we gave to Comfort on the PUMP Zeus project.

column1: We've tested a LOT of over ears during the long development process from all major brands and it’s shocking how some of them seem to have totally disregarded comfort.
Beats do a good job with their Studio model in my opinion, but I really can’t imagine what SMS Audio and AKG were thinking when they considered comfort!
The important thing about comfort, is that we’ve made PUMP Zeus very comfortable for anyone.
Everyone who has tried them during the late development process agrees that they are really comfortable both on your head and around your neck.

column5: >We’ve achieved this level of comfort

column1: It would have been possible to build some slightly more comfortable headphones, but it would have been at the expense of sound quality and wireless functionality.
For example, we could have made them a little bit lighter by using a smaller battery. But this would have shortened the battery life to a level we weren’t happy with.

Or we could have used even softer ear cup foam, or changed the tension of the cans against the head, but this would have meant that the drivers weren’t at a controlled distance from the ear, meaning hit and miss sound quality.
We’ve made PUMP Zeus really comfortable. Probably not the most comfortable headphones in the World, but one of the most – both on your head and around your neck.
Functionality is really important in our opinion, particularly if you are going to use your PUMP Zeus to make and receive calls.

We worked hard to make the controls intuitive after a very short time, so that you instinctively know how to answer a call, decline a call, hang up a call, jump forward a track, jump back a track, turn the volume up or down and so on…
Within 10 minutes of playing with your new set of PUMP Zeus, you’ll know exactly how they work.

For our non-techy Friends who just want to plug and play -- I know there aren't too many non-techies on Indiegogo, but anyway... -- you can do that by using the audio cable, or by switching your PUMP Zeus on and connecting to the Bluetooth on your phone or music player.
Two things that we were adamant about from the start were that:
a) PUMP Zeus should have a built in battery (unlike many competing products, which need AA or AAA batteries to work!)
b) If the battery runs out, you should just be able to plug an audio cable in and continue listening with no degradation in sound quality, even though they are no longer “powered”.
We were amazed that some competing brands stop working ALTOGETHER when the batteries run out! Imagine you’re 4 hours in to an 11 hour flight and that happens…
With PUMP Zeus, when the battery eventually runs out (after about 8 hours of constant use), just plug the audio cable in and carry on listening with exactly the same audio quality and volume.

We thought it would be a really unique idea to make PUMP Zeus stand up by themselves. The original idea came from not having an alternative option to wearing around your neck on an aeroplane (with PUMP Zeus you can just stand them up on the table in front of you)
Other benefits are that if you want to store them outside of the carry case — who can be bothered to put them away every time you use them? — they store neatly on a book case or desk.
We wanted a look that didn't follow the crowd. Form has definitely followed function with PUMP Zeus, and we happen to think they look pretty nice!

For the PUMP Zeus Launch, we'll be offering them in Black with Orange flashes.

If it goes well, we'll introduce a stretch goal that will allow Backers to choose some other colours too!

I know that some of our Friends really like the idea of having a bright Orange set, and these will no doubt follow in the near future.

We decided to go with Black for the first production because from feedback, we realised it had the most mass appeal.
- They Sound incredible for Dance Music (and pretty awesome for other genres aswell!)
column3: - Battery lasts up to 8 hours on a full charge
column4: - When the battery runs out, just plug in the audio cable and carry on listening with no degradationin sound quality (even though they are no longer powered)
column6: - 60 day Risk Free Trial to prove what we say about the incredible, immersive sound, and the reproduction of sub-bass is true! (see below)
column19:
s=2db6ff3f12dbd37f5825ebc8a0ee8fda"" src="""" style=""""/>

Such is our faith in the build quality of PUMP Zeus that we are happy to offer Backers a FIVE YEAR Warranty!

What doesn’t it cover? The obvious, really: Loss or theft, or damage caused by misuse.
column24:
>If you damage or break your PUMP Zeus, fear not… We definitely don’t want to leave you in the lurch just because you had an accident or lent them to someone who’s a bit too heavy handed.

That’s why we're offering Backers PUMPreplace. Just get in touch with a copy of your receipt and a picture of your damaged PUMP Zeus and we’ll arrange another set for you (minus the packaging, accessories, manuals etc. that you already have) at a heavily subsidised price.

This price may change a little from time to time, but it will always be a fraction of the “new” price, so just ask us what it is currently.
column30:
s=657b36a77ae0382713cc85f0ed53f63b"" src="""" style=""""/>

I know that this is a bit unusual for a Indiegogo project, but we would like to propose the following:

If you back us, and at any time within 60 days of the date you receive your PUMP Zeus they don't live up to your expectations, we will refund your backing amount in full.

All you have to do is email or call us and we will honour this guarantee.

I know that a lot of headphones make bold claims vaguely alluding to the fact that they have amazing sound quality, but then when you listen to them it's hard to distinguish much of a difference.

With PUMP Zeus we are categorically stating that you will immediately be able to hear that they sound significantly better than any headphones you have ever heard before.

A bold claim, and that is exactly why we are offering such a guarantee!

We're expecting a very small take up on the guarantee, but it's there to give you confidence that what we are saying about the PUMP sound quality is true.

I'd like to invite our Friends on Indiegogo to ""Take The PUMP Challenge"" and try PUMP Zeus for yourself with the 60 Day Risk Free Trail.

I promise, you will be wowed by the sound experience and everyone at PUMP Audio would like to say a big ""Thankyou"" to all our Backers who have helped to bring PUMP Zeus to the World.

","From: Adam BlairFounder, PUMP AudioPUMP Audio was inspired by our shared love of Dance Music.

column1: We realised that there was a large segment of the headphone market that wasn't being catered for - namely people who love Electronic Dance Music (EDM).

Most of the World's leading headphone manufacturers make headphones with a “flat frequency response”, meaning that they reproduce slavishly the sound that’s fed in to them, giving every frequency exactly the same priority.
That can be great for certain genres of music, such as Classical and Rock.
But for other genres such as Dance Music, the music sounds much better when the sub-bass is given more priority, giving a 'richer' or 'warmer' sound signature.
Headphones that have a flat frequency response can sound just that: flat.
So we developed PUMP Zeus specifically for Dance Music, with amazing bass, crisp (but not severe) highs, and slightly suppressed mids to give an incredibly rich and immersive ""club sound"".
The areas we decided were the most important early on in development -- in order of importance -- were:
1) Sound 2) Wireless functionality (*without perceptible loss* of sound quality) 3) Comfort 4) Functionality 5) Look

Sound is the most important element in any set of PUMP headphones.Zeus reproduces sub-bass like no other headphones we have ever encountered, without neglecting the rest of the frequency range.We don't do gimmicks or crazy new technologies. We just make the best sounding headphones in the World (in our - not so humble - opinion!) for people who love EDM genres like Drum & Bass, Jungle, Trance, House, Techno, Hardcore, Trap, Electro, and so on...If you've already got a set of PUMP In-Ear then I suspect you’ll need no convincing about how they sound compared to the competition.PUMP Zeus sound incredible too with the warm, rich, and well defined PUMP Sound Signature.About The PUMP Audio Sound Signature:
Here's a review from one PUMP Zeus pre-production prototype beta tester:

Having heard a lot of headphones, ranging from Audio-Technica, Bose, Beats, Sennheiser and a couple of planar headphones, I can definitely say that these head phones are one of the best.Zeus V2 win hands down against Beats and Bose.If you want to own Sennheiser HD800 but can't afford it, go for these headphones.After serious comparison with HD800 and Zeus V2, I can clearly say that Sennheiser's are costly just because they are a brand. Make no mistake, Zeus V2s are some serious headphones which can take on any genre of music and sound perfect in all of them.There is only one thing which I was expecting in these headphones and that was Active Noise Cancelling. As these have omnidirectional microphones, I don't think it should be a problem to add this feature. Hopefully, this feature would be available with the next firmware/software update.Overall, if you are trying to find some genuine and unbiased advice in reviews columns, I would say go for it mate, because seriously THESE ARE ONE OF THE BEST SOUNDING HEADPHONES YOUR MONEY COULD BUY.At last, I just have one request to Adam and whole pump team that, if you could add ANC in your next firmware update that would be awesome. Cheers guys, 9 out of 5 stars !! :) - ""God Of Thunder""
*  all beta testers paid for their PUMP Zeus, albeit at a discounted rateI’ll be clear: In our opinion, these are some of the best sounding headphones in the World, at any price.

WIRELESS FUNCTIONALITY:This is what took us an estimated 520 man hours to perfect, even after we thought we were there a whole year ago!It’s easy to make a set of headphones wireless, if you’re not obsessive about recreating the sound signature and quality perfectly.The initial version of PUMP Zeus from a year back had an issue where sub-bass (frequencies under 60Hz) was distorting slightly.A lot of music doesn’t even have sub-bass in it, and a lot of people who tried the first batch of pre-production prototypes tried to persuade us that the sound quality was amazing and that there wasn’t actually a problem.
However, we couldn’t bring ourselves to accept anything less than perfection, and so we set about in pursuit of it.
We're now confident to challenge anyone to tell the difference between when their PUMP Zeus is plugged in with an audio cable, and when they are listening via Bluetooth.
COMFORT:We made PUMP Zeus really comfortable – both when worn on your head, or around your neck.

Notice how the ear cups are not touching Nicole's chin — as happens with many over ear headphones when worn around the neck — even though she is looking down slightly. That’s the level of attention we gave to Comfort on the PUMP Zeus project.
We've tested a LOT of over ears during the long development process from all major brands and it’s shocking how some of them seem to have totally disregarded comfort.
Beats do a good job with their Studio model in my opinion, but I really can’t imagine what SMS Audio and AKG were thinking when they considered comfort!
The important thing about comfort, is that we’ve made PUMP Zeus very comfortable for anyone.
Everyone who has tried them during the late development process agrees that they are really comfortable both on your head and around your neck.
We’ve achieved this level of comfort without compromising sound quality.
It would have been possible to build some slightly more comfortable headphones, but it would have been at the expense of sound quality and wireless functionality.
For example, we could have made them a little bit lighter by using a smaller battery. But this would have shortened the battery life to a level we weren’t happy with.

Or we could have used even softer ear cup foam, or changed the tension of the cans against the head, but this would have meant that the drivers weren’t at a controlled distance from the ear, meaning hit and miss sound quality.
We’ve made PUMP Zeus really comfortable. Probably not the most comfortable headphones in the World, but one of the most – both on your head and around your neck.
Functionality is really important in our opinion, particularly if you are going to use your PUMP Zeus to make and receive calls.

We worked hard to make the controls intuitive after a very short time, so that you instinctively know how to answer a call, decline a call, hang up a call, jump forward a track, jump back a track, turn the volume up or down and so on…
Within 10 minutes of playing with your new set of PUMP Zeus, you’ll know exactly how they work.

For our non-techy Friends who just want to plug and play -- I know there aren't too many non-techies on Indiegogo, but anyway... -- you can do that by using the audio cable, or by switching your PUMP Zeus on and connecting to the Bluetooth on your phone or music player.

b) If the battery runs out, you should just be able to plug an audio cable in and continue listening with no degradation in sound quality, even though they are no longer “powered”.
We were amazed that some competing brands stop working ALTOGETHER when the batteries run out! Imagine you’re 4 hours in to an 11 hour flight and that happens…
With PUMP Zeus, when the battery eventually runs out (after about 8 hours of constant use), just plug the audio cable in and carry on listening with exactly the same audio quality and volume.

We thought it would be a really unique idea to make PUMP Zeus stand up by themselves. The original idea came from not having an alternative option to wearing around your neck on an aeroplane (with PUMP Zeus you can just stand them up on the table in front of you)
Other benefits are that if you want to store them outside of the carry case — who can be bothered to put them away every time you use them? — they store neatly on a book case or desk.
We wanted a look that didn't follow the crowd. Form has definitely followed function with PUMP Zeus, and we happen to think they look pretty nice!
