Elevate your music lifestyle by creating a powerful speaker network customized to all listening scenarios, with wonderful sound and powerful connectivity. The centerpiece of Luna’s design, Luna Eye, which includes a tweeter will automatically emerge when it is powered on. This telescopic system benefits the diaphragm vibration by giving more space for the speaker inside. It will be super easy to connect Luna to your phone, tablet or laptop for music streaming from your spotify or pandora account. Powered by MESHNET network technology, the Luna network can support up to 32 units paired together as a stereo system.

Luna Eye is to the essence of this innovative light and audio system. It comprises an independent tweeter speaker, a light guiding component, a dome and a ring ornament. Applies smart electric telescopic system, Luna eye will automatically come out of the body when powered on just like a camera lenses.

To deliver a more layered sound performance better than a sole full-range speaker, our acoustic engineering team equipped Luna with one more tweeter speaker responsible for high-frequency sound independently. The tweeter is embedded in Luna Eye. The telescopic mechanic allows it to come out of the sphere body to give more space between the tweeter and the full range speaker inside. It allows better diaphragm vibration performance and make the whole Luna sound better.

To give you a benchmark of how Luna will sound, here we have a direct comparison between one Luna unit and three other popular speakers on market. In this video we are using the latest acoustic sample of Luna that the R&
column2: D team just completed. We are pretty confident that in stereo mode with 2 units of Luna or above, the sound will even be even better.

column1: The Luna Eye’s proprietary lighting system comes preloaded with patterns that will please the eye as much as the Luna’s sound pleases the ear. An intuitive user interface allows you to adjust the hue and saturation of color for lighting that fits any mood and situation.

Simply swipe on the color wheel in crazybaby App, you can adjust HUE and saturation of Luna light. It literally includes all colors on earth. We want Luna truly become your customized personal device. Match your golden, silver or space gray Luna with a unique color light to fit your mood, your tone of music, or your home interior design style.
“It really took me by surprise honestly to have such full beautiful sound that coming out of this small compact device. And with the brush aluminum surface, it feels so familiar. Like my iPhone.”

Luna sound system enables a even more layered and immersive stereo listening experience with multi-speaker pairing technology. With one single speaker you can only enjoy the best sound quality in front of the device. On the other hand, traditional stereo system costs tons of money. But today thanks to wireless pairing tech, we can expand the audio experience into stereo groups you can easily afford. Luna applies MESHNET technology, with which you can add up several Luna together to customize your own stereo system easily.
The future of wireless music is here

Luna’s performance is balanced and smooth in all frequency ranges which makes the music both naturally pleasant and distinctly more layered. Its high sensitivity makes the sound more transparent and resonant. Under the same music source, it renders an all-around upgrade of acoustic performance.

Luna is built with the most advanced audio engineer technology, which is a perfect integration of Sound, Light and Appearance. The aircraft grade aluminum skeleton as well as the most robust structure that ensures crystal clear delivery of full range sound. Press the back power button, let the outstanding, distortion-free sound fills the room, feel the difference.

Luna’s 2-inch full range NdFeB speaker with less distortion, more linear magnetic path. From damper to air-flow design, from harmonic absorption to control of sizing technique, the fact that we never overlook a single detail that consummates Luna’s delightful voice.

Multiroom experience has never been so smooth and easy. No need for bridges or complicated apps. Luna is natively compatible with your home Wi-Fi. Set up multiple speakers in different rooms to expand your music experience into the entire house.
Luna is the perfect fit for your home party. Simple and easy sync up maximum 32 units of Luna to rock every corner of your room. Everyone can stream their own music to share with the crowd.
Only with a simple touch on your Luna, it instantly streams music to any room you want. Powered by MESHNET network technology, the music network can be expanded up to 32 rooms.

Whatever you listen to with your Spotify or Pandora account, you can easy have it on Luna. Speaker should be designed to keep updated with people’s listening behavior. We work closely with all mainstream music service, and third party platforms. The result is universal compatibility with dozens of service providers. Straight out of the box, Luna is ready to rock off your roof.
Luna fits perfectly with your airplay devices as its Hi-Fi complement. Connect multiple Luna wireless to your Apple TV to get a full immersive audio-visual experience. www.apple.com/tv

Luna inherited the spirit of our relentless pursuit of great design and futuristic expression from its predecessor, Mars by crazybaby™. The sphere is the most perfect and harmonious geometric pattern in the world, yet also an insurmountable challenge in the field of industrial design. To give Luna a truly flawless look, we specifically picked aircraft grade aluminum as its material and adopted both three-dimensional stretch-bending technology and a high precision cold forging technique.
Just the right amount of comfortable grip

Made of aircraft grade aluminum utilizing with three-dimensional stretch-bending technology, Luna has this stunning design like a piece of fine art, from the Uni-body front cover . to the exquisite brim. But these features aren’t just for shown: its sophisticated crafted anodized surface feels as good as it looks.

Luna’s surface is made with cutting-edge CNC cold forging technology. It requires extremely high precision and is far more complex compared to traditional die-cast molding techniques, however, we took the risk of increased costs, just to ensure Luna has a 100% flawless look.
•  Charging via USB to computer system or power adapter

All units will be manufactured in China like other major brands do. Then we will ship from our fulfillment facility in Hong Kong to places around the world. All units will be shipped in a custom, reusable 5""x5""x7"" carton.

For maximum protection, each carton is required to pass drop testing before the shipment. Each package will include UPS number for online tracking. For United States, packages will be sent via UPS Ground upon arrival of US distribution center from Hong Kong.
For the rest of world, Luna will ship via UPS Worldwide from Hong Kong directly. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

We're proud to have crazybaby users in over 130 countries. We will ship Luna by crazybaby worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Brazil, Belarus, Cuba, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, Malaysia, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, South Africa, Sudan, Syria, Vietnam and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your territories.

Each Luna by crazybaby comes with 1 year limited warranty. We also ensure every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handle with care during shipment. For more details, visit us at http://crazybaby.com/warranty

In 2014, a group of geeky industrial designers, engineering veterans and acoustic experts formed crazybaby. This is a bunch of passionate people who are crazy enough to think they can challenge the industry with disruptive audio products. At crazybaby, we always look beyond to see what the future music listening scenes should look like, we never stopped exploring the possibilities of intuitive design and great sound, and we are aiming to develop the premium audio devices that fit your futuristic lifestyle and create a superior listening experience. Now, we are so proud to present you the solution, Luna by crazybaby™ - the most innovative light and audio system ever in this industry.
To achieve the most elegant spherical speaker design on the Earth...

Match your golden, silver or space gray Luna with a unique color light to fit your mood, your tone of music, or your home interior design style.
“It really took me by surprise honestly to have such full beautiful sound that coming out of this small  compact device. And with the brush aluminum surface, it feels so familiar. Like my iPhone.”

Luna sound system enables a even more layered and immersive stereo listening experience with multi-speaker pairing technology. With one single speaker you can only enjoy the best sound quality in front of the device. On the other hand, traditional stereo system costs tons of money. But today thanks to wireless pairing tech, we can expand the audio experience into stereo groups you can easily afford. Luna applies MESHNET technology, with which you can add up several Luna together to customize your own stereo system easily.
The future of wireless music is here

Luna’s performance is balanced and smooth in all frequency ranges which makes the music both naturally pleasant and distinctly more layered. Its high sensitivity makes the sound more transparent and resonant. Under the same music source, it renders an all-around upgrade of acoustic performance.

Luna is built with the most advanced audio engineer technology, which is a perfect integration of Sound, Light and Appearance. The aircraft grade aluminum skeleton as well as the most robust structure that ensures crystal clear delivery of full range sound. Press the back power button, let the outstanding, distortion-free sound fills the room, feel the difference.

Luna’s 2-inch full range NdFeB speaker with less distortion, more linear magnetic path. From damper to air-flow design, from harmonic absorption to control of sizing technique, the fact that we never overlook a single detail that consummates Luna’s delightful voice.

Multiroom experience has never been so smooth and easy. No need for bridges or complicated apps. Luna is natively compatible with your home Wi-Fi. Set up multiple speakers in different rooms to expand your music experience into the entire house.
Luna is the perfect fit for your home party. Simple and easy sync up maximum 32 units of Luna to rock every corner of your room. Everyone can stream their own music to share with the crowd.
Only with a simple touch on your Luna, it instantly streams music to any room you want. Powered by MESHNET network technology, the music network can be expanded up to 32 rooms.

Whatever you listen to with your Spotify or Pandora account, you can easy have it on Luna. Speaker should be designed to keep updated with people’s listening behavior. We work closely with all mainstream music service, and third party platforms. The result is universal compatibility with dozens of service providers. Straight out of the box, Luna is ready to rock off your roof.
Luna fits perfectly with your airplay devices as its Hi-Fi complement. Connect multiple Luna wireless to your Apple TV to get a full immersive audio-visual experience. www.apple.com/tv

Luna inherited the spirit of our relentless pursuit of great design and futuristic expression from its predecessor, Mars by crazybaby™.  The sphere is the most perfect and harmonious geometric pattern in the world, yet also an insurmountable challenge in the field of industrial design. To give Luna a truly flawless look, we specifically picked aircraft grade aluminum as its material and adopted both three-dimensional stretch-bending technology and a high precision cold forging technique.
Just the right amount of comfortable grip

Made of aircraft grade aluminum utilizing with three-dimensional stretch-bending technology, Luna has this stunning design like a piece of fine art, from the Uni-body front cover . to the exquisite brim. But these features aren’t just for shown: its sophisticated crafted anodized surface feels as good as it looks.

Luna’s surface is made with cutting-edge CNC cold forging technology. It requires extremely high precision and is far more complex compared to traditional die-cast molding techniques, however, we took the risk of increased costs, just to ensure Luna has a 100% flawless look.
Charging via USB to computer system or power adapter

All units will be manufactured in China like other major brands do. Then we will ship from our fulfillment facility in Hong Kong to places around the world. All units will be shipped in a custom, reusable 5""x5""x7"" carton.

For maximum protection, each carton is required to pass drop testing before the shipment. Each package will include UPS number for online tracking. For United States, packages will be sent via UPS Ground upon arrival of US distribution center from Hong Kong.
For the rest of world, Luna will ship via UPS Worldwide from Hong Kong directly. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region.

We're proud to have crazybaby users in over 130 countries. We will ship Luna by crazybaby worldwide, with the exception of Argentina, Brazil, Belarus, Cuba, India, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, Malaysia, North Korea, Russia, Somalia, South Africa, Sudan, Syria, Vietnam and Yemen. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your territories.

Each Luna by crazybaby comes with 1 year limited warranty. We also ensure every unit is free from manufacturer defects and handle with care during shipment. For more details, visit us at http://crazybaby.com/warranty

In 2014, a group of geeky industrial designers, engineering veterans and acoustic experts formed crazybaby. This is a bunch of passionate people who are crazy enough to think they can challenge the industry with disruptive audio products. At crazybaby, we always look beyond to see what the future music listening scenes should look like, we never stopped exploring the possibilities of intuitive design and great sound, and we are aiming to develop the premium audio devices that fit your futuristic lifestyle and create a superior listening experience. Now, we are so proud to present you the solution, Luna by crazybaby™ - the most innovative light and audio system ever in this industry.
Powder Mountain, Eden, UT - Photography by Summer Su
To achieve the most elegant spherical speaker design on the Earth...
Davis is testing the acoustic performance with sound sample in the full anechoic chamber

Music is essential to many magical moments in our lives. It inspires our thoughts and allows us to share the emotions we have with friends and family. Support us and make Luna possible. crazybaby will make sure Luna provides the best high quality wireless listening experience adaptable to versatile listening scenarios, which build on its trendy futuristic appearance. Kickstarter, join us and let’s shape the future of music lifestyle.
Reach out and we’ll tell you our story.

column5: >Lightweight, durable, and small enough to clip-on to any piece of clothing, it's the perfect companion for your active &amp

column7: >works with wired and bluetooth headphones
column8:
>, and can play 48 hours of music without any internet connection. All for under $89.

Mighty was born from personal frustration with the current on-the-go music experience. Today, every option to stream music while exercising requires a bulky, fragile smartphone. And phones are only getting larger, more fragile, more expensive, and more battery hungry. This motivated us to create a simple product that provides users with a comfortable and seamless music+fitness experience, all without a phone.

If you’re a user of Spotify and have been asking yourself “why doesn’t this exist?!?”, please help us make Mighty a reality. Say goodbye to your iPod Shuffle, leave your smartphone at home, and Be Mighty!
column9: >Every current option for streaming Spotify music on-the-go requires a smartphone.
column10:
>That makes no sense to us. Smartphones are heavy, hard to carry during exercise, have a short battery life, come with expensive data plans, and have fragile and expensive screens. Studies have shown that 24% of iPhone users have a cracked screen, many of which undoubtedly were broken during exercise. In addition, 25% of all smartphone owners in the US incur data overage charges and streaming music is the number one culprit. To make it even worse, streaming services are documented as the most battery hungry apps in the world and can quickly drain your battery in just a few hours. Save your smartphone data, memory, battery, and screens - Mighty is the solution.

The iPod Shuffle is an alternative that provides a comfortable music+fitness experience, but it can’t play any streaming music (streaming music services do not work with the iPod Shuffle or Nano). Mighty is the first device ever to play Spotify music on-the-go without any need for a smartphone.

Here are more details on why Mighty beats the competition:

column1: Contributors will be able to choose from three color options: Lola Black, Shikaka White or our new Crush Orange option. You will receive an email after your purchase to collect your color choice.
""Reimagining the music player for the streaming generation."" - TIME
""Music is crucial for a good workout, but toting around your fragile smartphone the entire time is annoying -- which is why Mighty Audio is such a game-changer.""            - Thrillist

column1: Playlist Selector: Press to scroll through playlists
Play/Pause/Power: Press to power on, hold for 4 seconds to power off
LED: Blinks pink when charging and green when powered on
Playback: Works with Bluetooth and wired headphones

column2: >TURN ON, TUNE IN, DROP OUT
column3: >in three easy steps. No cords and no computer required.

column1: 1. TURN ON - Connect Mighty to your smartphone
2. TUNE IN - Sync your music using the Mighty mobile app
3. DROP OUT - For the first time ever, leave your phone and get moving

Your smartphone is a remote control: Mighty doesn’t have a screen like other devices, so we built software that allows you to control Mighty using your smartphone as a Bluetooth remote control. Simply launch the Mighty mobile app, login to your Premium account, and make your playlists available for offline play using the familiar 'Available Offline' button. Instead of downloading the selected playlists to your phone, the songs are stored directly on Mighty. Songs are transferred with WiFi, so the sync process is super quick. It only takes a few minutes to sync hundreds of songs to Mighty.
Once the sync is complete, put your phone down and take Mighty with you on-the-go. You won’t need your phone again until you want to change your playlist selections.

Controlled with physical buttons: Playing music on Mighty is easy and intuitive. To start playing a song, simply press the play button and Mighty will automatically launch the first song in your first synced playlist. Use the song forward/back buttons to scroll through all of the songs in that playlist.

If you want to navigate to a different playlist, press the playlist selector button to scroll through all synced playlists. Each time you hit the playlist selector button, Mighty will dictate the name of the playlist to you through your headphones. You even have the ability to record playlist names yourself, so you’ll always know what playlist you’re selecting. (Note: this is very useful if you’re like us and give your playlists names like “Pu’s Pump Up Mix”).

Battery life: Mighty will be capable of up to 5 hours of continuous music playback when fully charged. Ultimately, the goal is to achieve 10+ hours of playback without increasing the size of the device. Even after the first batch of Mighty is shipped, we can continue to improve battery life remotely by updating our software. No new hardware will be required. Optimizing battery life is the #1 priority for our development team.
• Small but Mighty: We’ve decreased the size of Mighty to 1.5” x 1.5” x 0.7”. And Mighty only weighs 0.6 ounces!
• Full compatibility with iPhone 5 and above (iOS 9.3.5+), Android Lollipop and Marshmallow (we're currently testing Nougat and plan to support it)
• Premium/paid version of Spotify and most other streaming music services is required
• 8GB SDRAM Flash Hard Drive and 500MB DDR3 SDRAM
• 3.5MM Stereo Audio Jack and Stereo Audio Codec
• Lithium Battery (likely 250 mAh but could change during production)
• Up to 5 hours of continuous playback and 100 hours of standby time

We’ve spent a lot of time studying about the market we are trying to serve, and we think it shows with our current solution. Ergonomics and usability were the most important aspects of the design, letting you keep your eyes on the scenery and not on a screen. Ever try to use that touchscreen with gloves on? Mighty doesn’t have this problem, the tactile buttons fall easily underneath your fingertips without looking. We also tried to keep Mighty as small and light as possible so that it can clip it to any article of clothing. Last but certainly not least, Mighty is tough. It’s sweat and drop resistant, just in case, because we’ve seen all those cracked smartphone screens.

We paid particular attention to people trying to use their phones while in motion. Switching a song while running can be an awkward experience - the fumbling and tripping that some of us encounter is never fun and occasionally dangerous. So we made the experience of switching songs and playlists very intuitive. As for the headphones, Mighty has a headphone jack for your favorite wired headphones. Additionally, you can pair Mighty with wireless Bluetooth headphones, giving you full cordless freedom.

Mighty was built by a passionate team with expertise in active living, tech, and music. We have decades of experience developing hardware, creating brands, establishing partnerships and launching businesses. Our team who has been through this before and we’re positive that we can successfully take Mighty from idea to final product.

Mighty was born from our personal frustrations with exercising with our smartphones. Every member of our team has cracked their phone screen while exercising. When we spoke to family and friends, we realized that this is a major pain point for a lot of people.

To take it a step further, we visited popular running trails in Los Angeles to ask runners why they run with their phone. Some people like staying connected at all times, but the majority only bring their phone so they can stream music. And many of them, at some point, had tossed their iPod Shuffles into a drawer, never to be used again. No one likes dealing with cords and computers and, honestly, who still downloads music?!? We truly wondered why this type of product didn’t already exist. So we decided that if nobody else was going to do it, we were going to give it a shot.
• Mar '17 - First batch of Mightys will ship
• May ʻ16 - Working prototype will be finalized
• Dec ʻ14 - The idea of Mighty is born

As you can see, we’ve been working hard for over a year to bring Mighty to the world. We’ve developed a proof of concept and have proven that this technology works. We’re ready to push forward with prototyping and manufacturing, but we need your help to get there.

We’ll use our campaign funding to initiate large scale manufacturing and get our first batch of Mighty devices delivered by March 2017. This is no easy task, but we’re confident in our team, product, and technology. We promise to update our backers frequently and we will be fully transparent about our progress.
Here’s what you’ll receive (Premium/paid version of Spotify and most other streaming music services is required):

Same as above, but double the fun.
 
MIGHTY FAMILY: FIVE MIGHTYS - $399
Same as above, but five for the family.
 
*International packages may be subject to duties/VAT. Please check with your local customs office and government for assessing the duties for your country.

column2: >Thank you to all of our backers and supporters! Just in case you missed it, be sure to read the Headphone.Guru review on the Vero Cable System, including the Vero Reference Cable, the Full Range and the Bass Dongle!

column1: You've already invested in a great pair of headphones and music source. Why not get the best sound out of them? Vero is for music lovers, for those who get lost in the different nuances of sound that makes you a music lover in the first place.
With Vero you will hear pieces of the music you never knew were there, bringing the performance right in front of you and making it more lifelike.

column7: >Some of our backers came by our booth at the SoCal CanJam2015...here's what they had to say about Vero!

column1: The Vero Full Range Cable utilizes MIT Cables patented Multipole™ Technology, which is a parallel and passive network that helps maintain the quality of the signal as it passes from source to headphones. The Vero Full Range Cable has 12 Poles of Articulation strategically placed across the full audible spectrum (20hz-20khz) and is designed to work with specific headphones (i.e., Audeze LCD Series, Mr. Speaker Alpha Series, etc.).    MSRP: $499

""MIT NAILED it with the VERO Reference. It's such a magnificent pairing with my beloved Audeze LCD-2s that I forget about my inner-geek and focus on the music! Tip of the hat... It's now one of my top reference headphone cables.""

The Vero Reference Cable can be terminated to your headphones like the Vero Full Range Cable. The Vero Reference Cable houses the same technology that the Vero Full Range Cable has, and includes 21 Poles of Articulation. The difference in what you hear is based on the larger number of Articulation Poles. MIT’s Poles of Articulation synergistically work together to transport the audio signal with a more even, or flatter response than just a single cable. With the additional 9-Articulation Poles, the bass is more controlled, the mid-range is smoother with more extended highs. The noise floor has been dramatically dropped once again.  MSRP: $899

The Vero Standard Universal Dongle also utilizes MIT Cables patented Multipole™ Technology, and like the Vero Full Range Cable, has 12 Poles of Articulation. All Vero Dongles can be used with any stock headphone cable or fixed cable headphone and are not limited to specific manufacturers, models or types. The Standard  Universal Dongle  was developed as a way to integrate the same Multipole™ Technology as the Vero Full Range Cable, but with headphones that have non-detachable cables and to better enhance other aftermarket cables. The Vero Standard Universal Dongle can perform at about 70%-80% of the Vero Full Range Cable depending on the combination of headphones and cables used.  MSRP: $299

The Vero Bass Dongle also utilizes Multipole™ Technology by containing the 10 Poles of Articulation within the last 3 lower octaves, producing a much fuller and natural sounding bass and enhancing the lower frequency articulation.. The Vero Bass Dongle is a great companian to the Vero Full Range Cable and Vero Standard Universal Dongle, and really compliments the Vero Reference Cable as well as other manufacturer cables. MSRP $350

The Vero “Adapter” Dongle looks just like the other Vero Dongles, but will instead house one of the technologies that has been used in MIT’s Reference Category of Products for years. This technology reduces all forms of extraneous noise generated by such things as your digitizer, amplifier or passive elements found within your audio or headphone systems. The MIT Technology that will be included within the Vero “Adapter” Dongle will reduce the noise floor and increase the low level detail. Listeners often refer to this as creating a “blacker” background. With the noise removed, timbres and textures are more accurately heard, while sound staging and images within the sound stage are also enhanced. The term ‘Holographic’ is often used to describe what the listener hears. MSRP $299

column3: >MIT Cables’ core audio cable technology is our exclusive Poles of Articulation, named after the fact that every audio cable has a single point where it is most efficient at storing and transporting energy. At this point in the audio frequency spectrum, the cable will articulate best, and represents the cables’ particular Articulation Pole.

column1: <h3> If you could use three different cables at the same  time... <span style=""font-weight: normal
column6: >and each had an Articulation Pole to connect two audio components, you would have an interface with three Articulation Poles
column7: one for the highs, one for the mids, and one for the lows. Together, they would work to transport the audio signal from component to component with more articulation.

column3:

Once you back your Vero Perks, there are a few ways you can help us to customize your preferences. For a list of all the different terminations, please see our Vero Headphone Termination/Configuration Guide below. 
We will contact you and provide you with a Vero Backer Survey which will help us to determine your Vero Cable configurations.

For international shipping:  All International backers will be contacted personally and will be provided their shipping costs. Due to the fact that we have many countries participating in our campaign, and we require specific protocol (insurance and/or signature required shipping), we feel it would be unfair to provide one rate for all international shipments based on the fact that they vary greatly between countries.
For all U.S. shipments, please add $11 for shipping. This includes combined shipments (multiple perks).

column7: >MIT Cable's Kent Loughlin talks about why Vero is an important asset to your headphones.

column1: At this time we have completed the following in terms of the production phases of our Vero Headphone Cabling System:

column2: D and First Prototype Manufacturing of the Vero Full Range Headphone Cable, The Vero Standard Dongle &amp
D and Second Prototype Development of the Vero Full Range Headphone Cable.

column1: • Continued Field Testing and Public Demo Testing (SoCal CanJam 2015)

When we first started this project, it was clear that we had a winning product for any headphone, providing an experience that headphone users would not only appreciate, but would be like no other. Whether you're a music lover, recording engineer, DJ or gamer, Vero will take you to a whole other level. We mean it when we say, ""you really don't know how great your headphones are, until you pair them with Vero"".

We are ready to turn the Vero Headphone Cable into a reality, and in order to do that, it's important that we determine the needs of our backers. You will help us provide research into the most wanted configurations. We are very familiar with the more popular brands of headphones and how Vero will accommodate specific connections, but we would also like to know whether our Vero Dongle, another prototype that we have designed, is a potential player in our Vero line. Your input and support will not only help us to bring the Vero Headphone Cabling System to headphone users everywhere, but it will also determine how we finish this product. We need your input!
We want to give you Vero Headphone Cables for free! Take a few seconds to share our campaign with friends and earn a chance to get referral rewards!
If someone pledges to our campaign, we credit you like this:
FREE VERO FULL RANGE DONGLE FOR ALL REFERRALS THAT TOTAL $1500.00
FREE VERO BASS DONGLE FOR ALL REFERRALS THAT TOTAL $2500.00
FREE VERO FULL RANGE CABLE FOR ALL REFERRALS THAT TOTAL $5000
For an added bonus, if you get $7500 in referrals, we’ll give you an additional $500 in CASH!
All you have to do is refer people by sharing your unique URL online/around the web and earn FREE VERO CABLES and CASH!

Simply log in to Indiegogo if you have not already, or create an account by signing up here. Be sure to use the same account you used when you claimed your VERO! Then, visit the VERO Indiegogo Page and use the links next to the video to share.

There are always risks involved with any crowdfunding campaign, but all of us here working on the Vero Headphone Cable Project are extremely confident that we will be successful in developing the very best headphone cable we could possibly imagine. This is what we do. We make the best audio interfaces in the world. Now we will strive to make the best headphone cable ever manufactured. It's not a matter of if, it is a matter of when.

Based on how far we have come before even offering the Vero Cable as a viable product, we are certain that our backers will receive their Vero Headphone Cable in a timely manner. We do not foresee any complications to our product development or manufacturing capabilities. Our factory here in Rocklin, California is ready to roll out Vero! Of course, there is always a chance that Mother Nature can wreak havoc on any of our preparations, but we do not expect this or any other unforeseen acts of God or others to hinder our production schedule.

Share the Love! 

We completely understand if Vero is not on your list of ""Must Haves"" but we would really appreciate any support you can offer! And remember, you don't need to be a backer to earn referral rewards! Vero would also make a great gift for any music lover, audio geek, DJ or Gamer who uses headphones. Just use the links next to our main video at the top of the page and share! We appreciate any effort you take to help us spread the word about Vero! Thank you so much!!

What is the difference betweent the Vero Reference Cable and the Vero Full Range Cable?

A: The Vero Reference Cable has almost double the number of MIT's patented Multipole Technology, with 21 'Poles of Articulation' compared with the 12 Poles of Articulation that is included in the Vero Full Range Cable. With the additional 9-Articulation Poles, the bass is more controlled, the mid-range is smoother with more extended highs and the noise floor is lowered even more dramitically.
Now that you have added the Vero Reference Cable, is the Bass Dongle obsolete?
A: Not at all. The Vero Bass Dongle is an exceptional addition to all of the Vero Line of Cables and even works when paired with the Vero Standard Universal Dongle.
Why is the Vero Adapter called a ""Dongle"" and what is the difference between it and other ""adapters""? What does it look like?

A:  The reason why we call our Vero ""adapter"" a ""dongle"" is because it IS a ""Dongle"" that can work like an adapter. Because MIT is known for their patented technologies, we decided that any ""adapter"" we designed would also provide additional purposes, and would work to compliment the Vero Headphone Cabling ""System"", by interacting with each other to bring out the best in the music that you listen to, as well as the headphones that you use.
When will I receive my Vero Backer Survey and what will be on it?

A: The Vero Backer Survey will be sent shortly after the Vero Campaign has ended on May 22nd. The Survey will be sent in small batches so that we can better accommodate backers questions and changes without being overwhelmed. We want to provide the best customer service possible, and sometimes that is easier to do in smaller groups than in larger ones! We promise to get the surveys out weekly, and do our best to facilitate our backers completed orders as quickly as possible. What you will find on the survey will be questions confirming your order, shipping address and contact information as well as the configuration choices for your cables.
We couldn't be more thrilled! Everyone here at MIT appreciates all of our backers support and those that helped spread the word on our campaign!
Please see the latest update posted for more information on the campaign as we move into Indiegogo's InDemand Program.

Thank you to all of our backers and supporters! Just in case you missed it, be sure to read the Headphone.Guru review on the Vero Cable System, including the Vero Reference Cable, the Full Range and the Bass Dongle!

You've already invested in a great pair of headphones and music source. Why not get the best sound out of them? Vero is for music lovers, for those who get lost in the different nuances of sound that makes you a music lover in the first place.
With Vero you will hear pieces of the music you never knew were there, bringing the performance right in front of you and making it more lifelike.
Some of our backers came by our booth at the SoCal CanJam2015...here's what they had to say about Vero!

The Vero Full Range Cable utilizes MIT Cables patented Multipole™ Technology, which is a parallel and passive network that helps maintain the quality of the signal as it passes from source to headphones. The Vero Full Range Cable has 12 Poles of Articulation strategically placed across the full audible spectrum (20hz-20khz) and is designed to work with specific headphones (i.e., Audeze LCD Series, Mr. Speaker Alpha Series, etc.).    MSRP: $499

MIT NAILED it with the VERO Reference. It's such a magnificent pairing with my beloved Audeze LCD-2s that I forget about my inner-geek and focus on the music! Tip of the hat... It's now one of my top reference headphone cables.""

The Vero Reference Cable can be terminated to your headphones like the Vero Full Range Cable. The Vero Reference Cable houses the same technology that the Vero Full Range Cable has, and includes 21 Poles of Articulation. The difference in what you hear is based on the larger number of Articulation Poles. MIT’s Poles of Articulation synergistically work together to transport the audio signal with a more even, or flatter response than just a single cable. With the additional 9-Articulation Poles, the bass is more controlled, the mid-range is smoother with more extended highs. The noise floor has been dramatically dropped once again.  MSRP: $899

The Vero Standard Universal Dongle also utilizes MIT Cables patented Multipole™ Technology, and like the Vero Full Range Cable, has 12 Poles of Articulation. All Vero Dongles can be used with any stock headphone cable or fixed cable headphone and are not limited to specific manufacturers, models or types. The Standard  Universal Dongle  was developed as a way to integrate the same Multipole™ Technology as the Vero Full Range Cable, but with headphones that have non-detachable cables and to better enhance other aftermarket cables. The Vero Standard Universal Dongle can perform at about 70%-80% of the Vero Full Range Cable depending on the combination of headphones and cables used.  MSRP: $299

The Vero Bass Dongle also utilizes Multipole™ Technology by containing the 10 Poles of Articulation within the last 3 lower octaves, producing a much fuller and natural sounding bass and enhancing the lower frequency articulation.. The Vero Bass Dongle is a great companian to the Vero Full Range Cable and Vero Standard Universal Dongle, and really compliments the Vero Reference Cable as well as other manufacturer cables. MSRP $350

The Vero “Adapter” Dongle looks just like the other Vero Dongles, but will instead house one of the technologies that has been used in MIT’s Reference Category of Products for years. This technology reduces all forms of extraneous noise generated by such things as your digitizer, amplifier or passive elements found within your audio or headphone systems. The MIT Technology that will be included within the Vero “Adapter” Dongle will reduce the noise floor and increase the low level detail. Listeners often refer to this as creating a “blacker” background. With the noise removed, timbres and textures are more accurately heard, while sound staging and images within the sound stage are also enhanced. The term ‘Holographic’ is often used to describe what the listener hears. MSRP $299

MIT Cables’ core audio cable technology is our exclusive Poles of Articulation, named after the fact that every audio cable has a single point where it is most efficient at storing and transporting energy. At this point in the audio frequency spectrum, the cable will articulate best, and represents the cables’ particular Articulation Pole.
If you could use three different cables at the same  time... and each had an Articulation Pole to connect two audio components, you would have an interface with three Articulation Poles
column2: one for the highs, one for the mids, and one for the lows. Together, they would work to transport the audio signal from component to component with more articulation.

column1: Once you choose your perk, we will contact you for specifics! As a backer, your input will be necessary in building your headphone cable. Once you back your Vero Perks, there are a few ways you can help us to customize your preferences. For a list of all the different terminations, please see our Vero Headphone Termination/Configuration Guide below. We will contact you and provide you with a Vero Backer Survey which will help us to determine your Vero Cable configurations.
3.5mm (M) to 4 pin XLR (F) Adapter 1/4""  (M) to 4 pin XLR (F) Adapter3.5mm (M) to 1/4"" (F) Adapter

For international shipping:  All International backers will be contacted personally and will be provided their shipping costs. Due to the fact that we have many countries participating in our campaign, and we require specific protocol (insurance and/or signature required shipping), we feel it would be unfair to provide one rate for all international shipments based on the fact that they vary greatly between countries.
For all U.S. shipments, please add $11 for shipping. This includes combined shipments (multiple perks).
MIT Cable's Kent Loughlin talks about why Vero is an important asset to your headphones.
Vero Is Ready For Your Headphones!
At this time we have completed the following in terms of the production phases of our Vero Headphone Cabling System:
Complete R&D and First Prototype Manufacturing of the Vero Full Range Headphone Cable, The Vero Standard Dongle & The Vero Bass Dongle.
Successful Field Testing & Public Demo Testing (RMAF 2014)
Complete R&D and Second Prototype Development of the Vero Full Range Headphone Cable.
Continued Field Testing and Public Demo Testing (SoCal CanJam 2015)

When we first started this project, it was clear that we had a winning product for any headphone, providing an experience that headphone users would not only appreciate, but would be like no other. Whether you're a music lover, recording engineer, DJ or gamer, Vero will take you to a whole other level. We mean it when we say, ""you really don't know how great your headphones are, until you pair them with Vero"".

We are ready to turn the Vero Headphone Cable into a reality, and in order to do that, it's important that we determine the needs of our backers. You will help us provide research into the most wanted configurations. We are very familiar with the more popular brands of headphones and how Vero will accommodate specific connections, but we would also like to know whether our Vero Dongle, another prototype that we have designed, is a potential player in our Vero line. Your input and support will not only help us to bring the Vero Headphone Cabling System to headphone users everywhere, but it will also determine how we finish this product. We need your input!

Cut out the noise and hear your music like never before. With broski Lety, you’ll experience superb noise cancelling​ with high fidelity dynamic sound in any situation in full comfort for hours on end.

Featuring top of the line active noise cancellation, a crystal clear midrange sound, deep bass resonance, dual axis cups, soft vegan leather padding, long-lasting battery, sweatproof, and unparalleled dynamic HiFi audio range - broski Lety has all the premium technology and features of the high-end leading brands, plus more, without the marked up price! 

 

 

The broski Lety was designed according to feedback from Olympic athletes and music aficionados. They described their idea of the perfect headphones, and we created them.

 

 

From the sound quality to the fit and interface, we made sure broski Lety delivered on every front to provide excellent audio quality, exceptional comfort, and a seamless experience. 

The best headphones should help you slip into undisrupted, uninterrupted, optimal performance and flow - broski Lety does exactly that.

 

We worked with leading experts in headphone design and sound science to meticulously craft the world’s best pair of premium headphones at an affordable price. We’ve cut out the cost of manufactured hype, middlemen and expensive markups, so you don’t need to go into debt to get the quality you deserve!

With an incredible dynamic range, broski Lety can deliver high fidelity audio at any volume. Headphones often crackle and distort at high volumes and fail to deliver quality and fidelity. With broski Lety, there is no compromise on sound quality regardless of your volume preferences.


The broski Lety boasts incredible crystal-clear highs and features a deep bass resonance and mid-range boost - so you can listen to all the details and feel the music as you zone in.

Because human ears are more sensitive to mid-range frequencies, we added an extra power boost to the low midrange frequencies therefore extra clarity is achieved in the high range frequencies. By doing this, we created an enhanced flat response, which gives you an unbelievably phenomenal immersive audio experience. This is HiFi engineering at its finest.

The impressive frequency response, unmatched sensitivity, and unique mid-range boost makes broski Lety one of the best sounding and most powerful noise-cancelling headphones on the market. 

Dive deeper into your workout, work, or whatever you want to focus on with Active Noise Cancellation. The broski Lety uses cutting edge active noise-cancelling technology to monitor and measure exterior noise, then cancel it with an opposing frequency. The result is powerful silence that lets you zone in on your task and get work done.

 

We designed broski Lety to be ultra-light and comfortable all day long. From the ear cups to the headband to the material used - we ensured every aspect was optimized for long-lasting comfort.

The broski Lety’s ear cushions are made of soft vegan leather that gently cups your ears. They’re so comfortable, you’ll forget you’re wearing headphones. 

We also added field-tested Dual Axis Cups engineered to reduce head pressure and made the headphones adjustable to ensure optimal placement for extended use.

Lastly, we used a durable ultralight material to make the broski Lety exceptionally lightweight without compromising strength --- making them comfortable and practical for workouts, travel, long calls, and all facets of life.

 

Don’t worry about sweat, the broski Lety is 100% sweat-proof and stainproof. No more broken headphones, lost connections, or smelly sweat-stained ear cups and headbands - focus on your workout and let the music bring your performance to new heights.

 

The broski Lety uses a long-lasting battery that provides 20+ hours of playtime. If you want to push it even longer, you can switch it to passive mode by connecting the 3.5mm audio cable and disabling the Bluetooth® connection.


Plus, it only takes 3 hours to charge broski Lety from 0% to 100%.

 

broski Lety features intuitively-placed controls to give you a seamless listening experience. Quickly and easily change the volume, toggle the Active Noise Cancellation (ANC), receive or end calls, pause songs, skip songs, and power off your headphones with easy access buttons.

 

A built-in mic allows you to receive and make calls with broski Lety. Cancel out the background noise with Active Noise Cancellation for uninterrupted, distraction-free calls.
 

 

With broski Lety, you have the wireless freedom required for an active lifestyle. As members of the Bluetooth SIG network, broski has access to the newest cutting edge Bluetooth® technology. 

Get up to 265ft (80 m)​* of strong Bluetooth® connection to make and receive wireless calls, play music and listen to videos, and more.

Additionally, broski Lety also includes a 3.5mm audio input and wire - which means you can connect to non-Bluetooth® devices and listen without a wireless connection if you need.

 

broski Lety folds in different ways for easy storage and comes with a luxury hard-shell portable case that fits comfortably in a gym bag and most handbags. Pack and go: traveling with noise-cancelling HiFi sound has never been so convenient and affordable.

 

broski is a group of designers and engineers who've been in the consumer electronics industry for over 5 years. Most of the team members have worked in well-known firms such as Single Digits, Merryl Lynch, Morgan Stanley, and Nordstrom.  In the past 5 years, broski has grown its footprint to more than 3,000 stores in the US and more than 1,200 stores in Mexico and Central America.

While broski has manufactured some best-selling electronic products in the past, broski has also helped design and manufacture a number of products for recognizable big-box stores. The broski Lety is the first over-the-ear headphone they will release.

broski believes affordability should not preclude premium audio, high quality materials, and design. We pride ourselves in the extraordinary sound and quality of all our products.

We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, have successfully produced one hundred pieces of a highly-rated Betas testing model, and now have a finished product ready for a first production run.

As members of the Bluetooth SIG network, broski has access to the newest cutting edge Bluetooth® technology. Get up to 265ft (80 m)​* of strong Bluetooth® connection to make and receive wireless calls, play music and listen to videos, and more.Additionally, broski Lety also includes a 3.5mm audio input and wire - which means you can connect to non-Bluetooth® devices and listen without a wireless connection if you need. broski Lety folds in different ways for easy storage and comes with a luxury hard-shell portable case that fits comfortably in a gym bag and most handbags. Pack and go: traveling with noise-cancelling HiFi sound has never been so convenient and affordable. broski is a group of designers and engineers who've been in the consumer electronics industry for over 5 years. Most of the team members have worked in well-known firms such as Single Digits, Merryl Lynch, Morgan Stanley, and Nordstrom.  In the past 5 years, broski has grown its footprint to more than 3,000 stores in the US and more than 1,200 stores in Mexico and Central America.While broski has manufactured some best-selling electronic products in the past, broski has also helped design and manufacture a number of products for recognizable big-box stores. The broski Lety is the first over-the-ear headphone they will release.broski believes affordability should not preclude premium audio, high quality materials, and design. We pride ourselves in the extraordinary sound and quality of all our products.We have spent months developing, testing and prototyping, have successfully produced one hundred pieces of a highly-rated Betas testing model, and now have a finished product ready for a first production run.",59.0,0,"1 Campaign

column15: >When cutting edge wireless technology meets cutting edge audio tech, the result is Kharbon. The latest advancement in wireless headphones doesn’t just sound better and last longer than other earbuds, it was designed by industry-leading ergonomic specialists to keep you free and comfortable no matter what.
column29: >Technology moves fast, but your life moves faster. Kharbon headphones were designed to deliver crystal-clear sound and a perfect in-ear fit regardless of what life throws at you. Whether you’re hustling through a workout, stuck in the rain, diving into the pool, or biking to work, Kharbon won’t skip a beat — because neither can you.
column57: >Complete waterproofing and dustproofing with IP67 technology seals Kharbon from the elements and keeps your music pumping, rain or shine. And harsh weather is not all Kharbon can withstand. Take your headphones in the pool, the shower, the sauna and more without worry.
column61: >There are a lot of waterproof headphones out there, but none are like Kharbon. The best waterproofing doesn’t mean anything if the earbuds slip and fall out (as most do) when a little moisture is applied. Kharbon was designed specifically to hold tight and deliver the exact same level of comfort above and below the surface.
column69: >Turbulent pool waters and high-pressured showers can alter the sound quality of lesser headphones, but Kharbon’s speakers were designed with water dynamics in mind. Move seamlessly from the pool to the sauna to the shower with no change in sound quality.
column105: >Whether you’re running a marathon or enduring a marathon study session at the library, Kharbon won’t quit. A remarkable continuous 8-hour battery life fits into each tiny headphone to bring all-day audio wherever you need it.
column113: >Kharbon was designed for all-day use - play your music all day, without interruption.
column125: >Need to go longer than 8 hours? Kharbon’s lightning-fast charger provides 3 hours of power with just a 15-minute charge. Even if the juice runs low, you’ll never be without your tunes for long.
column134: D team designed Kharbon to have the best battery life on the market - comparable in capacity to other, much more expensive headphones on the market.
column142: >Kharbon’s carrying case doubles as its charger, and it also functions as a versatile power bank for all of your devices. With just one charge, you’ll be able to keep your headphones, smartphone, and tablet running for days.
column150: >The 2000 mAh power bank was designed to protect as well as to power. Its sleek stainless design utilizes the strength of dual arches to diffuse shock and keep your headphones safe from drops, falls, bangs and more.
column155: >Most power banks hardly fit into a pocket or purse and add an uncomfortable amount of weight to your load. Kharbon’s carrying case is less than half the size of most power banks and weighs no more than the average phone.
column163: >Kharbon’s custom nano speakers were no accident. Hundreds of prototypes were developed before the perfect speaker was finally born.
column165:
/>

Kharbon delivers the promise of perfect, unaltered sound quality no matter what life has in store. The crisp highs, booming bass, and crystal-clear vocals will bring you as close as possible to the sensation of hearing your favorite music live.
column181: >Kharbon uses nanotechnology to deliver the most cutting-edge audio listening experience that audio technology has to offer.
column189: >With graphene technology, Kharbon uses a material 200 times stronger than steel and 1000 times lighter than paper to provide unparalleled sound and fidelity.
column197: >With our proprietary in-ear ergonomic design, cancel out external sounds, other voices, and ambient noise when you’re listening to music or on a call.
column209: >True wireless technology and Bluetooth 5.0 make Kharbon the leading headphones in their class for wireless connectivity. The earbuds detect your device from up to 30 feet away and pair instantly. Just put them in and press play.
column217: >Keep your phone or tablet safe in your locker at the gym or in your bag at the airport while you access all your music wirelessly from your Kharbon earbuds. You’ll never need to worry about dropped connections or lapses in sound quality thanks to leading Bluetooth 5.0 technology.
column225: >Kharbon sets you free - roam around the house, play your hardest on the field, even take a dip - Kharbon never stops you from doing your thing.
column230: >We’ve tested our custom LDS antenna thousands of hours in hundreds of different scenarios to increase bandwidth and signal reception while reducing interference and noise. Experience a TRUE wireless experience with Kharbon.
column238: >After thousands of hours of research and testing, we utilize the power of Bluetooth 5.0 to remove virtually all sound lag between your device and our buds. Ditch those wires and never miss a beat and experience videos exactly the way they were meant to be.
column251: >With Kharbon’s voice command system, you can control your music, surf the web, access your messages and much more using just your voice. Kharbon is equipped with an ultra-sensitive microphone that picks up your voice and your voice only. Access Siri or Google Assistant with a subtle command and turn your headphones into your virtual command center.
column255:
>

Kharbon’s intuitive touch-control system is an industry first. Forget buttons. These controls are based on your movements. Single and double taps on the left and right earbuds allow you to control your music, answer calls, access your virtual assistant and more.
column258: >
column268: >No wireless headphones feel as weightless and comfortable as Kharbon. You’ll barely even notice they’re in. Enjoy the Hi-Fi stereo sound of professional studio headphones without the clunkiness and tangled wires.
column273: >Our ergonomic engineers worked through dozens of prototypes before landing on the perfect-fit design that can only be found with Kharbon. The combination of precise points of curvature, varying levels of grip, and adjustable buds allows Kharbon to settle into a comfortable, organic fit in any ear. Say goodbye to itching, ear pain, and slippage.
column279: >One of the biggest downsides to wireless earbuds is that they can fall out and be easily lost. Kharbon’s perfect-fit design makes this all but impossible. Your earbuds will stay secure and immobile whether you’re jumping rope or riding Motocross.
column291: >Kharbon has a magnetic lock security system for its earbuds that is weatherproof and durable. Fabrics tear, plastics crack, and zippers break, but the power of a magnet will never diminish. With the sturdy magnetic system, your earbuds will be protected from dust, shock, and the elements as they are secured inside the carrying case. Nothing but your touch will release them.
column295:
>

The power bank carrying case also features an innovative one-click security system that tells you when your earbuds are safely stored away. When you feel the click, you know your headphones are securely locked in place and charging. To release them, just push to click again and the lock will release.
column304: >Our magnetic secure-fit technology guarantees your earbuds never get lost or fall out of place. This design optimizes battery capacity and compactness by removing the need for unnecessary buttons or mechanics.
column312: >Kharbon earbuds pair with every type of device and they do so automatically. Apple, Android, Windows and more, you’ll be able to access all of your music without so much as a click when you remove the earbuds from their dock and put them in.
column321: >Stay safe on the road and keep your focus at the gym. You won’t need to stop what you’re doing to fish out your device just to access your music. Auto-pairing integrates your favorite music into your life with no hassle.
column338: >
column350: >Our team has been hard at work for more than a year crafting and planning the Kharbon. We're excited to show the world the next evolution of audio technology.
column354: >Unlike other crowdfunding campaigns, we've already spent months developing a manufacturing-ready model and only need funding for the initial batch order. Purchase yours today and you won’t need to wait long to get the Kharbon in your hands.
column372: >
column398:

column1:
We had initially planned to launch the CCA CX10 campaign much later into the year. However, as the world struggles with the onset of the Covid19 pandemic, we decided to push the campaign earlier to share a small amount of hope and musical joy. With the economic hardships of the times, we have also decided to lower the price of the CX10 at every Perk level, allowing more individuals to experience the CX10. We are pushing ahead of the schedule in manufacturing so we can get the CX10 into your hands sooner, and we hope our product can bring some extra joy and peace during anxious times. We encourage everyone to stay safe and be relieved through good music.

 

Why crowdfunding?

With years of experience in the audio industry, we at CCA have always aimed to provide the best HIFI quality products at an affordable budget price to meet the needs of every customer. We normally sell our products via our numerous distributors or other online platforms like Aliexpress, Amazon, and Gearbest, but we wanted to expand our reach to more directly connect with our customers and fans. By taking the ideas and suggestions provided by our fans throughout the years, we have formed a new methodology to create the perfect audio products and bring them to you on a platform that promotes creative cooperation between manufacturers and customers. 

We hope that with this new approach, we can reward our backers and community by bringing you the ideal TWS in-ear monitor that was designed and built through your suggestions. We firmly believe our new TWS will be the best that we have yet to offer because it was made by both you and us, together. Our team at CCA wants to thank all of you for helping us make our best product yet.

column10: >We believe that the freedom of a premium wireless audio experience should be enjoyable and affordable!

column5: >We started our journey over a year ago because of our love for running and passion for music. Running can give you a feeling of ultimate freedom. We love to run on our favourite powersongs, but the fact that our earphones got tangled and limited our movements drove us crazy. We wanted wireless earphones, soon to discover that a set of premium wireless earphones were incredible expensive and simply overpriced.

column11: >We went on a mission to develop our own premium wireless earphones.
column15: >our earphones are almost half the price
column16: >of other top name wireless earphone brands.

column4: >

column2: >We at WING™ believe that success can only be secured if you give back for what you take. We strive for a future in which every single person can enjoy the world freely and happily! We’ve teamed up with the international NGO Save the Children  and are proud to announce that 7% of our future earnings will be used on projects with them. Improving the lives of as many children possible, all around the world.
>You can check out some of their amazing work in the video below:

column6: >We both are fanatic scuba divers and truly love being in and around the ocean. After seeing first-hand how our plastics are destroying the world’s oceans  we decided that we wanted to address this pollution in a positive way. Therefore our packages are made out 100% recyclable cardboard. No Plastics, Period!

column2: >

The batttery lasts an amazing 8 hours and you can simply recharge your sportband with the WING™ Micro USB cable. The armbands come in two sizes 4.7"" inch (iPhone 6 or smaller) or 5.5"" inch (iPhone 6S + or larger).

column2: >To make this project a reality, we need your help to fund our first production run. We've already spend a lot of time and money setting up designs and molds, but because of high minimum order quantities we need to order in bulk. That's where you guys come in.
>You can help us by sharing our campaign with your friend!

column4: '/>
column7: />

column4: >We're happy to hear your feedback and answer all of your questions 24/7!

column1: We are happy to answer all of your questions 24/7, feel free to contact us!

1. What can you do to help?
Of course getting a WING™ Earphone  for yourself means the world to us! Also sharing our story with friends and family via social media would help us a lot. You can use the sharing tools in our campaign, it’s very easy.

2. What happens when WING™ doesn’t reach its goal?
We are confident that we will reach our campaign goal! But if we, by any reason, do not get funded successfully, you will get your money back. Guaranteed!

3. Is there a risk if I’m contributing?
We feel fully accountable to the backers. You can be sure that we’ll keep a rigorous eye on the financials. We have a highly talented team and we are 100% dedicated to ship an outstanding product, no matter what.

4. Is there a warranty?
We are super serious in getting the best user experience possible. We offer an exclusive 1-year warranty on all the electronic components.

5. Does the WING™ Earphone have an included microphone?
Yes! You can answer a call with your WING™ Earphone!

6. How can I recharge my WING™ Earphone?
The WING™ Earphone comes with a micro USB cable, which charges the batteries within 2 hours. Letting you enjoy another 8 hours of your favorite powersongs!

7. I have small / abnormal ears, will the earphones fit?
Your WING™ Earphone will be delivered 6 different sized eartips! We have tested dozens of people and they all agreed the fit and comfort was great. If the eartips still do not suit you, we promise you that we will find a solution that fits your ears! Please feel free to check out our ""what people say"" video.
8. How is the sound quality?
column4: >Being enthusiastic music lovers, sound quality was an absolute priority for us. We have partnered up with a leading high-end production facility, which means we’re using the same speakers as high-end audio companies. Please feel free to check out our ""product specs"" for specified information.

column1:
9. Are the earphones waterproof?
Yes! WING™ Earphones are IPX4 rated. This means that you can sweat as much as you want!
10. Is the WING™  Earphone customizable?
column4: >We want all our backers to be happy and satisfied with our product, and don’t want to make false promises. We decided to offer limited customizability of the earphone, however as seen in our stretch goals, you as backer can support customizable options by sharing our campaign!

column1: 11. What are the shipping costs?
column4: >Shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the check our process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.

column1: Please bare in mind that any import taxes for your country will be your responsibility.

column3: >12. When can I receive my WING™  Earphone?
column6: >We guarantee that the second batch of earphones will be shipped November 2016.

column1:
13. What happens if I change address before you ship?
We’ll make an announcement 1 month before we ship. You’ll then be able to update your address on your Indiegogo profile.
Please keep in mind that the USD - EUR conversions in our perks are an indication. Actual conversions might deviate slightly. Thank you for understanding.

There will be no exchanges or returns unless there is a manufacturing defect. To begin the refund/exchange process you must send a request to support@wingearphones.com within 7 days of receiving the product (Subject: ""Refund""). Provide an explanation of the defect and pictures of the product / packaging. If applicable, you will receive a WING Return/Exchange Form in order to complete your request.
Any returned items received by us without prior notification and approval will not be processed.
All returns/exchanges must be postmarked no more than 30 days after your request has been authorized and include a completed WING Return/Exchange Form in order to complete your request.
","We believe that the freedom of a premium wireless audio experience should be enjoyable and affordable!

We started our journey over a year ago because of our love for running and passion for music. Running can give you a feeling of ultimate freedom. We love to run on our favourite powersongs, but the fact that our earphones got tangled and limited our movements drove us crazy. We wanted wireless earphones, soon to discover that a set of premium wireless earphones were incredible expensive and simply overpriced.
We went on a mission to develop our own premium wireless earphones. By focussing on the essentials our earphones are almost half the price of other top name wireless earphone brands.
UPDATE: AT YOUR DOORSTEP WITHIN 2 TO 3 WEEKS!

We at WING™ believe that success can only be secured if you give back for what you take. We strive for a future in which every single person can enjoy the world freely and happily! We’ve teamed up with the international NGO Save the Children  and are proud to announce that 7% of our future earnings will be used on projects with them. Improving the lives of as many children possible, all around the world.
You can check out some of their amazing work in the video below:

We both are fanatic scuba divers and truly love being in and around the ocean. After seeing first-hand how our plastics are destroying the world’s oceans  we decided that we wanted to address this pollution in a positive way. Therefore our packages are made out 100% recyclable cardboard. No Plastics, Period!

Have your phone close by no matter which work out you are crushing! The WING™ LED Sportarmband makes sure that you can go for a midnight run in a safe way. The batttery lasts an amazing 8 hours and you can simply recharge your sportband with the WING™ Micro USB cable. The armbands come in two sizes 4.7"" inch (iPhone 6 or smaller) or 5.5"" inch (iPhone 6S + or larger).
You will receive a survey to choose your armband size.
UPDATE: AT YOUR DOORSTEP WITHIN 2 TO 3 WEEKS!
To make sure that none of our backers come up short, the 100% recycle packages are filled with all the accesories you possible need. The WING™ Package comes with:

- WING™ Earphone- WING™ Micro USB charging cable- WING™ Microfiber Carrying Pouch- 10 Unique WING™ Eartips         - 4 regular eartip sizes         - 3 two layer eartip sizes         - 3 memory foam eartips- Fixed cable clip - Some awesome instructions

Our team consists of two senior Dutch Industrial Engineering partners with an endless motivation to get you the best products possible. We started WING™ because of our own personal struggles with the pricing of current big brands. We wanted to create a product that we ourselves want to use every day, this line of thought set the standard in the creation of our earphone. The WING™ team is based in Rotterdam at the WING HQ. You can learn more about us by clicking the following images.

To make this project a reality, we need your help to fund our first production run. We've already spend a lot of time and money setting up designs and molds, but because of high minimum order quantities we need to order in bulk. That's where you guys come in.

Please feel free to check out our ""what people say"" video.

8. How is the sound quality?Being enthusiastic music lovers, sound quality was an absolute priority for us. We have partnered up with a leading high-end production facility, which means we’re using the same speakers as high-end audio companies. Please feel free to check out our ""product specs"" for specified information.
9. Are the earphones waterproof?Yes! WING™ Earphones are IPX4 rated. This means that you can sweat as much as you want!

10. Is the WING™  Earphone customizable?We want all our backers to be happy and satisfied with our product, and don’t want to make false promises. We decided to offer limited customizability of the earphone, however as seen in our stretch goals, you as backer can support customizable options by sharing our campaign!
11. What are the shipping costs?Shipping costs change depending on the chosen perk and your location. Select your country in the check our process and the shipping costs will be shown instantly.
Please bare in mind that any import taxes for your country will be your responsibility.
12. When can I receive my WING™  Earphone?We guarantee that the second batch of earphones will be shipped November 2016.
13. What happens if I change address before you ship?We’ll make an announcement 1 month before we ship. You’ll then be able to update your address on your Indiegogo profile.
Please keep in mind that the USD - EUR conversions in our perks are an indication. Actual conversions might deviate slightly. Thank you for understanding.

There will be no exchanges or returns unless there is a manufacturing defect. To begin the refund/exchange process you must send a request to support@wingearphones.com within 7 days of receiving the product (Subject: ""Refund""). Provide an explanation of the defect and pictures of the product / packaging. If applicable, you will receive a WING Return/Exchange Form in order to complete your request.
Any returned items received by us without prior notification and approval will not be processed.

All returns/exchanges must be postmarked no more than 30 days after your request has been authorized and include a completed WING Return/Exchange Form in order to complete your request.",33.0,2,"1 Campaign

MEZONE is the world’s most advanced True Wireless Stereo earbuds of unparalleled sound performance, state-of-the-art technology and refined design. Once fully charged, MEZONE can support an ultra long playtime of 8 hours and 80 hours in total added by the charging case. Its ergonomic design is guaranteed to never fall out and never cause soreness in ears. It features the most advanced Qualcomm chip with TWS+ technique, Bluetooth 5.0+EDR, IPX7 nano waterproof and touch controls. It is THE best, budget-friendly earbuds you don’t want to miss!

 

Media Featured

MEZONE’s uncompromised audio quality is a relish even for hardcore audiophiles. 

The sound is optimized in both frequency and impulse response through digital sound processing (DSP) to create a perfect balance of treble and bass.

MEZONE features the latest Bluetooth algorithm for a true lossless uncompressed audioquality and it incorporates a dynamic transducer made with graphene which delivers a high resolution audio. It is tested and tuned by our engineers to create crystal-clear acoustics and immersive music listening experience.

The cavity is uniquely designed to refine the sound frequencies and absorb the unwanted reflection and diffraction to provide 3-D surround sound. Its right contour and impeccable seal cancel out the external noise to protect your hearing.

 Mezone - What People Say

Thanks to MEZONE’s ergonomic design, they stay in place even during the most vigorous movements, and they fit so snugly that you can even sleep in them.

 

We scanned and gathered data from the canal and exterior of the ears of thousands of people and used it to determine the perfect tilt and angle that lock the earbud in place for all types of ears. We made many iterations to streamline the earbuds’ surface to perfectly match the contour of the ear for maximum comfort.

MEZONE is rid of any stick, hook or wingtip, offering a more comfortable, stable fit and a better look for any occasion than most of the sports headphones. 

MEZONE’s cutting-edge Qualcomm chip allows each MEZONE to pair to your device individually, so you can use either one separately and switch between the two without any delay or interruption. 

In comparison to MEZONE's Qualcomm True Wireless Stereo Plus technology, other TWS earphones work in a master/slave mode in which one earphone is the master and the other is the slave. In case the master gets lost, damaged or out of power, the other one becomes a dud. This mode causes extra power consumption, connection dropouts and bad synchronization between the two earphones. MEZONE avoids you from all these pitfalls, allows you to enjoy the music just the way you want it!

MEZONE’s Qualcomm chip cuts power consumption and 2x the playtime of average TWS earbuds. The built-in battery in the charging case will provide extra 72 hours playtime which adds up to a total of 80 hours. MEZONE is designed to play your music all day without interruption and you will never run out of juice again!

With the portable charging case, you can charge your MEZONE on the go, anywhere, anytime. The headphones charge while they are in the case. To charge the case, simply place it on a wireless Qi mat, or plug a cable into its Type-C charging port. The case features 3 LED battery indicators for both the headphones and case, so you are never left guessing.

After the initial setup, MEZONE auto-pairs to your device the second you open the charging case. There is no need to take the headphones out of the case. Just like that, open and pair.

The charging case is small and lightweight enough to be stored in your pocket. We use innovative overmolding while crafting the case, which improves the mechanical strength to provide optimal protection, so you can just toss them in your bag or pocket without worrying about it being scratched by keys. 

Our magnetic secure-fit design guarantees your headphones click into place for an instant, efficient charging and never fall out of place or get lost.

With a gentle tap on the smart button on the MEZONE, you can play/pause musics, change tracks forward, volume up/down, answer/end calls and call up the digital assistant. The button is quick to response yet not too sensitive to be triggered by accident. Unlike many headphones with physical buttons, you don’t need to press the buttons which can end up pushing the headphones into your ear. 

 

The upgraded version of the Bluetooth means various improvements in MEZONE, including longer playtime, better audio quality, greater range, stronger connection and stereo phone calls in both ears.

What makes the MEZONE even better at waterproofing than other IPX7rating earphones is its reinforced waterproofing design. Not only is the MEZONE structured to be watertight and dustproof, its internal components are also covered in the nanocoating which makes water flow right through without coming into contact. This translates to a protection from accidental submersion in 1 meter (3.3 feet) of water for up to 30 minutes. You can simply rinse your MEZONE off after a particularly hard workout.

 

We have a 16-year history of innovation and a persistent pursuit for perfection in audio products coded into our company’s culture and DNA. We have cooperated with world’s leading brands including Philips, JBL, Beats and Huawei in designing and production of a wide range of high fidelity products, including microphones, headphones, telephone accessories for personal, professional, business and military applications. 

 WE ARE IN CES2019
