column2: > Tell your friends and family about our Cisor Indiegogo page and if they pick one of our great Cisor perks - you get $5 (with no limit!). The question is how?
column4: >A Successful Referral gets you a $5 refund on your Indiegogo perk, further referral gifts will be sent to you via paypal at the end of the campaign.
column14: >Speakers. There's loads of them, right? What can Cisor offer that no other can?
column15: >Cisor sets itself apart from the rest by producing acoustics unique to each environment and surface. Each surface has different sound qualities to the next, meaning there's no limit to the fun you can have experimenting and finding out which sound does it for you. It gets better - the bigger the surface, the bigger the sound.

column3: >Traditional speakers use a cone to convert sound waves into the sounds we hear. Cisor has done away with the traditional cone. This has allowed us to create a bigger and far more powerful driver than you would ordinarily be able to fit inside a speaker that's as small as this one.
column5: >
column7: >Incisor diffusion technology™ has removed the need for a cone. It does this by using the surface to act as a “cone”: the surface diffuses the sound.  This means the Cisor is able to provide a full audible frequency range down to as low as 30hz giving seriously deep bass and as high as 15khz which is high enough to reproduce sounds made by orchestral instruments.  Different surfaces (or substrates) have different resonating properties, so audio will sound slightly different depending upon the surface it is placed upon.
column9: >The frequency and range of traditional speakers directly depends upon the size of the cone as well as the driver, hence why many small portable speakers sound “tinny”.  They cannot offer both deep bass and higher frequency because the driver can only deliver certain frequency ranges.  It is why many HiFi systems have separate subwoofers for low frequencies (bass). Overtime, a traditional speaker will lose amplification capabilities due to wear of the cone.  Even worse can happen if the cone tears
column10: the speaker becomes inaudible.
column12: >Because Damson has been able to push the capabilities of the sound it means that there is no need for different speakers to provide vocals/acoustics and bass. A traditional speaker has a coil that is fixed to the permanent magnet (often referred to as the driver). Damson’s Incisor Diffusion Technology has replaced the coil with “teeth” (incisors). These act in the same way as a coil
column13: they power the different frequencies that are pushed down the leg through to the surface. Due to the way the Incisor Diffusion Technology™ reacts with the surface, it allows the sound to transfer through it. Place one of our speakers on a window and the sound is diffused through the glass and can be heard on both sides.
column17: >With it's cool design and fun feature, you'd be forgiven for thinking that Cisor is another gimmick. It's not. Cisor is crammed full of the latest technology and uses Damson's innovative ""Incisor Diffusion Technology"", which has been precision-engineered to deliver amazing sound from a speaker that is small enough to be held in the palm of your hand.
column19: >Perfect portable sound small yet powerful.
column21: >Whether relaxing over a coffee, watching a movie or even a sports game Cisor will become the perfect companion for how you listen to your audio.
column23: >Fix the Cisor and Metal Mount on rear window and you'll turn the entire vehicle into a speaker.
column25:
>Fix Cisor and Metal Mount to a window and you'll hear sound on both sides.
Perfect for summer parties.
column28: >Not content with producing the most dynamic sound from a single speaker, we pushed the boundaries further to enable Cisor to work in wireless stereo. Bring two Cisors together and with a brief setup you will be streaming music in flawless, wireless stereo. Each Cisor can be set to a maximum of 10m (30') apart.
column30: >The result is phenomenal, with two tiny speakers able to fill a room of at least 500 sqft (42 sqm). Finally you'll be able to listen to music, in stereo, in your living room without having to resort to big (and, lets face it, ugly) speaker systems. You no longer need to compromise on style, or take up valuable space.
column34: >Just select whichever you want from the perks in the right hand side.
column42: >Cisor looks and feels amazing. It's as simple as that. Beautifully crafted from anodised aluminium and available in silver or black design.
column43: >Your Cisor will add style wherever you decide to set it down.
column45: >Have you ever been to a party where there's music inside, but not a lot going on outside, or vice versa? We all know that at parties people tend to congregate in certain areas, be it the living room, or outside in the yard, garden or balcony. Cisor has the solution - the Metal Mount. Simply screw the Cisor securely into place using the threaded base and fix the Metal Mount to a window inside. Turn it on, go outside. Yep, sound on both sides. All of a sudden, a speaker the size of a soda can is now capable of filling not only the inside of your place, but it's also streaming high quality audio outside.
column48: >The mount isn't limited to external windows. Maybe you want a speaker that you can listen to in the shower or bath, but why should you sacrifice the sound quality that goes hand in hand with water resistant speakers. Just place Cisor in the Metal Mount and fix onto the Shower screen (outside!) and you've got the greatest shower speaker ever!
column50: >Fancy a tailgate party? No problem, put Cisor in the Metal Mount and fix it to the car window, or even on top of the car, and be the envy of everyone else (our serious research shows that trucks sound amazing!).

column1: James, CEO of Damson Audio, is responsible for delivering a number of great products since Damson Audio's founding in 2012. James has significant knowledge and experience in crowdfunding campaigns, with this project being the fourth he has managed. James takes crowd funding and its backers seriously and, as such, personally answers each email and comment throughout the campaign.

column2: >Priding himself on being very hands on, James spends a lot of time in the US and China ensuring that Damson Audio's products are developed using the very latest technology, whilst making no compromises on quality. James' passion for audio was the very motivation to start up the company - the first version of the Cisor being its first product back in 2012.
column3: >Orders from the rest of the World will commence shipping shortly after the campaign ends. Thanks to our experience of shipping crowdfunding projects, our shipping costs are at a minimum with fulfilment centres and warehouses around the globe. Our Warehouses are located in the following countries/jurisdictions:
column6: >Please note that whilst we endeavour to ensure that import taxes and duties are kept to a minimum for territories outside of our warehouse locations, local import taxes and duties may be required to be paid. Damson Audio has no control over local customs offices and, as such, cannot be held responsible should you be charged import taxes and duties in addition to your purchase and shipping price. It is always best to check the position in your country beforehand.
column8: >Being a crowdfunding project and due to the way that crowd funded projects are organised, we are unable to offer refunds once you have placed your order. You should not attempt to use a credit card chargeback in order to receive a refund, as this is fraud.
column10: >Well, not a lot really. Short of something of a ""Force Majeure"" occurring between now and when we physically ship your Cisor, everything else is in place. The most important factor is you. Please make sure you enter your details correctly so that we can ship to the correct address and where possible please try to avoid a P.O. Box.
column11:

All that's left to say is Thank you! We at Damson Audio sincerely appreciate your continued support of our projects and for backing us.
